With the convergence of many leading companies in the industry, this is one of the useful events that helps increase connection and cooperation.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"370\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/VTG%202024\/407633467_1234373680843323_7063274817275521960_n.png\" width=\"960\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>This year, Van Nang Banok will attend the exhibition with many new products aiming at being more environmentally friendly. Typical products of VNB include:<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/dung-cu-gan-nhan\">Attaching tool<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/tagpin\">Tagpin<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/day-treo-sinh-hoc\">Eco-friendly fastener<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/nut-ao\">Recycled button<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/phu-kien-ao-so-mi\">Butterfly Keeper and Collar Band<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li>Cord lock, puller, Adger Pen,...<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud83d\udccdLocation: Saigon Exhibition &amp; Convention Center (SECC)<br \/>\r\n\ud83d\udccdBooth: B1028<br \/>\r\n\ud83d\udccdTime: 25\/09\/2024 - 28\/09\/2024<br \/>\r\n\ud83d\udccdAddress: 799 Nguyen Van Linh, Tan Phu Ward, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u2764The presence of our guests is an honor for Van Nang Banok. V\u1ea1n Nang Banok xin c\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 ch&agrave;o \u0111&oacute;n v&agrave; \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9 t\u1eeb qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch m\u1eddi, v&agrave; s\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c c\u1ee7a ph&iacute;a \u0111\u1ea1i l&yacute;, \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c. V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok mong r\u1eb1ng trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i h\u01a1n, c&oacute; th\u1ec3 mang nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0111&uacute;ng theo ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n - ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/b><\/p>","mota_en":"<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-8a884860-7fff-5882-7803-d0d48416912b\">InaTex 2024 exhibition has officially ended. Van Nang Banok would like to thank the welcome and support from our guests, and the cooperation of our agents and partners. Van Nang Banok hopes that in the future, we can become more widely known and can bring high quality products to the international market in accordance with Japanese standards - Vietnamese quality.<\/b><\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-50bded3f-7fff-067c-d35a-8aa6bac64f2b\">Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m InaTex 2024 \u0111&atilde; ch&iacute;nh th\u1ee9c k\u1ebft th&uacute;c. V\u1ea1n Nang Banok xin c\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 ch&agrave;o \u0111&oacute;n v&agrave; \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9 t\u1eeb qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch m\u1eddi, v&agrave; s\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c c\u1ee7a ph&iacute;a \u0111\u1ea1i l&yacute;, \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c. V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok mong r\u1eb1ng trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i h\u01a1n, c&oacute; id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">INATEX 2024 is one of the key exhibitions showcasing a wide range of products and accessories from Textile and Textile Products (TPT) industries.&nbsp;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"188\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/OCeSIhRTCZJDT7TiBQ1oRPImxrCocyglqO_uvxh_GT7xaGRl45qmJx-Cjq3OhfhZPSpOESbGVDoM6GEprW_TSHgW0KOgxnzCO6KjsIZFv3gQg_qvjQ0_ziSCvYVZm_YURALfCXIxjRmBwus-Qsaot9I\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">The event is well recognized as a creative exhibition that intends to safeguard the domestic market for textile products as well as increase exports. It will continue its role as a facilitator for the textile industry stakeholders to maximize opportunities in the free trade era to fill the traditional markets, mainly in the EU and the United States.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"188\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/imcEwvG-JD3CZz118PuJRJvSU1_6Neph_3jpDjHIVTCz0sYUVWsbAnfx-ZVl1LMLUiIZ4lbf3OSpmOdslAPmy71Jd1wyByJ4qOAhrU7u_qy8IlfZaEPsDRCSAVIoPE7uXXLeIFDuAcEwSr3VvFskxPs\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">Time: 20 - 23 March, 2024<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">Location: Jakarta International Expo<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">Register here to join: <a href=\"https:\/\/indointertex.com\/exibit\/book-a-stand\/\">https:\/\/indointertex.com\/exibit\/book-a-stand\/<\/a><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">Van Nang Banok is going to participate in InaTex 2024<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">After the success of InaTex 2023, Van Nang Banok has committed to bring many values to partners about high-qualitized products and good services. Specially in 2024, VNB has launch the last new products made of ecofriendly materials:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">Golf Accessories<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">Puller<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-e21afaf3-7fff-93f5-2369-eee9400fe60a\">Brand Seal<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b \/><\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<h2><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">V\u1ec1 tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m SaigonTex 2024<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h2><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">SaigonTex &ndash; Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m C&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam l&agrave; s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t v&agrave; c&oacute; \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam. Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c song song \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi v\u1edbi SaigonFabric &ndash; H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 Nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u D\u1ec7t May Vi\u1ec7t Nam. L&agrave; th&agrave;nh vi&ecirc;n c\u1ee7a UFI &ndash; Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m (www.ufi.org). SaigonTex \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf c\u1ee7a UFI.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">Sau s\u1ef1 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng SAIGONTEX 2023, S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n \u0111&atilde;, thu h&uacute;t s\u1ef1 quan t&acirc;m \u0111&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3o c\u1ee7a h&agrave;ng ch\u1ee5c ng&agrave;n l\u01b0\u1ee3t kh&aacute;ch trong v&agrave; ngo&agrave;i n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ebfn tham quan, trao \u0111\u1ed5i kinh nghi\u1ec7m, nh\u1eefng c&aacute;i b\u1eaft tay, nh\u1eefng m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h&igrave;nh th&agrave;nh d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n t&igrave;nh h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb, \u0111&ocirc;i b&ecirc;n c&ugrave;ng c&oacute; l\u1ee3i.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"245\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/6Ze3aKzY28hfbWV-dHkQLo6VdPaooIdNLIWqsEDo4la5NwSXQOEYX3b7OcYiL-OYnQ1cvt_Ha6mRiXbp6gd55uOzqXrPs9MtcDqs-1rwsS8qvgEhuL6vcSraGVNnldiKpb9ZSoHpWrI0baCZjfz6DZ8\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">SaigonTex 2024 s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1eeb ng&agrave;y 10 \u0111\u1ebfn ng&agrave;y 13 th&aacute;ng 4, n\u0103m 2024 t\u1ea1i Trung t&acirc;m Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m S&agrave;i G&ograve;n (SECC) &ndash; 799 Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Linh, qu\u1eadn 7, th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"443\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/S39u_b9A3oTLPnCjygxPI0uIxTz_y2XXQ8zf9QOIZy5zwsxRvMeA79Zu-i5gV_YuFqC-e-fcNTYwdOc6rpbqIzg1u4lBdmCQ9Mm4fsxv77T72G5L55zhHSX9CEpCus6SfDelJFSydVbs3YYEGaPdR8E\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n l&agrave; gian h&agrave;ng thu h&uacute;t c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c v&agrave; kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng li&ecirc;n quan \u0111\u1ebfn ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok l&agrave; c&ocirc;ng ty ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i ra \u0111\u1eddi t\u1eeb n\u0103m 2014 t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu nh\u01b0:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">D&acirc;y treo nh&atilde;n<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">S&uacute;ng b\u1eafn nh&atilde;n<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">M&oacute;c treo<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">K\u1eb9p nh\u1ef1a<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">B\u01b0\u1edbm c\u1ed5 &aacute;o<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">Khoanh c\u1ed5 &aacute;o<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">&hellip;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-4f9d62fe-7fff-5baf-58b0-7865ff78f457\">Cho t\u1edbi nay, V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok \u0111ang \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1eeb c&aacute;c nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a nh\u01b0 v\u1ecf tr\u1ea5u, b&atilde; c&agrave; ph&ecirc;, nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, PP t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf,... V\u1edbi ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ch&acirc;m &ldquo;S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam theo ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n&rdquo;, V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng nh&agrave; cung c\u1ea5p ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u uy t&iacute;n cho doanh nghi\u1ec7p Vi\u1ec7t Nam v&agrave; to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>","noidung_en":"<h2><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">About SaigonTex 2024 exhibition<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h2><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">SaigonTex &ndash; Vietnam Textile and Garment Industry Exhibition is the largest and most influential event of the Vietnamese textile industry. The exhibition is held in parallel with SaigonFabric - Vietnam Textile and Garment Raw Materials Fair. A member of UFI &ndash; Global Association of the Exhibition Industry (www.ufi.org). SaigonTex is certified to ensure UFI&#39;s international exhibition quality.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">After the success of SAIGONTEX 2023, the event has attracted the great attention of tens of thousands of domestic and foreign visitors to visit, exchange experiences, shake hands, and form cooperative relationships. based on friendship and mutual benefit.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-f68f8982-7fff-8920-67a7-f31d532fc5ff\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"245\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/6Ze3aKzY28hfbWV-dHkQLo6VdPaooIdNLIWqsEDo4la5NwSXQOEYX3b7OcYiL-OYnQ1cvt_Ha6mRiXbp6gd55uOzqXrPs9MtcDqs-1rwsS8qvgEhuL6vcSraGVNnldiKpb9ZSoHpWrI0baCZjfz6DZ8\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">SaigonTex 2024 will take place from April 10 to 13, 2024 at Saigon Exhibition Center (SECC) - 799 Nguyen Van Linh, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-af7e3ed8-7fff-aeb1-83af-f1da14937ed4\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"443\" src=\"https:\/\/lh7-us.googleusercontent.com\/S39u_b9A3oTLPnCjygxPI0uIxTz_y2XXQ8zf9QOIZy5zwsxRvMeA79Zu-i5gV_YuFqC-e-fcNTYwdOc6rpbqIzg1u4lBdmCQ9Mm4fsxv77T72G5L55zhHSX9CEpCus6SfDelJFSydVbs3YYEGaPdR8E\" width=\"602\" \/><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Van Nang Banok promises to be a booth that attracts partners and customers related to sewing accessories<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Van Nang Banok is a garment packaging materials company established in 2014 in Vietnam, with main products such as:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Label hanger<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-41ac0252-7fff-b841-c9da-8491da93e90e\">Label gun<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b Ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i So&aacute;i K&igrave;nh L&acirc;m<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>N\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Tr\u1ea7n H\u01b0ng \u0110\u1ea1o (qu\u1eadn 5, TP.HCM),<strong>&nbsp;ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i So&aacute;i K&igrave;nh L&acirc;m<\/strong>&nbsp;hay c&ograve;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;&nbsp;<strong>Th\u01b0\u01a1ng x&aacute; \u0110\u1ed3ng Kh&aacute;nh&nbsp;<\/strong>\u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn l&agrave; ng&ocirc;i ch\u1ee3 chuy&ecirc;n bu&ocirc;n b&aacute;n l\u1ebb v\u1ea3i v\u1edbi gi&aacute; r\u1ebb v&agrave; l&acirc;u \u0111\u1eddi nh\u1ea5t S&agrave;i G&ograve;n.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong>Ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i So&aacute;i K&igrave;nh L&acirc;m&nbsp;<\/strong>t\u1ed3n t\u1ea1i l&acirc;u \u0111\u1eddi \u1edf S&agrave;i G&ograve;n v&agrave; t&ecirc;n ch\u1ee3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t theo t&ecirc;n c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda h&agrave;ng tr&ecirc;n ph\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi Hoa. \u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; khu ch\u1ee3 n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng r\u1ebb nh\u1ea5t TP. HCM v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ee7 c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i v\u1ea3i phong ph&uacute; v&agrave; m&agrave;u s\u1eafc \u0111a d\u1ea1ng, \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m y&ecirc;u th&iacute;ch c\u1ee7a ch\u1ecb em ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef khi l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn v\u1ea3i may trang ph\u1ee5c. \u0110&uacute;ng ngh\u0129a l&agrave; thi&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a v\u1ea3i v&oacute;c, tr\u1ea3i d&agrave;i t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111\u1ebfn cu\u1ed1i con \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng v\u1ea3i n\u1eb1m \u1edf kh\u1eafp m\u1ecdi n\u01a1i, tr&ecirc;n c&aacute;c s\u1ea1p h&agrave;ng n\u1eb1m san s&aacute;t nhau. Ch\u1ee3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&acirc;n khu r\u1ea5t r&otilde; r&agrave;ng: v\u1ea3i may \u0111\u1ed3 thun, v\u1ea3i kaki, v\u1ea3i may s\u01a1mi, v\u1ea3i may &aacute;o d&agrave;i,&hellip; \u0110\u1ee7 m\u1ecdi m&agrave;u s\u1eafc, \u0111\u1ee7 m\u1ecdi ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u v&agrave; m&ugrave;i v\u1ea3i m\u1edbi th\u01a1m n\u1ee9c m\u0169i khi\u1ebfn n\u01a1i \u0111&acirc;y tr\u1edf n&ecirc;n th\u1eadt nh\u1ed9n nh\u1ecbp.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o c\u1ee7a ch\u1ee3 n&agrave;y l&agrave; m\u1ed7i gian h&agrave;ng ch\u1ec9 b&aacute;n m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i v\u1ea3i nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ee7 m&agrave;u s\u1eafc v&agrave; h\u1ecda ti\u1ebft kh&aacute;c nhau, nh\u01b0 gian v\u1ea3i truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng, gian v\u1ea3i nhung, gian v\u1ea3i thun, v\u1ea3i &ldquo;c\u1ed5&rdquo;,&hellip; V&igrave; v\u1eady, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd kh&ocirc;ng m\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn hay t&igrave;m ki\u1ebfm lo\u1ea1i v\u1ea3i nh\u01b0 &yacute;. Khu ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i n&agrave;y t\u1eadp trung h\u01a1n 500 s\u1ea1p b&aacute;n v\u1ea3i. \u1ede \u0111&acirc;y c&aacute;c s\u1ea1p c&oacute; \u0111a d\u1ea1ng c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i v\u1ea3i kh&aacute;c nhau nh\u01b0: v\u1ea3i thun, voan, kaki,&hellip;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>V&igrave; \u0111&acirc;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i s\u1ec9 v&agrave; l\u1ebb l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 n&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t nhi&ecirc;n l&agrave; gi&aacute; c\u1ea3 c\u0169ng r\u1ebb h\u01a1n nh\u1eefng ti\u1ec7m v\u1ea3i nh\u1ecf l\u1ebb kh&aacute;c. Ch&iacute;nh v&igrave; t\u1eadp h\u1ee3p m\u1ecdi y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 t\u1eeb \u0111a d\u1ea1ng, ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cho \u0111\u1ebfn gi&aacute; th&agrave;nh h\u1ee3p l&yacute; n&ecirc;n \u0111&acirc;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem l&agrave; s\u1ef1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u cho nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi kinh doanh th\u1eddi trang thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf tr&ecirc;n kh\u1eafp th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 S&agrave;i G&ograve;n \u0111\u1ea5y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9:<\/strong>&nbsp;46 Tr\u1ea7n H\u01b0ng \u0110\u1ea1o, 14, Qu\u1eadn 5, H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" src=\"https:\/\/toplist.vn\/images\/800px\/cho-vai-soai-kinh-lam-282259.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>2. Ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng L&ecirc; Minh Xu&acirc;n, qu\u1eadn T&acirc;n B&igrave;nh<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y cho&aacute;ng ng\u1ee3p nh\u01b0 So&aacute;i K&igrave;nh L&acirc;m,&nbsp;<strong>ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng L&ecirc; Minh Xu&acirc;n<\/strong>&nbsp;mang tr&ecirc;n m&igrave;nh v\u1ebb ngo&agrave;i khi&ecirc;m t\u1ed1n, nh\u1eefng h&agrave;ng h&oacute;a \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y \u0111a ph\u1ea7n t\u1eadp h\u1ee3p t\u1eeb c&aacute;c h&agrave;ng v\u1ea3i. Tuy kh&ocirc;ng nh\u01b0 nh\u1eefng ng&ocirc;i ch\u1ee3 kh&aacute;c c&oacute; di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch r\u1ed9ng hay m\u1eb7t b\u1eb1ng,&nbsp;<strong>Ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng L&ecirc; Minh Xu&acirc;n<\/strong>&nbsp;l\u1ea1i n\u1eb1m l\u1ecdt th\u1ecfm trong nh\u1eefng c\u0103n nh&agrave; xung quanh ch\u1ee3, nh\u01b0ng n&oacute; l\u1ea1i thu h&uacute;t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c 1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u1edbn nh\u1eefng b\u1ea1n tr\u1ebb c&oacute; &yacute; \u0111\u1ecbnh kinh doanh \u0111\u1ed3 handmade hay mu\u1ed1n start up c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed3 may m\u1eb7c. Ch\u1ee3 tuy kh&ocirc;ng l\u1edbn nh\u01b0ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m l\u1ea1i kh&aacute; \u0111a d\u1ea1ng b\u1ea1n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t&igrave;m th\u1ea5y nhi\u1ec1u m\u1eabu h\u1ecda ti\u1ebft \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n \u0111ang hot hi\u1ec7n nay \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ef1 tay may v&agrave;i chi\u1ebfc &aacute;o s\u01a1 mi xinh x\u1eafn. \u1ede&nbsp;<strong>L&ecirc; Minh Xu&acirc;n&nbsp;<\/strong>b\u1ea1n c\u0169ng c&oacute; th\u1ec3 mua \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c v\u1ea3i th\u1eeba \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c&acirc;n b&aacute;n theo k&iacute; v\u1edbi gi&aacute; c\u1ef1c k\u1ef3 r\u1ebb, b\u1ea1n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 tha h\u1ed3 mua v\u1ec1 m&agrave; th\u1eed tay ngh\u1ec1 b\u1ea3n th&acirc;n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>B\u1ea1n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 d\u1ec5 d&agrave;ng t&igrave;m th\u1ea5y nhi\u1ec1u s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m handmade c\u1ef1c k\u1ef3 d\u1ec5 th\u01b0\u01a1ng nh\u01b0 v&ograve;ng, d&acirc;y da, h\u1ea1t c\u01b0\u1eddm, m\u1eb7t hay chuy\u1ec1n, ren, kim ch\u1ec9, hoa v\u1ea3i&hellip; \u0111&acirc;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem nh\u01b0 thi&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng handmade d&agrave;nh cho gi\u1edbi tr\u1ebb.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>N&ecirc;n v&igrave; th\u1ebf&nbsp;<strong>ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i \u1edf \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng L&ecirc; Minh Xu&acirc;n<\/strong>&nbsp;l\u1ea1i l&agrave; l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn kh&aacute; h\u1ee3p l&yacute; d&agrave;nh cho nh\u1eefng b\u1ea1n tr\u1ebb \u0111ang l&ecirc;n k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch kinh doanh may m\u1eb7c ho\u1eb7c t\u1ef1 m&agrave;y m&ograve; l&agrave;m \u0111\u1ed3 handmade v&igrave; c&oacute; cho mua l\u1ebb v&agrave; nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi b&aacute;n c\u0169ng kh&ocirc;ng qu&aacute; kh&oacute; t&iacute;nh nh\u01b0 \u1edf nh\u1eefng n\u01a1i b&aacute;n v\u1ea3i kh&aacute;c.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9:&nbsp;<\/strong>\u0110\u01b0\u1eddng L&ecirc; Minh Xu&acirc;n, Ph\u01b0\u1eddng 7, T&acirc;n B&igrave;nh, H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Ch\u1ee3 v\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng L\u00ea Minh Xu\u00e2n\" src=\"https:\/\/toplist.vn\/images\/800px\/cho-vai-duong-le-minh-xuan-quan-tan-binh-79738.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>3. Ch\u1ee3 \u0110\u1ea1i Quang Minh<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>Nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u li&ecirc;n quan \u0111\u1ebfn may m\u1eb7c \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y v&ocirc; c&ugrave;ng \u0111a d\u1ea1ng v&agrave; phong ph&uacute;. Do t&iacute;nh ch\u1ea5t c&ograve;n nhi\u1ec1u h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf trong kh&acirc;u s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t trong n\u01b0\u1edbc n&ecirc;n c&aacute;c ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u t\u1eeb Trung Qu\u1ed1c v\u1ec1 n\u01b0\u1edbc ta \u0111\u1ec3 ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i s\u1ec9 v&agrave; l\u1ebb cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng. \u1ea4n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng ban \u0111\u1ea7u thu h&uacute;t kh&aacute;ch du l\u1ecbch S&agrave;i G&ograve;n khi \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi&nbsp;<strong>\u0110\u1ea1i Quang Minh<\/strong>&nbsp;ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; nh\u1eefng s\u1ea1p v\u1ea3i cao ng\u1ea5t ng\u01b0\u1ee1ng c&ugrave;ng nhi\u1ec1u ch\u1ee7ng lo\u1ea1i v&agrave; r\u1ef1c r\u1ee1 s\u1eafc m&agrave;u. B\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 c\u1ea7n lo\u1ea1i v\u1ea3i n&agrave;o, ng\u01b0\u1eddi ta \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t&igrave;m th\u1ea5y t\u1ea1i khu ch\u1ee3 n&agrave;y. Ch&iacute;nh v&igrave; th\u1ebf m&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng kh&oacute; \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn ra kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng quen thu\u1ed9c c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c ti\u1ec7m v\u1ea3i ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; ch\u1ee7 c\u1eeda h&agrave;ng th\u1eddi trang t\u1ef1 may v&agrave; c&oacute; \u0111&ocirc;i khi l&agrave; nh\u1eefng nh&agrave; thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>N\u1ebfu tr&ecirc;n c&aacute;c shop b&aacute;n h&agrave;ng handmade, nh\u1eefng m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&aacute;n ra v\u1edbi gi&aacute; th&agrave;nh kh&aacute; cao th&igrave; b\u1ea1n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t\u1ef1 ra&nbsp;<strong>\u0110\u1ea1i Quang Minh<\/strong>&nbsp;truy l&ugrave;ng, ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd t&igrave;m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m&oacute;n \u0111\u1ed3 y h\u1ec7t ho\u1eb7c c&ograve;n \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o h\u01a1n v\u1edbi m\u1ee9c gi&aacute; r\u1ea5t h\u1ee3p l&yacute; \u0111\u1ea5y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9:&nbsp;<\/strong>Ch\u1ee3 \u0110\u1ea1i Quang Minh, 31 Ch&acirc;u V\u0103n Li&ecirc;m, ph\u01b0\u1eddng 14, Qu\u1eadn 5, H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Ch\u1ee3 \u0110\u1ea1i Quang Minh, qu\u1eadn 5\" src=\"https:\/\/toplist.vn\/images\/800px\/cho-dai-quang-minh-quan-5-79737.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>4. Ch\u1ee3 Kim Bi&ecirc;n<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>N\u1ebfu nh\u01b0 B&igrave;nh T&acirc;y chuy&ecirc;n v\u1ec1 c&aacute;c m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng b&aacute;ch h&oacute;a t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p, ch\u1ee3 An \u0110&ocirc;ng l&agrave; &ldquo;v\u1ef1a&rdquo; th\u1eddi trang, th&igrave;&nbsp;<strong>ch\u1ee3 Kim Bi&ecirc;n&nbsp;<\/strong>\u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t trung t&acirc;m nh\u1ecf ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i c&aacute;c m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng linh ki\u1ec7n, ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n, h&oacute;a ch\u1ea5t. Tuy c&oacute; quy m&ocirc; nh\u1ecf, nh\u01b0ng ch\u1ee3 v\u1eabn c&oacute; \u0111\u1ee7 c&aacute;c th\u1ec3 lo\u1ea1i ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n, nh\u1ea5t l&agrave; ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n l&agrave;m \u0111\u1eb9p cho ph&aacute;i n\u1eef nh\u01b0 trang s\u1ee9c t&oacute;c, m\u1eaft k&iacute;nh, \u0111\u1ed3 l\u01b0u ni\u1ec7m,&hellip; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y b&aacute;n v\u1edbi gi&aacute; s\u1ec9. \u0110\u1ed3 s\u1ec9 \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y kh&ocirc;ng ph\u1ea3i l&agrave; \u0111\u1ed3 c\u0169, \u0111\u1ed3 secondhand \u0111&acirc;u m&agrave; l&agrave; t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 chung cho c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n, v&ograve;ng nh\u1eabn trang s\u1ee9c.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>B&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh \u0111&oacute;, \u0111&acirc;y c&ograve;n l&agrave; thi&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i \u1ed1p l\u01b0ng \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i, k&iacute;nh m&aacute;t, t&uacute;i x&aacute;ch, g\u1ea5u b&ocirc;ng,&hellip; C\u0169ng nh\u01b0 \u1edf c&aacute;c ch\u1ee3 \u0111\u1ea7u m\u1ed1i kh&aacute;c, gi&aacute; c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y r\u1ebb \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd. Tuy nhi&ecirc;n, ti\u1ec3u th\u01b0\u01a1ng \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y v\u1eabn chu\u1ed9ng b&aacute;n s\u1ec9 h\u01a1n b&aacute;n l\u1ebb n&ecirc;n n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n c&oacute; nhu c\u1ea7u mua l\u1ebb th&igrave; gi&aacute; c\u1ea3 s\u1ebd cao h\u01a1n t&iacute; nh&eacute;, nh\u01b0ng t&iacute;nh ra th&igrave; v\u1eabn ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m ch&aacute;n so v\u1edbi mua t\u1ea1i c&aacute;c shop online b\u1ea1n nh\u1ec9!<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>&nbsp;\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9:&nbsp;<\/strong>V\u1ea1n T\u01b0\u1ee3ng, ph\u01b0\u1eddng 13, Qu\u1eadn 5, Tp. HCM<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Ch\u1ee3 Kim Bi\u00ean\" src=\"https:\/\/toplist.vn\/images\/800px\/cho-kim-bien-282263.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>5. Ch\u1ee3 da H&ograve;a H\u1ea3o<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>B\u1ea1n c&oacute; t\u1eebng ngh\u0129 \u0111\u1ebfn chuy\u1ec7n t\u1eadu cho m&igrave;nh m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc t&uacute;i da thu\u1ed9c handmade c\u1ef1c ch\u1ea5t ch\u01b0a? Hay b\u1ea1n c&ograve;n \u0111\u1eafn \u0111o v&igrave; \u0111\u1ed3 da thu\u1ed9c th\u01b0\u1eddng c&oacute; gi&aacute; th&agrave;nh r\u1ea5t cao? N\u1ebfu v\u1eady b\u1ea1n n&ecirc;n ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u1ebfn con \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng H&ograve;a H\u1ea3o - n\u01a1i b&agrave;y b&aacute;n \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 c&aacute;c nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u da, simili, nh\u1ef1a,&hellip; kh&ocirc;ng thi\u1ebfu b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 th\u1ee9 g&igrave; ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 cho nhu c\u1ea7u t\u1ef1 thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf m&oacute;n \u0111\u1ed3 da &ldquo;trong m\u01a1&rdquo; c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. C&oacute; hai khu \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea1n l&ugrave;ng mua \u0111\u1ed3 da l&agrave; ng&atilde; t\u01b0 H&ograve;a H\u1ea3o - L&yacute; Th\u01b0\u1eddng Ki\u1ec7t v&agrave; tr&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng &Acirc;u C\u01a1.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111i ngang qua th&ocirc;i l&agrave; c&oacute; th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y da thu\u1ed9c ho\u1eb7c da si \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cu\u1ed9n th&agrave;nh t\u1eebng cu\u1ed9n cao h\u01a1n \u0111\u1ea7u ng\u01b0\u1eddi, \u0111\u1ee7 m\u1ecdi m&agrave;u s\u1eafc, ch\u1ee7ng lo\u1ea1i kh&aacute;c nhau. \u0110\u1ed3 da \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y b&aacute;n theo \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb nia, 1 nia ch\u1ec9 c&oacute; gi&aacute; t\u1ea7m v&agrave;i ch\u1ee5c ng&agrave;n. Nh\u1eefng m\u1ea3nh v\u1ea3i v\u1ee5n c\u1ee7a da \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&aacute;n theo c&acirc;n v\u1edbi gi&aacute; r\u1ebb b&egrave;o, v&agrave; d&ugrave; b\u1ecb g\u1ecdi l&agrave; v\u1ee5n ch\u1ee9 \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eefng m\u1ea3nh da v\u1ee5n n&agrave;y l&agrave;m v&ograve;ng tay, d&acirc;y \u0111\u1ed3ng h\u1ed3 hay b&oacute;p v&igrave; th&igrave; d\u01b0 s\u1ee9c lu&ocirc;n \u0111\u1ea5y!<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9:&nbsp;<\/strong>H&ograve;a H\u1ea3o, ph\u01b0\u1eddng 7, Qu\u1eadn 10, H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Ch\u1ee3 da H\u00f2a H\u1ea3o\" src=\"https:\/\/toplist.vn\/images\/800px\/cho-da-hoa-hao-79732.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>6. Khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed1i di\u1ec7n \u0110\u1ea1i H\u1ecdc Ki\u1ebfn Tr&uacute;c<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>N\u1ebfu t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn tr&ecirc;n kia \u0111\u1ec1u khi\u1ebfn b\u1ea1n n\u1ea3n l&ograve;ng v&igrave; v\u1ecb tr&iacute; xa x&ocirc;i (h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft t\u1eadp trung \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c Q5), ho\u1eb7c b\u1ea1n kh&ocirc;ng c&oacute; nhu c\u1ea7u mua s\u1ec9 v\u1ec1 bu&ocirc;n b&aacute;n hay mua s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng nhi\u1ec1u, th&igrave; d&atilde;y c\u1eeda h&agrave;ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc c\u1ed5ng \u0110\u1ea1i H\u1ecdc Ki\u1ebfn Tr&uacute;c tr&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Nguy\u1ec5n \u0110&igrave;nh Chi\u1ec3u, qu\u1eadn 3 s\u1ebd kh&ocirc;ng l&agrave;m b\u1ea1n th\u1ea5t v\u1ecdng.<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>N\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng nh\u1ea5t ch\u1eafc l&agrave; ti\u1ec7m T&yacute; Ph\u01b0\u1edbc, b&agrave;y b&aacute;n \u0111\u1ee7 m\u1ecdi lo\u1ea1i v\u0103n ph&ograve;ng ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1ee7 cho b\u1ea1n v\u1ebd v\u1eddi, s&aacute;ng t\u1ea1o th\u1ecfa thu&ecirc;. T\u1eeb c\u1ecd v\u1ebd cho t\u1edbi b&uacute;t m&agrave;u, t\u1eadp s&aacute;ch, gi\u1ea5y b&igrave;a, t\u1edbi c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed1n s&aacute;ch t&ocirc; m&agrave;u th&uacute; v\u1ecb \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; \u0111\u1ee7. \u1ede \u0111&acirc;y bu&ocirc;n b&aacute;n r\u1ea5t tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i, b\u1ea1n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 v&agrave;o t\u1ef1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn r\u1ed3i \u0111em ra qu\u1ea7y t&iacute;nh ti\u1ec1n ch\u1ee9 ch\u1eb3ng b\u1ecb gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n hay b\u1ecb &ocirc;ng b&agrave; ch\u1ee7 &ldquo;l\u01b0\u1eddm ngu&yacute;t&rdquo; \u0111&acirc;u.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9:&nbsp;<\/strong>196 Pasteur, ph\u01b0\u1eddng 6, H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh, ph\u01b0\u1eddng 6 Qu\u1eadn 3 H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\u1ea2nh mjinh h\u1ecda\" src=\"https:\/\/toplist.vn\/images\/800px\/khu-vuc-doi-dien-dai-hoc-kien-truc-282265.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>7. Ch\u1ee3 b&agrave;n c\u1edd<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Ch\u1ee3 b&agrave;n c\u1edd&nbsp;<\/strong>t\u1eeb l&acirc;u \u0111&atilde; n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng \u1edf S&agrave;i G&ograve;n b\u1edfi b&agrave;y b&aacute;n \u0111a d\u1ea1ng c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n \u0111ang c&oacute; d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh kh\u1edfi nghi\u1ec7p kinh doanh qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o th&igrave; nh\u1edb gh&eacute; qua \u0111&acirc;y, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd t&igrave;m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th\u1ee9 hay ho \u0111\u1ea5y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Tuy khu v\u1ef1c b&agrave;y b&aacute;n kh&aacute; l&agrave; nh\u1ecf ch\u1ec9 v\u1edbi ba b\u1ed1n s\u1ea1p v\u1ea3i v&agrave; n\u1eb1m t\u1eadn trong c&ugrave;ng khu ch\u1ee3 nh\u01b0ng n\u01a1i \u0111&acirc;y v\u1eabn thu h&uacute;t kh&aacute; nhi\u1ec1u b\u1ea1n tr\u1ebb. V\u1ea3i \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y r\u1ea5t ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng, m\u1eabu m&atilde; th&igrave; \u0111\u1ed9c l\u1ea1 kh&ocirc;ng tr&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng khu kh&aacute;c n&ecirc;n y&ecirc;n t&acirc;m l&agrave; nh\u1eefng thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb tr&ugrave;ng l\u1eb7p h\u1ecda ti\u1ebft \u0111&acirc;u. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi b&aacute;n h&agrave;ng \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y r\u1ea5t vui t&iacute;nh, th\u01b0\u1eddng xuy&ecirc;n tr&ograve; chuy\u1ec7n v&agrave; t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec7t t&igrave;nh, nhi\u1ec1u khi b\u1ea1n d\u1ec5 qu&ecirc;n m\u1ea5t vi\u1ec7c l\u1ef1a \u0111\u1ed3 m&agrave; ng\u1ed3i t&aacute;m chuy\u1ec7n lu&ocirc;n v\u1edbi h\u1ecd \u0111\u1ea5y!<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9:<\/strong>&nbsp;H\u1ebbm 664 Nguy\u1ec5n \u0110&igrave;nh Chi\u1ec3u, Qu\u1eadn 3, ph\u01b0\u1eddng 3, qu\u1eadn 3<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Ch\u1ee3 b\u00e0n c\u1edd\" src=\"https:\/\/toplist.vn\/images\/800px\/cho-ban-co-79750.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>8. Ch\u1ee3 T&acirc;n \u0110\u1ecbnh<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Ch\u1ee3 T&acirc;n \u0110\u1ecbnh&nbsp;<\/strong>n\u1eb1m ngay tr&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Hai B&agrave; Tr\u01b0ng, qu\u1eadn 1 n&ecirc;n t\u1ea1o \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i cho nh\u1eefng b\u1ea1n l\u01b0\u1eddi di chuy\u1ec3n \u0111i xa. N\u01a1i \u0111&acirc;y b&agrave;y b&aacute;n r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u lo\u1ea1i v\u1ea3i \u0111\u1eb9p tuy gi&aacute; c&oacute; h\u01a1i m\u1eafc m\u1ed9t ch&uacute;t nh\u01b0ng ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1ea3i l\u1ea1i r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n c&oacute; &yacute; \u0111\u1ecbnh m\u1edf cho m&igrave;nh m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda h&agrave;ng kinh doanh \u0111\u1ed3 thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf, v&aacute;y \u0111\u1ea7m, &aacute;o d&agrave;i v\u1edbi ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao v&agrave; thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf sang ch\u1ea3nh th&igrave; \u0111\u1eebng b\u1ecf qua khu ch\u1ee3 n&agrave;y. V\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u s\u1ea1p h&agrave;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y b&aacute;n san s&aacute;t nhau n&ecirc;n gi&aacute; c\u1ea3 gi\u1eefa c&aacute;c s\u1ea1p \u0111\u1ec1u b\u1eb1ng nhau n&ecirc;n c\u1ee9 y&ecirc;n t&acirc;m \u0111i sai h&agrave;ng m&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb ch\u1eb7t ch&eacute;m. Tuy nhi&ecirc;n, b\u1ea1n v\u1eabn c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i trau d\u1ed3i &ldquo;t&agrave;i n\u0103ng m\u1eb7c c\u1ea3&rdquo; \u0111\u1ea5y, do gi&aacute; th&agrave;nh \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y cao m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch b\u1ea5t h\u1ee3p l&yacute;. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi b&aacute;n h&agrave;ng c\u0169ng r\u1ea5t d\u1ec5 ch\u1ecbu n&ecirc;n ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n b\u1ea1n vui v\u1ebb nhi\u1ec7t t&igrave;nh m\u1ed9t ch&uacute;t s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m gi&aacute; \u0111&aacute;ng k\u1ec3.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>V\u1ea3i v\u1ee5n \u1edf \u0111&acirc;y c\u0169ng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y b&aacute;n theo k&iacute;, v\u1edbi gi&aacute; th&agrave;nh kh&aacute; r\u1ebb, n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n may k\u1eb9p t&oacute;c, turban,&hellip; th&igrave; v\u1ea3i v\u1ee5n l&agrave; m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn kh&aacute; h\u1ee3p l&yacute; v&agrave; ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>\u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9:<\/strong>&nbsp;S\u1ed1 1 Nguy\u1ec5n H\u1eefu C\u1ea7u, P.T&acirc;n \u0110\u1ecbnh, Qu\u1eadn 1, TP.HCM<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Ch\u1ee3 T\u00e2n \u0110\u1ecbnh \u1edf Qu\u1eadn 1, TP. Soai Kinh Lam Cloth Market<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"margin-top:3px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><\/span>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Located on Tran Hung Dao Street (District 5, Ho Chi Minh City),&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;,&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">also known as&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;is widely known as the cheapest and oldest fabric retailing market in Saigon. .<\/font><\/font><br style=\"box-sizing:border-box\" \/>\r\n<br style=\"box-sizing:border-box\" \/>\r\n<strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">existed for a long time in Saigon and the market name is named after a shop on Chinese street.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">This is the cheapest famous market in Ho Chi Minh City.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Ho Chi Minh City with all kinds of rich fabrics and diverse colors, and become a favorite place for women when choosing apparel fabric.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">It is true that the fabric&#39;s paradise, stretching from the beginning to the end of the fabric road is everywhere, on the stalls that lie close together.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">The market is clearly subdivided: spandex fabric, khaki fabric, shirt fabric, long dress fabric, ... All colors, all materials and the smell of new aromatic fabric makes the nose become very bustling here. .<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul helvetica=\"\" neue=\"\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; Handmade or want to start up the garments.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Although the market is not large, the product is quite diverse, you can find many simple hot patterns today to hand sew a few cute shirts.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">So, this is also the address to get the favorite raw material source of handmade shops in Saigon.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px; vertical-align:inherit\">Due to the limited nature of domestic production, the accessories here are mainly imported from China to our country for wholesale and retail distribution to customers.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;is the towering fabric stall with many types and colorful.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Any kind of fabric can be found at this market.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Therefore, it is not difficult to recognize that the regular customers of the fabric shops are the owners of tailor-made fashion shops and sometimes famous designers.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px; Minh<\/font><\/font><\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box; font-weight:700\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Kim Bien Market<\/font><\/font><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><strong style=\"box-sizing:border-box; font-weight:700\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Kim Bien market<\/font><\/font><\/strong><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;is known as a small center distributing components, accessories and chemicals.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Despite its small size, the market still has all kinds of accessories, especially beauty accessories for women such as hair jewelry, glasses, souvenirs, ... are sold at wholesale prices.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Wholesale items here are not second-hand goods, but secondhand items that are just common for accessories, ring jewelry.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Besides, this is also a paradise for all kinds of phone cases, sunglasses, bags, teddy bears, etc. Just like in other wholesale markets, the prices of these items are surprisingly cheap.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">However, small traders here still prefer wholesale to retail, so if you need to buy retail, the price will be a bit higher, but calculated, it still saves bored compared to buying at online stores, huh!<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\"><strong helvetica=\"\" neue=\"\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; font-weight:700; color:#333333; font-family:\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Address:<\/font><\/font><\/strong><font helvetica=\"\" neue=\"\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; color:#333333; font-family:\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;Van Tuong, Ward 13, District 5, Tp.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">HCM<\/font><\/font><br style=\"box-sizing:border-box\" \/>\r\n<strong helvetica=\"\" neue=\"\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; font-weight:700; color:#333333; font-family:\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Price:<\/font><\/font><\/strong><font helvetica=\"\" neue=\"\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; color:#333333; font-family:\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;ranges from 5,000 VND<\/font><\/font><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"dsp_media\" style=\"padding:10px 10px 10px 0px; leather item.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">There are two areas where you can buy leather goods: Hoa Hao - Ly Thuong Kiet crossroads and Au Co street.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px; text-align:justify; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:14px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span helvetica=\"\" neue=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#f2f2f2\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">If all of the above options are frustrating because of the remote location (mostly concentrated in the Q5 area), or you don&#39;t have the need to buy wholesale or buy in bulk, then the range of stores In front of University of Architecture on Nguyen Dinh Chieu Street, District 3 will not make you disappointed.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br style=\"box-sizing:border-box\" \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px; text-align:justify; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:14px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span helvetica=\"\" neue=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#f2f2f2\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">The most famous is Ty Phuoc, which sells all kinds of stationery for you to draw and create.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">From brushes to crayons, books, covers, even interesting coloring books are all here.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Trading here is very comfortable, you can go to choose and then take out the counter, not limited or bosses &quot;glare&quot; where.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px; text-align:justify; EXHIBITION","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<h3 data-pf-type=\"Heading\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\">GI\u1edaI THI\u1ec6U CHUNG<\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>Sau s\u1ef1 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng SAIGONFABRIC 2023 (SUMMER), s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n VTG 2023 d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn thu h&uacute;t s\u1ef1 quan t&acirc;m \u0111&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3o c\u1ee7a h&agrave;ng ch\u1ee5c ng&agrave;n l\u01b0\u1ee3t kh&aacute;ch trong v&agrave; ngo&agrave;i n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ebfn tham quan, trao \u0111\u1ed5i kinh nghi\u1ec7m, nh\u1eefng c&aacute;i b\u1eaft tay, nh\u1eefng m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h&igrave;nh th&agrave;nh d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n t&igrave;nh h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb, \u0111&ocirc;i b&ecirc;n c&ugrave;ng c&oacute; l\u1ee3i.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/339163640_750089293226362_1397703144266971567_n.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\">VTG 2023 l&agrave; s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n th\u01b0\u1eddng ni&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, quy t\u1ee5 nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p trong n\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf c&oacute; n\u1ec1n c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p d\u1ec7t may ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n, l&agrave; c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i gi&uacute;p c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p d\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi m&aacute;y m&oacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb, ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 ti&ecirc;n ti\u1ebfn, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t t&igrave;m ki\u1ebfm \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c l&agrave;m \u0103n l&acirc;u d&agrave;i, t\u1ea1o c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i giao th\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1edbi c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nTrong th\u1eddi gian tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m, m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1t c&aacute;c h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o chia s\u1ebb ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng th&aacute;ch th\u1ee9c c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p cho c&aacute;c v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 v\u1ec1 th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i, d\u1ec7t may, b&ocirc;ng, s\u01a1 x\u1ee3i \u1edf Vi\u1ec7t Nam s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c di\u1ec5n ra. Chu\u1ed7i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o VTG n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed9c \u0111\u1ed1i tho\u1ea1i c&oacute; &yacute; ngh\u0129a v&agrave; cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng hi\u1ec3u bi\u1ebft c&oacute; gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb v\u1ec1 tri\u1ec3n v\u1ecdng ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n nhanh ch&oacute;ng c\u1ee7a th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nV\u1edbi s\u1ef1 tham gia \u0111&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3o c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb nhi\u1ec1u n\u01b0\u1edbc, VTG 2023 h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n mang l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t di\u1ec5n \u0111&agrave;n kinh doanh t\u1ed1t, t\u1ea1o c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i giao l\u01b0u, g\u1eb7p g\u1ee1 v&agrave; th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp gi\u1eefa c&aacute;c nh&agrave; cung c\u1ea5p v&agrave; c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p. Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m c\u0169ng l&agrave; c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i cho c&aacute;c c&aacute; nh&acirc;n c&oacute; nhu c\u1ea7u mua b&aacute;n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 trong ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may, th&ecirc;u, \u0111an v&agrave; nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"480\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/T%E1%BB%AB%2025102023%20%C4%91%E1%BA%BFn%2028102023%20Vi%E1%BB%87t%20Nam%2C%20H%E1%BB%93%20Ch%C3%AD%20Minh%2C%20SECC%20Gian%20h%C3%A0ng%20A%201007.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 data-pf-type=\"Heading\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\">VI\u1ec6T NAM - \u0110I\u1ec2M \u0110\u1ebeN TI\u1ebeP THEO C\u1ee6A NG&Agrave;NH D\u1ec6T MAY TH\u1ebe GI\u1edaI<\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\">Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111&oacute;ng m\u1ed9t vai tr&ograve; ng&agrave;y c&agrave;ng l\u1edbn trong chu\u1ed7i gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may c\u1ee7a th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi - s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m may m\u1eb7c c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u sang h\u01a1n 180 qu\u1ed1c gia v&agrave; v&ugrave;ng l&atilde;nh th\u1ed5. Vi\u1ec7t Nam c&oacute; m\u1ed9t t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai s&aacute;ng l\u1ea1n ph&iacute;a tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh trung t&acirc;m s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t h&agrave;ng d\u1ec7t may c\u1ee7a th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, v&agrave; c&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t h&agrave;ng may m\u1eb7c l\u1edbn \u0111ang ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c kh&aacute;m ph&aacute; c&aacute;c c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng v&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 data-pf-type=\"Heading\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\">L\u1ee2I &Iacute;CH C\u1ee6A C\u1ee6A \u0110\u01a0N V\u1eca THAM GIA TRI\u1ec2N L&Atilde;M<\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p data-pf-type=\"Paragraph2\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\">C&aacute;c \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb tham gia tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m D\u1ec7t may VTG 2023 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c quy\u1ec1n tham gia r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u c&aacute;c s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n v&agrave; c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i qu\u1ea3ng c&aacute;o. Ban t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c mong mu\u1ed1n v&agrave; t\u1ea1o \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 c&aacute;c \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb tham gia c&oacute; th\u1ec3 qu\u1ea3ng b&aacute; th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch t\u1ed1i \u0111a t\u1ea1i tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m, v&igrave; v\u1eady c&aacute;c \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb tham gia h&atilde;y t\u1eadn d\u1ee5ng m\u1ecdi c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i v&agrave; l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch m&agrave; ch\u01b0\u01a1ng tr&igrave;nh mang l\u1ea1i..<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li data-pf-type=\"Paragraph2\">Th&ocirc;ng tin \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb tham gia tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m, danh s&aacute;ch s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m v&agrave; th&ocirc;ng tin li&ecirc;n l\u1ea1c s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh b\u1edfi c&aacute;c \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb tham gia tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m v&agrave; hi\u1ec3n th\u1ecb tr&ecirc;n trang web \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 m\u1ee5c \u0111&iacute;ch tham kh\u1ea3o c\u1ee7a kh&aacute;ch tham quan.<\/li>\r\n\t<li data-pf-type=\"Paragraph2\">N\u0103m s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m cho kh&aacute;ch tham quan tham kh\u1ea3o s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng t\u1ea3i mi\u1ec5n ph&iacute; tr&ecirc;n website. C&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ti\u1ebfp theo s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t&iacute;nh ph&iacute; n\u1ebfu \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb tham gia tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m c&oacute; y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u.<\/li>\r\n\t<li data-pf-type=\"Paragraph2\">\u0110\u01a1n v\u1ecb tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng t\u1ea3i mi\u1ec5n ph&iacute; 01 th&ocirc;ng c&aacute;o b&aacute;o ch&iacute; tr&ecirc;n website c\u1ee7a Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m.<\/li>\r\n\t<li data-pf-type=\"Paragraph2\">Ban t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c cung c\u1ea5p th\u01b0 m\u1eddi mi\u1ec5n ph&iacute; cho c&aacute;c \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb tham gia tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m \u0111\u1ec3 m\u1eddi c&aacute;c nh&agrave; cung c\u1ea5p ho\u1eb7c kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng. Ban t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c b\u1ea3o l\u01b0u quy\u1ec1n ph&aacute;t h&agrave;nh s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng th\u01b0 m\u1eddi.<\/li>\r\n\t<li data-pf-type=\"Paragraph2\">Ban t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c s\u1ebd ph&aacute;t h&agrave;nh th\u01b0 m\u1eddi tham d\u1ef1 tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m \u0111\u1ec3 nh&agrave; tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m xin th\u1ecb th\u1ef1c theo y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u.<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p data-pf-type=\"Paragraph2\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><\/span><strong><span style=\"font-size: 14px;\">NG&Agrave;NH H&Agrave;NG TR\u01afNG B&Agrave;Y<\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>D\u1ec7t May<\/li>\r\n\t<li>May m\u1eb7c<\/li>\r\n\t<li>In \u1ea5n<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/339135768_576644527757089_3022644259593495673_n.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1eddi gian: t\u1eeb ng&agrave;y 25 -28\/10\/2023<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"550\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/secc.jpg\" width=\"1170\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m:&nbsp;Trung t&acirc;m Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m v&agrave; H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb S&agrave;i G&ograve;n (SECC) &ndash; 799 \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Linh, Qu\u1eadn 7, Tp. H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"2048\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/339071056_1866199150421115_5496609458999703767_n(1).jpg\" width=\"1536\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C\u1ea3m \u01a1n c&aacute;c b\u1ea1n \u0111ang theo d&otilde;i tin t\u1ee9c c\u1ee7a V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Bano&#39;k. H\u1eb9n g\u1eb7p m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi t\u1ea1i gian h&agrave;ng c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><strong>GENERAL INTRODUCTION<\/strong><br \/>\r\nAfter the success of SAIGONFABRIC 2023 (SUMMER), the VTG 2023 event is expected to attract the great attention of tens of thousands of domestic and foreign visitors to visit, exchange experiences, shake hands, and relationships. A cooperation system is formed based on friendship, and mutual benefit.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/339163640_750089293226362_1397703144266971567_n.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">The 20th Vietnam Int&#39;l Textile and Garment Machinery Exhibition (VTG) concurrent with Vietnam Int&#39;l Textile and Apparel Accessories Exhibition (VitaTex), Vietnam Int&#39;l Footwear Machinery and Material Industry Exhibition (VFM) and Vietnam Int&rsquo;l Dyeing and Chemical Industry Exhibition (DYECHEM); the four exhibitions jointly showcase a wide range of exhibits, covering the whole apparel industry supply chain from large to small scale textile and garment machinery and equipment, to all kinds of machine parts, fibers, fabrics, dyes, accessories, etc.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nSince 2001, VTG has been deeply involved in the local textile and garment industry, following the positive change of local enterprises more than 19 years, and bringing the groundbreaking technologies and leading machineries to the local market.<br \/>\r\nIn the past 5 years, the average annual growth of exhibition of scale is higher than 17%, which is the best reflection from exhibitors and visitors.<br \/>\r\nAfter the predicament of the epidemic, the textile &amp; garment industry in Vietnam still stand firm and have optimistic prospect, VTG is also ready to build the No.1 connection bridge between local and international in the post-epidemic era.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"480\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/T%E1%BB%AB%2025102023%20%C4%91%E1%BA%BFn%2028102023%20Vi%E1%BB%87t%20Nam%2C%20H%E1%BB%93%20Ch%C3%AD%20Minh%2C%20SECC%20Gian%20h%C3%A0ng%20A%201007.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><strong>WHY EXHIBIT IN VIETNAM?&nbsp;<\/strong><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ol>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b>The Next Destination of World Textile &amp; Garment<\/b><\/span><span style=\"font-size:16px;\">Vietnam plays an increasingly large role in the World&rsquo;s Textile &amp; Garment Value Chain - its garment products are exported to over 180 countries and territories. The country poised a bright future ahead of becoming the world&rsquo;s textile production center, and major garment makers are continuing to explore expansion and production opportunities in Vietnam.<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b>Vietnam, Ushering in Industry Prosperity<\/b><\/span><span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><br \/>\r\n\tAs the rushing tiger of the ASEAN, despite of COVID-19 pandemic in 2020-21, Vietnam is still confronting unprecedented investment trends, due to the support of the Vietnam government and the exclusive economic superiority. According to Vietnam Customs Department, the textile industry in Vietnam&#39;s third-largest source of export revenue, with a total export volume of about 29 billion US dollars, an increase of 8% compared to 2020 which means the vast, overwhelming and flourishing market is thriving of opportunities now, and VTG is the best platform to stay on top and connected to the market trend.<\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ol>\r\n\r\n<h3 data-pf-type=\"Heading\">EXHIBITOR BENEFITS&nbsp;<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>Exhibitors at VTG are entitled to numerous event and promotional opportunities. The organizer would like exhibitors to have the maximum branding exposure at the show, so please take advantage of any and all benefits.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Five Products Information for visitors&#39; reference will be uploaded to website for free. Additional product lists will be charged upon request.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>One Exhibitor Press Release will be uploaded to website for free. Additional Press Release will be charged upon request.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>The Organizer offers free invitation cards for exhibitors to invite their suppliers or clients. The Organizer reserves the right to the quantity of invitation cards.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>The Organizer issues invitation letter to exhibitors for applying visa upon request.<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<h3 data-pf-type=\"Heading\">EXHIBIT PROFILE<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>Textile<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Garment<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Printing<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/339135768_576644527757089_3022644259593495673_n.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:16px;\">Time: from October 25-28, 2023<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"550\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/secc.jpg\" width=\"1170\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:16px;\">Venue: &nbsp;Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center (SECC) &ndash; 799 Nguyen Van Linh Boulevard, District 7, City. Ho Chi Minh.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"2048\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/339071056_1866199150421115_5496609458999703767_n.jpg\" width=\"1536\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Thank you for reading our news. BB LOOP COTTON","tenbaiviet_en":"VNB\u2019S NEW PRODUCTS 2023 - ECO-FRIENDLY BIO-PLASTIC STRING FASTENERS - BB LOOP COTTON","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-a5fe49f5-7fff-31a6-1cd0-6a9f5c50dee0\">\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m t\u1eeb ngu\u1ed3n nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; an to&agrave;n cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, d&ograve;ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m BB Loop Cotton bao g\u1ed3m 4&nbsp;lo\u1ea1i l&agrave; BB Loop Cotton (Rice Resin) l&agrave;m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, BB Loop Cotton (Green PE) t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng m&iacute;a, BB Loop Cotton (Bio Coffee) l&agrave;m t\u1eeb b&atilde; c&agrave; ph&ecirc;, v&agrave; BB Loop Cotton l&agrave;m t\u1eeb nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u gi\u1ea5y Mapka Reborn. Ph\u1ea7n d&acirc;y l&agrave;m t\u1eeb ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u cotton h\u1eefu c\u01a1 tinh t\u1ebf v&agrave; an to&agrave;n, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p cho nhi\u1ec1u m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng may m\u1eb7c cao c\u1ea5p.<\/b><\/p>","mota_en":"<p><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-5a790c83-7fff-9d1b-a3ab-251454680a56\">Made from materials that are eco-friendly and safe for users, the BB Loop Cotton product line includes 3 types: BB Loop Cotton (Rice Resin) made from rice plastic, BB Loop Cotton (Green PE) from sugarcane, BB Loop Cotton (Bio Coffee), BB Loop Cotton (Mapka Reborn). The cord is made from delicate and safe organic cotton, suitable for many high-end garments.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-a5fe49f5-7fff-31a6-1cd0-6a9f5c50dee0\">\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m t\u1eeb ngu\u1ed3n nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; an to&agrave;n cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, d&ograve;ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m BB Loop Cotton bao g\u1ed3m 4&nbsp;lo\u1ea1i l&agrave; BB Loop Cotton (Rice Resin) l&agrave;m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, BB Loop Cotton (Green PE) t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng m&iacute;a, BB Loop Cotton (Bio Coffee) l&agrave;m t\u1eeb b&atilde; c&agrave; ph&ecirc;, v&agrave; BB Loop Cotton l&agrave;m t\u1eeb nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u gi\u1ea5y Mapka Reborn. Ph\u1ea7n d&acirc;y l&agrave;m t\u1eeb ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u cotton h\u1eefu c\u01a1 tinh t\u1ebf v&agrave; an to&agrave;n, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p cho nhi\u1ec1u m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng may m\u1eb7c cao c\u1ea5p.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/bb-loop-cotton-rice-resin\/?actilang=true\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-a5fe49f5-7fff-31a6-1cd0-6a9f5c50dee0\">BB LOOP COTTON (RICE RESIN)<\/b><\/a><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-a5fe49f5-7fff-31a6-1cd0-6a9f5c50dee0\">Ngu\u1ed3n nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m t\u1eeb nh\u1eefng lo\u1ea1i g\u1ea1o kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea1t chu\u1ea9n, g\u1ea1o c\u0169 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf th&agrave;nh ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, c&oacute; th\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u \u0111&aacute;ng k\u1ec3 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng CO2 \u0111\u1ebfn 25% khi s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-a5fe49f5-7fff-31a6-1cd0-6a9f5c50dee0\">Nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d&ugrave;ng l&agrave;m \u0111\u1ea7u kh&oacute;a cho d&acirc;y treo nh&atilde;n b\u1eb1ng nh\u1ef1a BB Loop Cotton, v\u1edbi \u0111\u1eb7c t&iacute;nh d\u1ebbo dai v&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb gi\u1ea3m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng trong \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n b&igrave;nh th\u01b0\u1eddng. C&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi k\u1ebft c\u1ea5u \u0111\u1ea7u kh&oacute;a ch\u1eb7t ch\u1ebd c&ugrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u kh&oacute;a bo tr&ograve;n kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y tr\u1ea7y x\u01b0\u1edbc b\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m, BB Loop Cotton (Rice Resin) l&agrave; s\u1ef1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p cho c&aacute;c nh&atilde;n h&agrave;ng cap c\u1ea5p, th\u1eadn thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i nhanh, \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn. VNB lu&ocirc;n s\u1eb5n s&agrave;ng h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 v\u1edbi gi&aacute; \u01b0u \u0111&atilde;i cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng mua s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u1edbn. Xem th&ecirc;m c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok t\u1ea1i: <a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/san-pham\">https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/san-pham<\/a><\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><b>Xem th&ecirc;m:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/thu-moi-tham-du-trien-lam-quoc-te-lan-thu-21-ve-may-moc-thiet-bi-cong-nghiep-nganh-det-may-2023\">TH\u01af M\u1edcI THAM D\u1ef0 TRI\u1ec2N L&Atilde;M QU\u1ed0C T\u1ebe L\u1ea6N TH\u1ee8 21 V\u1ec0 M&Aacute;Y M&Oacute;C THI\u1ebeT B\u1eca C&Ocirc;NG NGHI\u1ec6P NG&Agrave;NH D\u1ec6T MAY 2023<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/vtg-2023-trien-lam-quoc-te-nganh-det-may-tai-viet-nam-lan-thu-21\">VTG 2023 - TRI\u1ec2N L&Atilde;M QU\u1ed0C T\u1ebe NG&Agrave;NH D\u1ec6T MAY T\u1ea0I VI\u1ec6T NAM L\u1ea6N TH\u1ee8 2<\/a><\/li>\r\n\t<li><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/san-pham-moi-day-treo-chi-vp-fas-ito-loop-va-recycle-vp-fas-ito-loop\">S\u1ea2N PH\u1ea8M M\u1edaI - D&Acirc;Y TREO CH\u1ec8 VP FAS ITO LOOP V&Agrave; RECYCLE-VP FAS ITO LOOP<\/a><\/li>\r\n<\/ul>","noidung_en":"<p><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-5a790c83-7fff-9d1b-a3ab-251454680a56\">Made from materials that are eco-friendly and safe for users, the BB Loop Cotton product line includes 3 types: BB Loop Cotton (Rice Resin) made from rice plastic, BB Loop Cotton (Green PE) from sugarcane, BB Loop Cotton (Bio Coffee), BB Loop Cotton (Mapka Reborn). The cord is made from delicate and safe organic cotton, suitable for many high-end garments.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/en\/bb-loop-cotton-rice-resin\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-15a44d51-7fff-e1a8-1197-0629cc09484e\">BB LOOP COTTON (RICE RESIN)<\/b><\/a><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-15a44d51-7fff-e1a8-1197-0629cc09484e\">Rice plastic raw materials are made from substandard rice, old rice is recycled into rice plastic, which can significantly reduce CO2 by up to 25% during production.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-15a44d51-7fff-e1a8-1197-0629cc09484e\">Rice resin is used as the locking head for BB Loop Cotton string fastener, which are flexible and do not lose quality under normal conditions. Along with the tight lock structure and rounded lock head that does not scratch the product surface, BB Loop Cotton (Rice Resin) is a suitable choice for high-end, eco-friendly brands.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-15a44d51-7fff-e1a8-1197-0629cc09484e\">The head is made from eco-friendly Rice Resin helps to protect the environment<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b PE.<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>S\u1ee3i ch\u1ec9 m\u1ec1m v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u m&agrave;u s\u1eafc b\u1eaft m\u1eaft, l&agrave;m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt h\u01a1n cho s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m v&agrave; nh&atilde;n hi\u1ec7u.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Nhi\u1ec1u k&iacute;ch th\u01b0\u1edbc th&iacute;ch h\u1ee3p cho nhi\u1ec1u lo\u1ea1i s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee1 nh\u1ecf&nbsp;\u0111\u1ebfn c\u1ee1 l\u1edbn.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi s&uacute;ng b\u1eafn nh&atilde;n<a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/fas-banok-101\"><strong>&nbsp;Fas Bano&#39;k 101<\/strong><\/a>.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ki\u1ec3m tra l\u1ea1i v\u1ec1 h&igrave;nh th\u1ee9c, \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ee9a BAVIA khi xu\u1ea5t x\u01b0\u1edfng.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>V&igrave; m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn cho c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p trong Li&ecirc;n minh ch&acirc;u &Acirc;u n&oacute;i chung v&agrave; B\u1eafc &Acirc;u n&oacute;i ri&ecirc;ng, Hi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecbnh Th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i T\u1ef1 do EU-Vi\u1ec7t Nam (EVFTA) \u0111&oacute;ng vai tr&ograve; quan tr\u1ecdng trong c&ocirc;ng cu\u1ed9c n&agrave;y.<br \/>\r\nTrong b\u1ed1i c\u1ea3nh kinh t\u1ebf to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u \u0111ang c&ograve;n nhi\u1ec1u b\u1ea5t \u1ed5n nh\u01b0 hi\u1ec7n nay, th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i \u0111&atilde; gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m b\u1edbt c&aacute;c t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng ti&ecirc;u c\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ebfn n\u1ec1n kinh t\u1ebf, \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi \u0111em l\u1ea1i nhi\u1ec1u k\u1ef3 v\u1ecdng h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 l&acirc;u d&agrave;i gi\u1eefa \u0111&ocirc;i b&ecirc;n.<br \/>\r\nK\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi EVFTA c&oacute; hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c v&agrave;o ng&agrave;y 1\/8\/2020, Vi\u1ec7t Nam c\u1ef1c k&igrave; \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh c&ocirc;ng cu\u1ed9c xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u. Trong giai \u0111o\u1ea1n 2020 \u0111\u1ebfn 2022, l\u01b0\u1ee3ng xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam sang th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc B\u1eafc &Acirc;u t\u0103ng tr\u01b0\u1eddng 14,7%\/n\u0103m.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Modern%20Promotion%20Business%20Agency%20LinkedIn%20Post.png\" width=\"1200\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\nTuy nhi&ecirc;n, vi\u1ec7c thi\u1ebfu c&aacute;c \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng bay th\u1eb3ng c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 ch\u01b0a c&oacute; s\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c gi\u1eefa c&aacute;c c\u1ea3ng bi\u1ec3n, s&acirc;n bay Vi\u1ec7t Nam v&agrave; c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc ch&acirc;u &Acirc;u \u0111ang c\u1ea3n tr\u1edf m\u1ed1i giao th\u01b0\u01a1ng n&agrave;y. T\u1eeb \u0111&oacute; d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ebfn doanh thu v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ee9c d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn do c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u h&agrave;ng h&oacute;a c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam th&ocirc;ng qua c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc kh&aacute;c nh\u01b0 \u0110\u1ee9c, B\u1ec9, H&agrave; Lan, Ph&aacute;p v&agrave; Ba Lan.<br \/>\r\nNh\u01b0ng v\u1edbi s\u1ee9c h&uacute;t t\u1eeb EVTFA, nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111ang c&oacute; k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch chuy\u1ec3n d\u1ecbch v\u1ec1 Vi\u1ec7t Nam nh\u1eafm t\u1ed1i \u01b0u h&oacute;a nh\u1eefng quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i m&agrave; EVTFA mang l\u1ea1i khi xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u sang ch&acirc;u &Acirc;u.<br \/>\r\nT\u1eeb \u0111&oacute; s\u1ea3n sinh s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng nhu c\u1ea7u xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u t\u0103ng cao, y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p c\u0169ng c\u1ea7n t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng hi\u1ec7u xu\u1ea5t gia c&ocirc;ng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u01b0ng \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi c\u0169ng ph\u1ea3i ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m chi ph&iacute; s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nh&acirc;n v&agrave; l\u1ef1c trong t&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh kinh t\u1ebf b\u1ea5t \u1ed5n hi\u1ec7n nay. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc t&igrave;nh th\u1ebf \u0111&oacute; th&igrave; c&aacute;c thi\u1ebft t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng h&oacute;a s\u1ebd t\u1ed1i \u01b0u nh\u1eefng v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 m&agrave; c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111ang m\u1eafc ph\u1ea3i. V\u1edbi Plastic Staple Fastener SystemST9500, c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p, c&ocirc;ng x\u01b0\u1edfng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o, trang ph\u1ee5c c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t\u1ed1i \u01b0u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eefng v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 \u0111&atilde; n&oacute;i \u1edf tr&ecirc;n.<br \/>\r\n\u01afu \u0111i\u1ec3m v\u01b0\u1ee3t tr\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a ST9500:+ C&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh t\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ed9 c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 s\u1ed1 l\u1ea7n ghim th\u1ebb b&agrave;i, nh&atilde;n m&aacute;c m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng.<br \/>\r\n+ S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ngu\u1ed3n \u0111i\u1ec7n 120V ho\u1eb7c 220V.<br \/>\r\n+ Linh ho\u1ea1t \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh kho\u1ea3ng c&aacute;ch gi\u1eef 2 kim, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p nhi\u1ec1u lo\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ea1n thang.<br \/>\r\n+ Ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng v&agrave; d&acirc;y chuy\u1ec1n ghim th\u1ebb b&agrave;i, nh&atilde;n m&aacute;c t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng.<br \/>\r\n+ Gi&uacute;p ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m th\u1eddi gian.<br \/>\r\n+ Gi\u1ea3m ti\u1ec1n thu&ecirc; nh&acirc;n c&ocirc;ng.<br \/>\r\n+ Chi\u1ebfm di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch nh\u1ecf.<br \/>\r\n+ M\u1ed7i cu\u1ed9n \u0111\u1ea1n l&ecirc;n t\u1edbi 25,000 l\u1ea7n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"450\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/1620377372_b577f9d7d3a726f97fb6.jpg\" width=\"601\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>Vietnam is currently emerging as an attractive destination for businesses in the European Union in general and Northern Europe in particular, the EU-Vietnam Free Trade Agreement (EVFTA) plays an important role at this time.<br \/>\r\nAmid global economic uncertainties, the trade deal has helped to reduce negative impacts on the economy, and at the same time brought high expectations for effective long-term cooperation between the two sides.<br \/>\r\nSince the EVFTA took effect on August 1, 2020, Vietnam has greatly stepped up &quot;on-spot export&quot;. In the period from 2020 to 2022, Vietnam&#39;s export volume to the Northern European markets increased by 14.7% per year.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Modern%20Promotion%20Business%20Agency%20LinkedIn%20Post(1).png\" width=\"1200\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\nHowever, the lack of direct flights as well as the lack of cooperation between Vietnam&#39;s seaports and airports and European countries are hindering this trade. As a result, revenue has not yet reached the expected level because countries import Vietnam&#39;s goods through other countries such as Germany, Belgium, the Netherlands, France and Poland.<br \/>\r\nBut with the attraction from EVTFA, many businesses are planning to move to Vietnam to optimize the benefits that EVTFA brings when exporting to Europe.<br \/>\r\nThis has resulted in an increase in export demand, requiring businesses to increase production efficiency but at the same time save on human resource costs in the current unstable economic situation. In that situation, automation devices will optimize the problems that businesses are facing. With the Plastic Staple Fastener SystemST9500, businesses and clothing factories can optimize the aforementioned problems.<br \/>\r\nOutstanding advantages of ST9500:<br \/>\r\n+ Can adjust the speed as well as the number of times to pin cards and labels automatically.<br \/>\r\n+ Use 120V or 220V power supply.<br \/>\r\n+ Flexible adjustment of the distance between 2 needles, suitable for many types of bullets.<br \/>\r\n+ Suitable for system development and automatic tag and label pinning line.<br \/>\r\n+ Saves time.<br \/>\r\n+ Reduce labor costs.<br \/>\r\n+ Occupy small area.<br \/>\r\n+ Each ammo roll is up to 25,000 uses.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"487\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/1620377372_b577f9d7d3a726f97fb6.jpg\" width=\"650\" S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m dao mu\u1ed7ng n\u0129a t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf&nbsp;c\u1ee7a V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok v\u1edbi quy tr&igrave;nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i nghi&ecirc;m ng\u1eb7t lu&ocirc;n \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">B\u1ed9 dao mu\u1ed7ng n\u0129a l&agrave;m t\u1eeb b&atilde; c&agrave; ph&ecirc;<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"600\" src=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/datafiles\/1661324747_DSC_0500.JPG\" width=\"600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Hi\u1ec7n nay, c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m t\u1eeb b&atilde; c&agrave; ph&ecirc; r\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u01b0a chu\u1ed9ng b\u1edfi s\u1ef1 an to&agrave;n v&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y h\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ebfn m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng. S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m dao mu\u1ed7ng n\u0129a l&agrave;m t\u1eeb b&atilde; c&agrave; ph&ecirc; c\u1ee7a V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok v\u1edbi quy tr&igrave;nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i nghi&ecirc;m ng\u1eb7t lu&ocirc;n \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">V\u1edbi nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1eb7c t&iacute;nh \u01b0u vi\u1ec7t nh\u01b0:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m b\u1eb1ng ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a v&agrave; b&atilde; c&agrave; ph&ecirc;, t&aacute;i s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nhi\u1ec1u l\u1ea7n, kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng x\u1ea5u \u0111\u1ebfn m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng xung quanh.<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Th\u1eddi gian s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng kh&ocirc;ng gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n.<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n, tinh t\u1ebf ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p cho gian b\u1ebfp gia \u0111&igrave;nh, nh\u1eefng bu\u1ed5i d&atilde; ngo\u1ea1i, &hellip;<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">\u0110\u1ed9 ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t mang l\u1ea1i c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, c\u1ea7m n\u1eafm kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb c\u1ea5n tay nh\u1edd c&aacute;c g&oacute;c \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bo tr&ograve;n trong qu&aacute; id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t\t\t<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\r\n\t\t\t<p dir=\"ltr\"><b
