id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">B\u1ed9 dao mu\u1ed7ng n\u0129a l&agrave;m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"600\" src=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/datafiles\/1679284774_DSC_0047.JPG\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o l&agrave; lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trong l&ograve;ng \u0111\u1ea5t, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1eeb ngu\u1ed3n g\u1ea1o c\u0169, g\u1ea1o kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea1t ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng. S\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u l\u01b0\u1ee3ng r&aacute;c th\u1ea3i nh\u1ef1a m&agrave; c&ograve;n g&oacute;p ph\u1ea7n gi\u1ea3m t\u1edbi 25% l\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&iacute; CO2 th\u1ea3i ra m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ngu\u1ed3n g\u1ea1o d\u1ed3i d&agrave;o t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u lo\u1ea1i s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf, trong \u0111&oacute; c&oacute; b\u1ed9 dao mu\u1ed7ng n\u0129a th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.&nbsp;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">\u01afu \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ee7a b\u1ed9 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m b\u1eb1ng ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a v&agrave; g\u1ea1o b\u1ec3, t&aacute;i s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nhi\u1ec1u l\u1ea7n, kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng x\u1ea5u \u0111\u1ebfn m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng xung quanh.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Th\u1eddi gian s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng kh&ocirc;ng gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n, tinh t\u1ebf ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p cho gian b\u1ebfp gia \u0111&igrave;nh, nh\u1eefng bu\u1ed5i d&atilde; ngo\u1ea1i, &hellip;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">\u0110\u1ed9 ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n t\u1ed1t mang l\u1ea1i c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, c\u1ea7m n\u1eafm kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb c\u1ea5n tay nh\u1edd c&aacute;c g&oacute;c \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bo tr&ograve;n trong qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Chi ti\u1ebft s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<table>\r\n\t<colgroup>\r\n\t\t<col width=\"242\" \/>\r\n\t\t<col width=\"359\" \/>\r\n\t<\/colgroup>\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\r\n\t\t\t<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">T&ecirc;n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t\t\t<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\r\n\t\t\t<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">B\u1ed9 dao mu\u1ed7ng n\u0129a<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t\t\t<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\r\n\t\t\t<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-79740e4e-7fff-bcf1-c022-1a33affdab72\">Ph&acirc;n not harmful to the environment. Products made from coffee grounds of Van Van Banok with strict production and distribution process always ensure the best quality.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">With outstanding features such as:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<li><b>Made of plastic and coffee grounds, reused many times, does not adversely affect the surrounding environment.<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Unlimited use time.<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Good finish provides a comfortable feeling to use, the grip does not need to be handled thanks to the corners that have been rounded during the manufacturing process.<\/b><\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Product id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Cutlery set made from rice resin<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"600\" src=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/datafiles\/1679284774_DSC_0047.JPG\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>Cutlery set made from rice resin<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Rice plastic is a bio-plastic that can be decomposed in the ground, produced from old rice, rice that does not meet quality standards. Producing recycled products from rice plastic not only helps to reduce plastic waste but also contributes to reducing CO2 emissions by up to 25% into the environment.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Van Nang Banok uses abundant rice resources in Vietnam, promoting the production of a variety of recycled products, including environmentally friendly cutlery sets.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Advantages of the cutlery set:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Made of plastic material and broken rice, reused many times, does not adversely affect the surrounding environment.<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Unlimited use time.<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Simple, sophisticated design suitable for family kitchens, picnics, ...<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">The good finish makes it comfortable to use, the grip does not need to be handled thanks to the corners that have been rounded during the manufacturing process.<\/b><\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Product underground environment and are safe for users.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-b54b1dea-7fff-28ab-52f6-a28153decc3a\">Van Van Banok manufactures knives and forks made from S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng m&iacute;a hay nh\u1ef1a t\u1eeb tinh b\u1ed9t c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cho xu h\u01b0\u1edbng ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng hi\u1ec7n nay.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>","mota_en":"<p>Bioplastic products of Van Nang Banok always meet the quality criteria in Vietnam. Products from rice plastic, cane tar, or starch can meet the current trend of consuming environmentally friendly products.<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok lu&ocirc;n \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng c&aacute;c ti&ecirc;u ch&iacute; v\u1ec1 ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam. S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng m&iacute;a hay nh\u1ef1a t\u1eeb tinh b\u1ed9t c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cho xu h\u01b0\u1edbng ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng hi\u1ec7n nay.&nbsp;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc l&agrave; g&igrave;?<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<div dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc (Bioplastic) l&agrave; lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1eeb c&aacute;c nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u c&oacute; s\u1eb5n trong t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n nh\u01b0 <a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/green-pe\">\u0111\u01b0\u1eddng m&iacute;a<\/a>, <a href=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/rice-resin\">nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o<\/a>, b\u1ed9t m&igrave;, ch\u1ea5t b&eacute;o, th\u1ef1c v\u1eadt,...Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc c&oacute; nhi\u1ec1u lo\u1ea1i c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y t\u1ed1t trong m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n n&ecirc;n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 g&oacute;p ph\u1ea7n gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u l\u01b0\u1ee3ng r&aacute;c th\u1ea3i nh\u1ef1a th\u1ea3i ra m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/b><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div dir=\"ltr\">\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"3 lo\u1ea1i NH\u1ef0A TH\u00c2N THI\u1ec6N v\u1edbi m\u00f4i tr\u01b0\u1eddng &amp; \u1ee8NG D\u1ee4NG trong s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m\" height=\"457\" src=\"https:\/\/aneco.com.vn\/wp-content\/uploads\/bao-ve-trai-dat-xanh.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u l\u01b0\u1ee3ng r&aacute;c th\u1ea3i nh\u1ef1a th\u1ea3i ra m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng (Ngu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;aneco.com.vn)<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Ph&acirc;n lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc kh&ocirc;ng ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y sinh h\u1ecdc<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">L&agrave; lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1eeb c&aacute;c nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u c&oacute; ngu\u1ed3n g\u1ed1c t&aacute;i t\u1ea1o. V&iacute; d\u1ee5, \u0111&oacute; c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a th&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y nh\u01b0 PP, PS, PE nh\u01b0ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t b\u1eb1ng c&aacute;ch l&ecirc;n men tinh b\u1ed9t t\u1eeb ng&ocirc;, khoai, s\u1eafn,...<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"4 \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u01b0a bi\u1ebft v\u1ec1 nh\u1ef1a ph\u00e2n h\u1ee7y sinh h\u1ecdc PLA [C\u1ea9m nang]\" height=\"448\" src=\"https:\/\/aneco.com.vn\/wp-content\/uploads\/hat-nhua-phan-huy-sinh-hoc-PLA.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>H\u1ea1t nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc (Ngu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;aneco.com.vn)<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y sinh h\u1ecdc<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y sinh h\u1ecdc l&agrave; lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y th&agrave;nh CO2, H20 v&agrave; m&ugrave;n trong m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng c&oacute; vi sinh v\u1eadt.&nbsp;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">M\u1ed9t v&agrave;i lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn nh\u01b0:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a PLA: \u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea5u t\u1ea1o t\u1eeb nhi\u1ec1u chu\u1ed7i polylactic acid. N&oacute; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea1o ra b\u1eb1ng qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh l&ecirc;n men tinh b\u1ed9t ng&ocirc; v\u1edbi x&uacute;c t&aacute;c l&agrave; vi khu\u1ea9n. C&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a n&agrave;y c&oacute; \u0111\u1eb7c t&iacute;nh l&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9 c\u1ee9ng, \u0111\u1ed9 b\u1ec1n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9 \u0111&agrave;n h\u1ed3i cao. Nh\u1edd v\u1eady m&agrave; PLA \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn trong vi\u1ec7c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t c&aacute;c h\u1ed9p \u0111\u1ef1ng, th&igrave;a nh\u1ef1a,&hellip; v&agrave; m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m y t\u1ebf.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a PHA: \u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1eeb c&aacute;c vi khu\u1ea9n v&agrave; m&ocirc; th\u1ef1c v\u1eadt bi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed5i gen. PHA c\u0169ng l&agrave; lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng nhi\u1ec1u trong c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m, c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m y t\u1ebf.<\/b>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">L\u1ee3i &iacute;ch khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Gi\u1ea3m l\u01b0\u1ee3ng r&aacute;c th\u1ea3i nh\u1ef1a<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc d&ugrave; c&oacute; ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hay kh&ocirc;ng th&igrave; v\u1eabn g&oacute;p ph\u1ea7n gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u l\u01b0\u1ee3ng r&aacute;c th\u1ea3i nh\u1ef1a th\u1ea3i ra s&ocirc;ng, bi\u1ec3n. V&igrave; quy tr&igrave;nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t l&agrave; m\u1ed9t v&ograve;ng tr&ograve;n tu\u1ea7n ho&agrave;n, kh&ocirc;ng khai th&aacute;c t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n m\u1edbi m&agrave; s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nh\u1eefng nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u th\u1ef1c v\u1eadt ngo&agrave;i t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n n&ecirc;n r\u1ea5t th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Theo NatureWorks, m\u1ed9t c&ocirc;ng ty chuy&ecirc;n s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc t\u1ea1i M\u1ef9 cho bi\u1ebft, s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc s\u1ebd ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m 2\/3 n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng so v\u1edbi s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u1ef1a th&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng. T\u1eeb \u0111&oacute; gi&uacute;p ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m \u0111&aacute;ng k\u1ec3 c&aacute;c ngu\u1ed3n n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng h&oacute;a th\u1ea1ch \u0111ang c\u1ea1n ki\u1ec7t d\u1ea7n.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y nhanh ch&oacute;ng<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc n\u1ebfu c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y s\u1ebd ch\u1ec9 m\u1ea5t t\u1eeb v&agrave;i tu\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ebfn v&agrave;i th&aacute;ng, h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf nh\u1eefng ch\u1ea5t th\u1ea3i nh\u1ef1a kh&oacute; ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y g&acirc;y &ocirc; nhi\u1ec5m m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">An to&agrave;n cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nghi&ecirc;n c\u1ee9u cho th\u1ea5y, c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y nh\u01b0 PLA, PHA kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ed9c h\u1ea1i, c&oacute; th\u1ec3 d&ugrave;ng l&agrave; bao b&igrave; \u0111\u1ef1ng th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Xu h\u01b0\u1edbng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc 2023<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Hi\u1ec7n nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc chi\u1ebfm ch\u01b0a \u0111\u1ebfn 1% t\u1ed5ng s\u1ea3n l\u01b0\u1ee3ng nh\u1ef1a c\u1ee7a th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, nh\u01b0ng nhu c\u1ea7u to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn t\u0103ng nhanh. Theo Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc ch&acirc;u &Acirc;u, n\u0103ng l\u1ef1c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u v&agrave;o n\u0103m 2022 \u0111\u1ea1t 2,21 tri\u1ec7u t\u1ea5n, t\u0103ng 24% so v\u1edbi n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Con s\u1ed1 n&agrave;y d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn t\u0103ng g\u1ea7n g\u1ea5p 3 l&ecirc;n 6,29 tri\u1ec7u t\u1ea5n v&agrave;o n\u0103m 2027. H&atilde;ng nghi&ecirc;n c\u1ee9u th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng Zion \u01b0\u1edbc t&iacute;nh gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u s\u1ebd t\u0103ng t\u1eeb 12 t\u1ef7 USD hi\u1ec7n nay l&ecirc;n 29 t\u1ef7 USD v&agrave;o n\u0103m 2028. T&ugrave;y thu\u1ed9c v&agrave;o t\u1eebng lo\u1ea1i, nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc trung b&igrave;nh \u0111\u1eaft h\u01a1n t\u1eeb 50% \u0111\u1ebfn 5 l\u1ea7n so v\u1edbi nh\u1ef1a c&oacute; ngu\u1ed3n g\u1ed1c h&oacute;a d\u1ea7u.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">T\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, xu h\u01b0\u1edbng ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc n&oacute;i ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng n&oacute;i chung c&oacute; xu h\u01b0\u1edbng t\u0103ng m\u1ea1nh. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t trong b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn gi\u1edbi tr\u1ebb, h\u1ecd ng&agrave;y c&agrave;ng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nhi\u1ec1u c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i c\u1ed1c gi\u1ea5y, \u1ed1ng h&uacute;t t\u1eeb b\u1ed9t g\u1ea1o, t&uacute;i gi\u1ea5y v&agrave; nh\u1eefng m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc. D\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn, xu h\u01b0\u1edbng n&agrave;y s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd trong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m t\u1edbi.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"449\" src=\"https:\/\/lh5.googleusercontent.com\/kU4dPvbIt1guc5H4bGdB6wRAN1KNuwBjjak0sDOQxzDlprAsRXRgR5fv_lFX5jnCAcgul8FXuFmWbMcARixFQeuyWxUAi0tkvdCq9PUyXraquNjpBvZiRwuffN0tRDj3oILiln8u8QosPiL96HhNZXA\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>Xu h\u01b0\u1edbng t\u0103ng tr\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc theo Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc Ch&acirc;u &Acirc;u (2021)<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok l&agrave; \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb chuy&ecirc;n s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam. Nh\u1eefng n\u0103m g\u1ea7n \u0111&acirc;y, V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok \u0111ang \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao, \u0111i\u1ec3n h&igrave;nh l&agrave; c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc nh\u01b0 nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, nh\u1ef1a Green PE v\u1edbi ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ch&acirc;m &ldquo;H&agrave;ng Vi\u1ec7t Nam ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n&rdquo;.&nbsp;<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Tham kh\u1ea3o c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"600\" src=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/datafiles\/1663034539_Rice-resin-PC-8-4.JPG\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>Rice Resin Plastic Clip No.8<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">B\u1ed9 dao mu\u1ed7ng n\u0129a<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">K\u1eb9p nh\u1ef1a<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">M&oacute;c treo<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">M&oacute;c<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">N&uacute;t &aacute;o<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Nh\u1ef1a Green PE:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"650\" src=\"https:\/\/vannang-banok.com\/datafiles\/1640675090_QPHOOK10PE-4.JPG\" width=\"650\" \/>\r\n<figcaption>QP Hook 10 Green PE<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li role=\"presentation\"><b>M&oacute;c treo<\/b><\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">N&uacute;t &aacute;o<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-0bfbb146-7fff-7496-6446-84345a86fa87\">Tham kh\u1ea3o th&ecirc;m&nbsp;s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m&nbsp;t\u1ea1i:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b>Alibaba:&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/vannangbanok.trustpass.alibaba.com\/company_profile.html?spm=a2700.supplier_search.0.0.57ad348f2ZxDfV\">https:\/\/vannangbanok.trustpass.alibaba.com\/company_profile.html?spm=a2700.supplier_search.0.0.57ad348f2ZxDfV<\/a><\/b><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Bioplastic products of Van Nang Banok always meet the quality criteria in Vietnam. Products from rice plastic, cane tar or starch can meet the current trend of consuming environmentally friendly products.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">What is bioplastic?<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Bioplastic is a type of plastic produced from materials available in nature such as cane sugar, rice resin, wheat flour, fat, plants, etc. Bioplastic has many types of degradable good in the natural environment, so it can contribute to reducing the amount of plastic waste released into the environment.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Classification of bioplastics<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Bioplastics are not biodegradable<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">It is a type of plastic manufactured from renewable materials. For example, common non-biodegradable plastics such as PP, PS, PE but are produced by fermenting starch from corn, potatoes, cassava, etc.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Biodegradable plastic<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Biodegradable plastic is a type of plastic that can be decomposed into CO2, H20 and humus in the environment with microorganisms.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Some common types of bioplastics are:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">PLA plastic: This is a plastic composed of many chains of polylactic acid. It is made by fermenting corn starch with a bacterial catalyst. These resins are characterized by high hardness, strength and elasticity. As a result, PLA is widely used in the production of plastic containers, spoons, etc. and some medical products.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">PHA resin: This is a plastic produced from genetically modified bacteria and plant tissues. PHA is also a type of plastic that is widely used in food packaging products and medical products.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Benefits of using bioplastic products<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Reduce plastic waste<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Bioplastics, whether compostable or not, still contribute to reducing the amount of plastic waste discharged into rivers and seas. Because the production process is a cyclical circle, not exploiting new resources but using natural plant materials, so it is very environmentally friendly.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Energy saving<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">According to NatureWorks, a company specializing in the production of bioplastics in the US, producing bioplastics will save two-thirds of the energy compared to producing conventional plastics. From there, it helps to significantly save fossil energy sources that are depleting.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Decomposes quickly<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Bioplastics, if they can be decomposed, will only take a few weeks to a few months, limiting the difficult-to-decompose plastic waste that pollutes the environment.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Safety for the user<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Research shows that biodegradable bioplastics such as PLA and PHA are non-toxic and can be used as food packaging.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Trends in production and consumption of products from bioplastics 2023<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Bioplastics currently account for less than 1% of the world&#39;s total plastic production, but global demand is expected to grow rapidly. According to the European Bioplastics Association, global production capacity in 2022 will reach 2.21 million tons, up 24% year-on-year. This figure is expected to nearly triple to 6.29 million tons by 2027. Market research firm Zion estimates the global bioplastics market value will grow from $12 billion today to $29 billion by next year. 2028. Depending on the type, bioplastics are on average 50% to 5 times more expensive than petrochemical-derived plastics.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">In Vietnam, the trend of consuming bioplastic products in particular and environmentally friendly products in general tends to increase sharply. Especially among young people, they increasingly use paper cups, rice straws, paper bags and bio-plastic products. It is expected that this trend will continue to grow strongly for many years to come.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2 dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">High-quality products from Van Nang Banok&#39;s bio-plastics<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Van Nang Banok is a unit specializing in the production and distribution of garment accessories in Vietnam. In recent years, Van Nang Banok has been promoting the production of high-quality recycled products, typically products from bioplastics such as rice plastic, Green PE plastic with the motto &quot;Japanese quality Vietnamese goods&quot; &quot;.<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Refer to Van Nang Banok&#39;s rice-based products:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Knife and fork set<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Plastic clamp<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Hangers<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Hooks<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Shirt button<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Green PE Plastic:<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Hangers<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\" dir=\"ltr\">\r\n\t<p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><b id=\"docs-internal-guid-9965a92b-7fff-2562-b210-1b5dd6efa573\">Shirt button<\/b><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"xu-huong-su-dung-cac-san-pham-nhua-sinh-hoc-2023","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"31","icon":"1692609745_Beige-Neutral-Interior-Design-Landing-Page-Desktop-Prototype.png","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1692609751","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"1417","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Xu h\u01b0\u1edbng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c\u00e1c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc 2023","seo_title_en":"Trends of using bioplastic products 2023","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc","seo_keywords_en":"bioplastic","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok lu\u00f4n \u0111\u00e1p \u1ee9ng c\u00e1c ti\u00eau ch\u00ed v\u1ec1 ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam. S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a g\u1ea1o, nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng m\u00eda hay nh\u1ef1a t\u1eeb tinh b\u1ed9t c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 \u0111\u00e1p \u1ee9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cho xu h\u01b0\u1edbng ti\u00eau d\u00f9ng nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th\u00e2n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m\u00f4i tr\u01b0\u1eddng hi\u1ec7n nay.\u00a0","seo_description_en":"Bioplastic products of Van Nang Banok always meet the quality criteria in Vietnam. Products from rice plastic, cane tar, or starch can meet the current trend of consuming environmentally friendly products.","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},"342":{"id":"342","id_user":"1","id_parent":"8","tenbaiviet_vi":"XU H\u01af\u1edaNG \u0110A D\u1ea0NG H\u00d3A V\u00c0 S\u1ed0 HO\u00c1 NGU\u1ed2N CUNG PH\u1ee4 LI\u1ec6U CHO NG\u00c0NH D\u1ec6T MAY T\u1ea0I VI\u1ec6T NAM","tenbaiviet_en":"TREND OF DIVERSE SUPPLY OF MATERIALS FOR TEXTILE AND GARMENT INDUSTRY IN VIETNAM 2023","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><meta charset=\"utf-8\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div aria-label=\"\u0110\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh kinh t\u1ebf tu\u1ea7n ho\u00e0n ng\u00e0nh d\u1ec7t may - Nh\u1ecbp s\u1ed1ng kinh t\u1ebf Vi\u1ec7t Nam &amp; Th\u1ebf  gi\u1edbi \u1ea3nh widget\" contenteditable=\"false\" role=\"region\" tabindex=\"-1\">&nbsp;<\/div>","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<h2><b>T&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh ngu\u1ed3n cung ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam hi\u1ec7n nay<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>H&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh may m\u1eb7c t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111ang c&oacute; xu h\u01b0\u1edbng gi\u1ea3m, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 l&agrave; t\u1eeb cu\u1ed1i n\u0103m 2022. Nguy&ecirc;n nh&acirc;n b&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh nh\u01b0 c\u1ea7u mua h&agrave;ng c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u, v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 v\u1ec1 ngu\u1ed3n cung nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u c\u0169ng l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng nguy&ecirc;n nh&acirc;n g&acirc;y c\u1ea3n tr\u1edf cho ng&agrave;nh may m\u1eb7c t\u1ea1i Nam hi\u1ec7n nay.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\u0110\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh kinh t\u1ebf tu\u1ea7n ho\u00e0n ng\u00e0nh d\u1ec7t may - Nh\u1ecbp s\u1ed1ng kinh t\u1ebf Vi\u1ec7t Nam &amp; Th\u1ebf  gi\u1edbi\" src=\"https:\/\/media.vneconomy.vn\/w800\/images\/upload\/2022\/09\/12\/det-may-1656320743-8927-1656320869-860x0.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><em>T&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh ngu\u1ed3n cung ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam hi\u1ec7n nay. Ngu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;vneconomy.vn<\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Theo nghi&ecirc;n c\u1ee9u, TS Ph\u1ea1m V\u0103n Vi\u1ec7t &ndash; T\u1ed5ng gi&aacute;m \u0111\u1ed1c C&ocirc;ng ty TNHH Vi\u1ec7t Th\u1eafng Jean cho bi\u1ebft: T&igrave;nh tr\u1ea1ng \u0111\u1ee9t g&atilde;y chu\u1ed7i cung \u1ee9ng, ch\u1ee7 ngh\u0129a b\u1ea3o h\u1ed9 gia t\u0103ng, xu h\u01b0\u1edbng mua h&agrave;ng c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c nh&agrave; nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u may m\u1eb7c l\u1edbn tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi nh\u01b0 M\u1ef9, ch&acirc;u &Acirc;u, Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111ang thay \u0111\u1ed5i, h\u1ecd \u01b0u ti&ecirc;n l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn chu\u1ed7i cung \u1ee9ng c&oacute; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u c&ocirc;ng \u0111o\u1ea1n, t\u1eadp trung t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m. Nh\u01b0ng t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, c&aacute;c chu\u1ed7i s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; cung \u1ee9ng c&ograve;n r\u1eddi r\u1ea1c, ch\u01b0a th\u1ed1ng nh\u1ea5t n&ecirc;n vi\u1ec7c nh\u1eadp h&agrave;ng tr\u1edf n&ecirc;n kh&aacute; kh&oacute; kh\u0103n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2><b>N&ecirc;n t&igrave;m nh&agrave; cung \u1ee9ng ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n&agrave;o?<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h3><b>\u0110a d\u1ea1ng h&oacute;a ngu\u1ed3n cung \u1ee9ng<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t trong n\u01b0\u1edbc, vi\u1ec7c &ldquo;\u0110a d\u1ea1ng h&oacute;a ngu\u1ed3n cung v&agrave; \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ed5i s\u1ed1 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c coi l&agrave; ch&igrave;a kh&oacute;a \u0111\u1ec3 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng chu\u1ed7i cung \u1ee9ng th&ocirc;ng minh v&agrave; b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng&rdquo;- &ocirc;ng Ph\u1ea1m V\u0103n Vi\u1ec7t nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Vi\u1ec7t Nam hi\u1ec7n nay c&ograve;n ph\u1ee5 thu\u1ed9c nhi\u1ec1u v\u1ec1 nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 cho may m\u1eb7c. Do \u0111&oacute;, c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p Vi\u1ec7t Nam c\u1ea7n \u0111a d\u1ea1ng nhi\u1ec1u ngu\u1ed3n cung kh&aacute;c nhau \u0111\u1ec3 c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng cho nh\u01b0 c\u1ea7u s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; ti&ecirc;u th\u1ee5 h&agrave;ng ho&aacute;. T\u1ea1i V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok, ngo&agrave;i nh\u1eefng nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eadp t\u1eeb n\u01b0\u1edbc ngo&agrave;i nh\u01b0 Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, Malaysia, Indonesia, Brazil,... v\u1edbi r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u hi\u1ebfm g\u1eb7p, c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng cho nh\u1eefng nh\u01b0 c\u1ea7u hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i v&agrave; xu h\u01b0\u1edbng m\u1edbi.<b> <\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3><b>Chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ed5i giao d\u1ecbch sang h&igrave;nh th\u1ee9c online<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>Vi\u1ec7c chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ed5i giao d\u1ecbch sang h&igrave;nh th\u1ee9c online l&agrave; m\u1ed9t xu h\u01b0\u1edbng m\u1edbi \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi doanh nghi\u1ec7p SME nh\u1edd vi\u1ec7c gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u chi ph&iacute;, r&uacute;t ng\u1eafn quy tr&igrave;nh v&agrave; d\u1ec5 d&agrave;ng ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn v\u1edbi kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng tr&ecirc;n ph\u1ea1m vi to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u. Hi\u1ec7n nay, trang web c\u1ee7a Alibaba \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem l&agrave; k&ecirc;nh mua b&aacute;n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ti&ecirc;u bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ed1i \u01b0u h&oacute;a ngu\u1ed3n cung.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ch\u0103m s&oacute;c kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng khi giao d\u1ecbch tr&ecirc;n c&aacute;c s&agrave;n th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u0169ng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c n&acirc;ng cao v\u1ec1 ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng. Tr&ecirc;n Alibaba, b\u1ea1n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng ch&iacute;nh s&aacute;ch \u0111\u1ed5i\/tr\u1ea3 h&agrave;ng, theo d&otilde;i \u0111\u01a1n h&agrave;ng, g\u1ee3i &yacute; c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ti&ecirc;u bi\u1ec3u v&agrave; c&aacute;c \u0111&aacute;nh gi&aacute; ch&iacute;nh x&aacute;c gi&uacute;p kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng y&ecirc;n t&acirc;m h\u01a1n khi mua h&agrave;ng.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3><b>T&igrave;m ki\u1ebfm m\u1ed9t nh&agrave; cung \u1ee9ng b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng<\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u c&aacute;c chi ph&iacute; v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n, c&aacute;c nh&agrave; m&aacute;y s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t th\u1eddi trang c\u1ea7n t&igrave;m ki\u1ebfm m\u1ed9t nh&agrave; cung \u1ee9ng v\u1edbi c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng \u0111o\u1ea1n t\u1eeb nh\u1eadp nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u, ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn, ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i c&oacute; t&iacute;nh li&ecirc;n k\u1ebft ch\u1eb7t ch\u1ebd v\u1ec1 quy tr&igrave;nh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m. Ngo&agrave;i ra, nh&agrave; cung \u1ee9ng b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng c&ograve;n c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng c&aacute;c ti&ecirc;u ch&iacute; v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m an to&agrave;n v\u1edbi ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&ugrave;ng, th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>T\u1ea1i V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok, c&ocirc;ng ty c&oacute; th\u1ec3 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng m\u1ed9t chu\u1ed7i s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; cung \u1ee9ng \u0111\u1ebfn kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch c&oacute; h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng tr&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ecba b&agrave;n th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh v&agrave; B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng. Qua \u0111&oacute;, doanh nghi\u1ec7p kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed1i \u0111a chi ph&iacute; so v\u1edbi nh\u1eadp h&agrave;ng t\u1eeb nhi\u1ec1u n\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh giao d\u1ecbch c\u0169ng di\u1ec5n ra nhanh ch&oacute;ng h\u01a1n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2><b>Ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng cho ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf, th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng<\/b><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>Ng&agrave;nh h&agrave;ng may m\u1eb7c l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng&agrave;nh c&oacute; l\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&iacute; th\u1ea3i g&acirc;y &ocirc; nhi\u1ec5m m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng l\u1edbn, c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft ph\u1ea3i gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u l\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&iacute; th\u1ea3i n&agrave;y b\u1eb1ng c&aacute;c ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf ho\u1eb7c th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng. \u0110&aacute;p \u1ee9ng nhu c\u1ea7u \u0111&oacute;, c&ocirc;ng ty V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok hi\u1ec7n nay \u0111ang \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh nh\u1eefng m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng n&agrave;y, c&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi t&iacute;nh b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng trong quy tr&igrave;nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n s\u1ebd l&agrave; \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c \u0111&aacute;ng tin c\u1eady cho nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p trong n\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; n\u01b0\u1edbc ngo&agrave;i.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"V\u1eadt li\u1ec7u t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf l\u00e0 g\u00ec? C\u00f3 nh\u1eefng lo\u1ea1i v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf n\u00e0o?\" src=\"https:\/\/vietnamtaiche.com.vn\/wp-content\/uploads\/2021\/10\/vat-lieu-tai-che-la-gi-1-600x381.png\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><em>Ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng cho ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf, th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Ngu\u1ed3n:<b>&nbsp;<\/b>vietnamtaiche.com.vn<\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th&agrave;nh l\u1eadp t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam t\u1eeb n\u0103m 2014, t\u1ef1 h&agrave;o l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb chuy&ecirc;n s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; ph&acirc;n ph\u1ed1i nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u may m\u1eb7c v\u1edbi m\u1eabu m&atilde; \u0111a d\u1ea1ng, ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u t\u1ed1t v&agrave; th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Theo d&otilde;i c&aacute;c b&agrave;i vi\u1ebft tr&ecirc;n website \u0111\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft th&ecirc;m nhi\u1ec1u th&ocirc;ng tin chi ti\u1ebft nh&eacute;.<\/p>","noidung_en":"<h2><span class=\"marker\"><\/span>Potential for recycled, environmentally friendly materials<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p><span class=\"marker\">The production and export figure of the garment industry in Vietnam is on a downward trend, especially from the end of 2022. The reason is besides the demand for goods as well as for export, the problem of the supply of raw materials and accessories as well. is one of the reasons hindering the garment industry in the South today.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span class=\"marker\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\u0110\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh kinh t\u1ebf tu\u1ea7n ho\u00e0n ng\u00e0nh d\u1ec7t may - Nh\u1ecbp s\u1ed1ng kinh t\u1ebf Vi\u1ec7t Nam &amp; Th\u1ebf  gi\u1edbi\" src=\"https:\/\/media.vneconomy.vn\/w800\/images\/upload\/2022\/09\/12\/det-may-1656320743-8927-1656320869-860x0.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><em>Potential for recycled, environmentally friendly materials. Source:&nbsp;vneconomy.vn<\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span class=\"marker\">According to the research, Dr. Pham Van Viet - General Director of Viet Thang Jean Co., Ltd. said: Supply chain disruption, increased protectionism, buying trends of major garment importers in the world. The world such as the US, Europe, and Japan is changing, they prefer to choose a supply chain capable of producing many stages, concentrated in one location. But in Vietnam, the production and supply chains are still fragmented and inconsistent, so importing goods becomes quite difficult.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h2>How should I find a supplier of garment accessories?<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<h3>Supply diversification<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>In order to boost domestic production, &quot;Diversification of supply and application of digital transformation is considered the key to building a smart and sustainable supply chain&quot;, emphasized Mr. Pham Van Viet.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Vietnam is still heavily dependent on raw materials for garment production. Therefore, Vietnamese enterprises need to diversify many different supply sources to be able to meet the demand for production and consumption of goods. At Van Van Banok, in addition to materials imported from abroad such as Japan, Malaysia, Indonesia, Brazil, ... with many rare materials, it can meet current needs and trends. new.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>Convert transactions to online form<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>The transformation of transactions to the online form is a new trend for SMEs thanks to the reduction of costs, shortening the process and easy access to customers on a global scale. Currently, Alibaba&#39;s website is considered a typical product purchase and sale channel to optimize supply.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Customer care service when transacting on e-commerce platforms will also be improved in quality. On Alibaba, you can build an exchange\/return policy, track orders, recommend typical products, and provide accurate reviews to help customers feel more secure in their purchases.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>Looking for a sustainable supplier<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>In order to minimize transportation costs, fashion factories need to find a supplier whose stages from raw material import, processing, and distribution are closely linked in terms of processes and locations. In addition, sustainable suppliers also need to ensure that products are safe for users and environmentally friendly.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>At Van Nang Banok, the company can systematically build a chain of production and supply to customers in Ho Chi Minh City and Binh Duong. Thereby, businesses and customers can save maximum costs compared to importing goods from many countries and the transaction process is also faster.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>Potential for recycled, environmentally friendly materials<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>The garment industry is one of the industries with large emissions of environmental pollution, it is necessary to reduce these emissions with recycled or environmentally friendly materials. To meet that demand, Van Nang Banok company is now promoting these products, along with the sustainability in the production and transportation process, will be a reliable partner for many domestic and international and foreign businesses.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"V\u1eadt li\u1ec7u t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf l\u00e0 g\u00ec? C\u00f3 nh\u1eefng lo\u1ea1i v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf n\u00e0o?\" src=\"https:\/\/vietnamtaiche.com.vn\/wp-content\/uploads\/2021\/10\/vat-lieu-tai-che-la-gi-1-600x381.png\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><em>Potential for recycled, environmentally friendly materials.&nbsp;Source:&nbsp;vneconomy.vn<\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Van Nang Banok was established in Vietnam in 2014, proud to be one of the units specializing in the production and distribution of garment materials with diverse designs, good materials and environmental friendliness. Follow the articles on the website for more details.<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"xu-huong-da-dang-hoa-va-so-hoa-nguon-cung-phu-lieu-cho-nganh-det-may-tai-viet-nam","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"30","icon":"1691053001_May-mac-anh-web.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691054481","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"5203","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"XU nghi\u1ec7m, nh\u1eefng c&aacute;i b\u1eaft tay, nh\u1eefng m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h&igrave;nh th&agrave;nh d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n t&igrave;nh h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb, great attention of tens of thousands of domestic and foreign visitors to visit, exchange experiences, shake hands, and cooperate relationships are formed based on friendship and mutual benefits.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"357\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/133(1).jpg\" width=\"672\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Highlights of the exhibition<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>The largest textile and garment industry exhibition in Vietnam since the 1990s.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>The exhibition has a scale of more than 35,000 square meters. with 10 exhibition halls.<\/li>\r\n\t<li>More than 1050 suppliers from 24 countries and regions in the world specifically: Belgium, Cambodia, China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, Korea, Macau, Malaysia, Pakistan, Singapore, Spain, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, Netherlands, Turkey, United Kingdom, United States, Vietnam have participated to introduce textile equipment and materials to Vietnam<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Exhibition visitors: about 30,000 visitors<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Symposium to help businesses update new economic and technical trends<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Sweepstakes with m&iacute;a,<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">v\u1ecf tr\u1ea5u, g\u1ea1o, nh\u1ef1a gi\u1ea5y v&agrave; nh\u1ef1a ph&acirc;n hu\u1ef7.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng nhu c\u1ea7u <\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n m&agrave; c&ograve;n g&oacute;p ph\u1ea7n gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng ti&ecirc;u c\u1ef1c l&ecirc;n m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Ch&uacute;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ebf t\u1ea1o t\u1eeb c&aacute;c ngu\u1ed3n t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf, gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ch\u1ea5t th\u1ea3i kh&ocirc;ng c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft v&agrave; t\u1ed1i \u01b0u h&oacute;a vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">K\u1eb9p &aacute;o, m&oacute;c &aacute;o v&agrave; m&oacute;c treo c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i c&oacute; thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf s&aacute;ng t\u1ea1o v&agrave; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. B\u1eb1ng c&aacute;ch s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c&aacute;c ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n v&agrave; t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf, ch&uacute;ng c&oacute; \u0111\u1ed9 b\u1ec1n cao, ch\u1ed1ng tr\u1ea7y x\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; <\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">ki\u1ec3u d&aacute;n hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">\u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t, b\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c mua c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i, b\u1ea1n \u0111ang th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;p v&agrave;o vi\u1ec7c b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i cam k\u1ebft duy tr&igrave; ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng v&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng x\u1ea5u \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ec7 sinh th&aacute;i.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">H&atilde;y tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m s\u1ef1 kh&aacute;c bi\u1ec7t v\u1edbi c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i. h\u01a1n cho h&agrave;nh tinh n&agrave;y.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"145\" Using recycled materials is not only good for the environment, but it also gives our brand a positive image, showing that we are committed to making sustainable choices for a better future.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>We thank our loyal customers for supporting us in our mission toward a greener planet.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"629\" m\u1edbi. C&ocirc;ng ty<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;HUARI VIET NAM <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;s\u1ebd cung c\u1ea5p nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u cho c&ocirc;ng ty<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;VAN NANG BANOK<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;\u0111\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m h&agrave;ng ng&agrave;y. \u0110i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y gi&uacute;p t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ee9c m\u1ea1nh c\u1ea1nh tranh c\u1ee7a hai c&ocirc;ng ty v&agrave; t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng, mang l\u1ea1i l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch cho c\u1ea3 hai b&ecirc;n.<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">S\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c gi\u1eefa hai c&ocirc;ng ty n&agrave;y c&ograve;n t\u1ea1o ra c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ec3 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1edbi theo h\u01b0\u1edbng b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; t&ocirc;n tr\u1ecdng s\u1ef1 s\u1ed1ng. C\u1ea3 hai c&ocirc;ng ty \u0111\u1ec1u quan t&acirc;m \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ed9 bi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed5i kh&iacute; h\u1eadu v&agrave; \u0111ang n\u1ed7 l\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 sinh th&aacute;i v&agrave; quan tr\u1ecdng h\u01a1n l&agrave; cho m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng ta.<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">V&igrave; v\u1eady, s\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c n&agrave;y t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c, mang l\u1ea1i l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi - t\u1eeb doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ebfn kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng cu\u1ed1i c&ugrave;ng.<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"531\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/leaflet%20Rice%20Resin_page-0001.jpg\" width=\"800\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"333\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/251853154_111820194638571_4845994570621224996_n.jpg\" width=\"800\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">In recent years, bioplastics companies have become a popular choice for customers who are concerned about protecting the environment and minimizing the impact of plastics on the ecosystem. This creates a growing demand for companies that produce eco-friendly products to provide their customers with products made from bioplastics.<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">With those benefits, two companies Van&nbsp;Nang&nbsp;Banok&nbsp;and Huari&nbsp;Viet Nam&nbsp;decided to cooperate with each other on a new project. Huari&nbsp;Viet NAM&nbsp;will provide materials for <span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">Van&nbsp;Nang&nbsp;Banok<\/span><\/span>&nbsp;to produce daily products. This enhances the competitive strength of the two companies and creates a sustainable solution that benefits both sides.<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">The cooperation between these two companies also creates opportunities to develop new products in the direction of protecting the environment and respecting life. Both companies are concerned with the pace of climate change and are working to minimize the impact of their products on ecosystems and, more importantly, on our natural environment.<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">So this partnership creates a strategic partnership that benefits everyone - from the business to the end customer.<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"531\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/leaflet%20Rice%20Resin_page-0001.jpg\" width=\"800\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"333\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/251853154_111820194638571_4845994570621224996_n.jpg\" width=\"800\" SaigonTex \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf c\u1ee7a UFI.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; ngo&agrave;i n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ebfn tham quan, trao \u0111\u1ed5i kinh nghi\u1ec7m, nh\u1eefng c&aacute;i b\u1eaft tay, nh\u1eefng m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h&igrave;nh th&agrave;nh d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n t&igrave;nh h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb, \u0111&ocirc;i b&ecirc;n c&ugrave;ng c&oacute; l\u1ee3i.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; 799 Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Linh, qu\u1eadn 7, th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; v\u1ecb gh&eacute; th\u0103m gian h&agrave;ng c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i - Van Nang Banok : S\u1ea3nh B&nbsp; 2D-12<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div contenteditable=\"false\" tabindex=\"-1\">\r\n<p data-widget=\"image\" style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"451\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/saigontex.jpg\" width=\"800\" \/><\/p>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p><span contenteditable=\"false\" tabindex=\"-1\"><img alt=\"\" data-widget=\"image\" height=\"375\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/z3595227895737_87ca97c30968c09298d2712360d78ffb.jpg\" style=\"float:left\" width=\"550\" \/><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span contenteditable=\"false\" tabindex=\"-1\"><img alt=\"\" data-widget=\"image\" height=\"375\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/z4149147808828_c5b9ea08b8235051508d9ef4b32711d4(1).jpg\" style=\"float:right\" width=\"550\" \/><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span contenteditable=\"false\" tabindex=\"-1\"><img alt=\"\" data-widget=\"image\" height=\"375\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/298100683_118258584291446_506661216482083133_n%20(1)(2).jpg\" style=\"float:left\" width=\"550\" \/><\/span><span contenteditable=\"false\" tabindex=\"-1\"><img alt=\"\" data-widget=\"image\" height=\"375\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/hall%2017%20-%20Van%20Nang%20BANOK%202D-12_page-0003(1).jpg\" style=\"float:right\" width=\"550\" \/><\/span><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-right:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:7.5000pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">DON&#39;T MISS THE BIGGEST INTERNATIONAL EVENT OF THE TEXTILE INDUSTRY FIRST OF 2023<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-right:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:7.5000pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">SaigonTex &ndash; Vietnam Textile and Garment Industry Exhibition is the largest and most influential event of the Vietnamese textile and garment industry. The exhibition is held concurrently with SaigonFabric &ndash; Vietnam Textile and Garment Materials Fair.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-right:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:7.5000pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">After the success of SaigonTex 2022, The event has attracted the great attention of tens of thousands of domestic and foreign visitors to visit, exchange experiences, shake hands, and cooperate relationships formed based on friendship, and couples. mutually beneficial.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-right:0.0000pt; (GRS) cho c&ocirc;ng ty TNHH Van Nang Banok.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin-top:5.0000pt; margin-bottom:6.3000pt; margin-left:0.6000pt; s\u1ef1 qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; c\u1ee7a Textile Exchange.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span 0.6pt;\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">On October 20, 2022, Intertek Company officially granted the Global Recycling Standard (GRS) certificate to Van Nang Banok Co., Ltd.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 5pt; margin-bottom: 6.3pt; margin-left: 0.6pt;\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">The Global Recycle Standard (GRS) was developed by Control Union Certifications in 2008. Three years later, the standard was transferred to the management of the Textile Exchange.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin-top: 5pt; margin-bottom: 6.3pt; margin-left: 0.6pt;\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">This is an international product standard that specifies requirements for environmentally friendly practices such as recycled ingredients, restriction of chemicals, etc. The purpose of the GRS standard is to certify ingredients. Recycling. of products and production activities are responsible for environmental protection for manufacturing companies and enterprises.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"2071\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/0001.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"chung-nhan-grs-\u2013-global-recycle-standard","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"24","icon":"1667377460_grs_large.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1667352817","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"3727","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn GRS \u2013 Global Recycle Standard","seo_title_en":"GRS certification - Global Recycled Standard","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"Ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn GRS \u2013 Global Recycle Standard","seo_keywords_en":"GRS certification - Global Recycled Standard","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"Ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn GRS \u2013 Global Recycle Standard","seo_description_en":"GRS certification - Global Recycled Standard","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},"315":{"id":"315","id_user":"1","id_parent":"8","tenbaiviet_vi":"INDO INTERTEX 2023","tenbaiviet_en":"INDO INTERTEX 2023","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p><span contenteditable=\"false\" tabindex=\"-1\"><img alt=\"\" data-widget=\"image\" height=\"567\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Inatex2023-web-banner-03-A_(1).jpg\" width=\"1267\" \/><\/span><\/p>","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-left:0.0000pt;
