th\u1ec3, sau 3\/4 ch\u1eb7ng \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a n\u0103m 2019, Hoa K\u1ef3 v\u1eabn l&agrave; th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u h&agrave;ng d\u1ec7t may l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t t\u1eeb Vi\u1ec7t Nam v\u1edbi tr\u1ecb gi&aacute; \u0111\u1ea1t 11,21 t\u1ec9 \u0111&ocirc; la, t\u0103ng 8,7% so v\u1edbi c&ugrave;ng k\u1ef3 n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; chi\u1ebfm 45,5% t\u1ed5ng kim ng\u1ea1ch xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u h&agrave;ng d\u1ec7t may c\u1ee7a c\u1ea3 n\u01b0\u1edbc.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111&atilde; ti&ecirc;u th\u1ee5 2,91 t\u1ec9 \u0111&ocirc; la, t\u0103ng 4,2%; th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng EU (28 n\u01b0\u1edbc) l&agrave; 3,22 t\u1ec9 \u0111&ocirc; la, t\u0103ng 4,6%; H&agrave;n Qu\u1ed1c ti&ecirc;u th\u1ee5 2,6 t\u1ec9 \u0111&ocirc; la, t\u0103ng 10,5%; hay Trung Qu\u1ed1c 1,18 t\u1ec9 \u0111&ocirc; la, t\u0103ng 10%...<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Theo Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam (Vitas), ngo&agrave;i c&aacute;c m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng d\u1ec7t may truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng th&igrave; hai n\u0103m qua Vi\u1ec7t Nam c\u0169ng t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u nh\u1eefng m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng c&oacute; gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb gia t\u0103ng cao nh\u01b0 v\u1ea3i, x\u01a1 s\u1ee3i, v\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ecba k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt, ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u d\u1ec7t may&hellip;&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0a Vi\u1ec7t Nam tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh qu\u1ed1c gia xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u d\u1ec7t may l\u1edbn th\u1ee9 3 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi v&agrave; d\u1ef1 b&aacute;o k\u1ebft th&uacute;c n\u0103m nay c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea1t m\u1ed1c 40 t\u1ec9 \u0111&ocirc; la, m\u1ed9t con s\u1ed1 k\u1ef7 l\u1ee5c.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><a data-fancybox-group=\"img-lightbox\" href=\"https:\/\/cdn.tuoitre.vn\/2019\/11\/9\/photo-1-15733060933241772630914.jpg\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"Doanh nghi\u1ec7p cung c\u1ea5p m\u00e1y m\u00f3c, thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb cho ng\u00e0nh d\u1ec7t may \u0111\u00e1nh gi\u00e1 Vi\u1ec7t Nam l\u00e0 th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng l\u1edbn, c\u00f3 l\u1ee3i th\u1ebf v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u01b0ng c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi c\u00f4ng ngh\u1ec7.\"><img alt=\"D\u1ec7t may \u0111\u00f3n c\u00f4ng ngh\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ec3 t\u0103ng t\u1ed1c - \u1ea2nh 2.\" data-original=\"https:\/\/cdn.tuoitre.vn\/2019\/11\/9\/photo-1-15733060933241772630914.jpg\" h=\"533\" id=\"img_b3e0c770-02f4-11ea-93a4-11ea49e45789\" photoid=\"b3e0c770-02f4-11ea-93a4-11ea49e45789\" rel=\"lightbox\" src=\"https:\/\/cdn.tuoitre.vn\/thumb_w\/586\/2019\/11\/9\/photo-1-15733060933241772630914.jpg\" title=\"D\u1ec7t may \u0111\u00f3n c\u00f4ng ngh\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ec3 t\u0103ng t\u1ed1c - \u1ea2nh 2.\" type=\"photo\" w=\"800\" \/><\/a><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p data-placeholder=\"[nh\u1eadp ch\u00fa th\u00edch]\">Doanh nghi\u1ec7p cung c\u1ea5p m&aacute;y m&oacute;c, thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb cho ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may \u0111&aacute;nh gi&aacute; Vi\u1ec7t Nam l&agrave; th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng l\u1edbn, c&oacute; l\u1ee3i th\u1ebf v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u01b0ng c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Nh\u1edd d&acirc;n s\u1ed1 l\u1edbn v\u1edbi kho\u1ea3ng 95 tri\u1ec7u ng\u01b0\u1eddi v&agrave; v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111\u1ecba l&yacute; g\u1ea7n g\u0169i v\u1edbi n\u1ec1n kinh t\u1ebf l\u1edbn th\u1ee9 hai th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, Vi\u1ec7t Nam t\u1eeb l&acirc;u l&agrave; m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ty d\u1ec7t may mu\u1ed1n t&igrave;m ki\u1ebfm chi ph&iacute; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t th\u1ea5p v&agrave; l\u1ef1c l\u01b0\u1ee3ng lao \u0111\u1ed9ng tr\u1ebb.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C\u01a1 h\u1ed9i xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh n&agrave;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1edbi ph&acirc;n t&iacute;ch \u0111&aacute;nh gi&aacute; c&ograve;n nhi\u1ec1u ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng nh\u1edd Vi\u1ec7t Nam tham gia nhi\u1ec1u hi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecbnh th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i t\u1ef1 do (FTA), c&oacute; l\u1ee3i th\u1ebf v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, v&agrave; \u0111&aacute;ng ch&uacute; &yacute; l&agrave; c\u0103ng th\u1eb3ng M\u1ef9-Trung, s\u1ebd d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c d\u1ecbch chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u01a1n h&agrave;ng t\u1eeb Trung Qu\u1ed1c sang Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><b>Y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7, nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u<\/b><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Tuy nhi&ecirc;n, ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may \u0111ang \u0111\u1ed1i m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng lo\u1ea1t th&aacute;ch th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 thi\u1ebfu nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u trong n\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 ch\u01b0a cao, \u0111&ograve;i h\u1ecfi ph\u1ea3i t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0, \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111&oacute;n c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i d\u1ecbch chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u01a1n h&agrave;ng t\u1eeb Trung Qu\u1ed1c v&agrave; \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng c&aacute;c \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n mi\u1ec5n gi\u1ea3m thu\u1ebf t\u1eeb c&aacute;c FTA mang l\u1ea1i.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng, ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ee7 Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111&atilde; li&ecirc;n t\u1ee5c khuy\u1ebfn kh&iacute;ch v&agrave; h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng n&acirc;ng c\u1ea5p thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb m&aacute;y m&oacute;c cho c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p, t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111&agrave;o t\u1ea1o nh&acirc;n l\u1ef1c v&agrave; th&uacute;c \u0111\u1ea9y chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ed5i c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1ed3ng h&agrave;nh c&ugrave;ng \u0111&agrave; t\u0103ng tr\u01b0\u1edfng m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam, Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m Qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf ng&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam (VTG 2019), Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m m&aacute;y m&oacute;c, thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v&agrave; nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u D\u1ec7t May (VitaTex) s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1ea1i Trung t&acirc;m H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 v&agrave; Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m S&agrave;i G&ograve;n (SECC).&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><i>Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1eeb ng&agrave;y 20 \u0111\u1ebfn 23-11<\/i>&nbsp;s\u1eafp t\u1edbi v\u1edbi 800 gian h&agrave;ng c\u1ee7a 530 \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n 550 th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u tham gia \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb 14 qu\u1ed1c gia v&agrave; v&ugrave;ng l&atilde;nh th\u1ed5.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&aacute;c th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u l\u1edbn tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n mang \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1t c&aacute;c m&aacute;y m&oacute;c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t d\u1ec7t may t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1edbi c&ocirc;ng su\u1ea5t cao c&ugrave;ng h&agrave;ng lo\u1ea1t c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i s\u1ee3i, v\u1ea3i, ch\u1ec9, h&oacute;a ch\u1ea5t nhu\u1ed9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u01a1n c\u1eed ZSK, Nantex (\u0110\u1ee9c), Barudan (Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n) s\u1ebd mang \u0111\u1ebfn c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 m&aacute;y th&ecirc;u \u0111\u1ed9 ph&acirc;n gi\u1ea3i cao;&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Tajima mang \u0111\u1ebfn m&aacute;y th&ecirc;u vi t&iacute;nh v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; ch\u1ec9 th&ocirc;ng minh, c&ugrave;ng c&aacute;c th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u m&aacute;y in m&agrave;n h&igrave;nh d\u1ec7t nh\u01b0 Heinz Walz, OZ, Bihong, San Sin.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Askme s\u1ebd tr&igrave;nh b&agrave;y b\u1ea3n demo tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp v\u1ec1 c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1ed1i \u01b0u, b&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh Xiamen Xing-Quanlong tr&igrave;nh l&agrave;ng m&aacute;y d\u1ec7t kim tr&ograve;n t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1edbi t&iacute;nh linh ho\u1ea1t cao.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>TAK s\u1ebd gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p l&agrave;m s\u1ea1ch \u0111a n\u0103ng bao g\u1ed3m gi\u1eb7t kh&ocirc;, \u0111&oacute;ng bao, l&agrave;m th\u1eb3ng v\u1ea3i v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed3ng ph\u1ee5c.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&aacute;c nh&agrave; cung \u1ee9ng ho&aacute; ch\u1ea5t nhu\u1ed9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao nh\u01b0 Eksoy, Nicca, Zschimmer &amp; Schwarz, v&agrave; 3M c\u0169ng s\u1ebd g&oacute;p m\u1eb7t t\u1ea1i VTG l\u1ea7n n&agrave;y,&hellip;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Trong khi \u0111&oacute;, c&aacute;c th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u v\u1ea3i, ch\u1ec9, s\u1ee3i c\u0169ng g&oacute;p m\u1eb7t v\u1edbi 3 khu gian h&agrave;ng qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb H&agrave;n Qu\u1ed1c, \u1ea4n \u0110\u1ed9 v&agrave; \u0110&agrave;i Loan.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m s\u1ebd mang \u0111\u1ebfn c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 d&agrave;nh cho to&agrave;n b\u1ed9 chu\u1ed7i cung \u1ee9ng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch tham quan c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn c&aacute;c ph&aacute;t minh m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi trong ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may, ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn th&ocirc;ng tin th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t, v&agrave; giao l\u01b0u v\u1edbi c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p ch\u1ee7 ch\u1ed1t t\u1eeb kh\u1eafp n\u01a1i tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><a data-fancybox-group=\"img-lightbox\" Vi\u1ec7t Nam (VTG) s\u1ebd mang \u0111\u1ebfn c\u00e1c gi\u1ea3i ph\u00e1p t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 d\u00e0nh cho to\u00e0n b\u1ed9 chu\u1ed7i cung \u1ee9ng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ng\u00e0nh d\u1ec7t may\"><img alt=\"D\u1ec7t may \u0111\u00f3n c\u00f4ng ngh\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ec3 t\u0103ng t\u1ed1c - \u1ea2nh 3.\" - \u1ea2nh 3.\" type=\"photo\" w=\"800\" \/><\/a><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p data-placeholder=\"[nh\u1eadp ch\u00fa th\u00edch]\">Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m Qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf ng&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam (VTG) s\u1ebd mang \u0111\u1ebfn c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 d&agrave;nh cho to&agrave;n b\u1ed9 chu\u1ed7i cung \u1ee9ng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p data-placeholder=\"[nh\u1eadp ch\u00fa th\u00edch]\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p data-placeholder=\"[nh\u1eadp ch\u00fa th\u00edch]\">Ngu\u1ed3n: tuoitre.vn<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<h2 class=\"sapo\" style=\"margin:0px 0px 12px; padding:0px; border:0px; font:16px \/ 22px NotoSans-Bold; vertical-align:baseline; color:#222222; letter-spacing:-0.2px; orphans:2; text-align:start; text-transform:none; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95); text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Access to modern equipment and technology as well as increasing the localization rate of raw materials for textile enterprises is a good solution to reduce labor and improve product value.<\/font><\/font><\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"VCSortableInPreviewMode active\" style=\"border:0px; margin:1.3em auto 0px; padding:0px; text-align:center; and garment industry consider Vietnam to be a big market, with advantages in production but need to invest in technological innovation.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Thanks to its large population of about 95 million people and its geographical location close to the world&#39;s second largest economy, Vietnam has long been a destination for textile companies seeking low production costs and Young labor force.&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font:400 16px \/ 1.44 NotoSans-Regular\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"color:#222222\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"border:0px; margin:0px; padding:0px; font:inherit\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Export opportunities in this sector are assessed by potential analysts due to Vietnam&#39;s participation in many free trade agreements (FTAs), production advantages, and notably US-China tensions. , will result in the shift of orders from China to Vietnam.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font:400 16px \/ 1.44 NotoSans-Regular\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"color:#222222\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><b style=\"margin:0px; padding:0px; border:0px; font-style:inherit; font-variant:inherit; font-weight:bold; font-stretch:inherit; font-size:inherit; line-height:inherit; font-family:inherit; vertical-align:baseline; letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Technology elements, raw materials<\/font><\/font><\/b><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font:400 16px \/ 1.44 NotoSans-Regular\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"color:#222222\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">However, the textile industry is facing a series of challenges on the lack of domestic raw materials and low technology, requiring increased investment and innovation to take opportunities to shift orders from China and meet tax exemptions from FTAs.&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font:400 16px \/ 1.44 NotoSans-Regular\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"color:#222222\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">To ensure sustainable development, the Vietnamese government has continuously encouraged and supported the upgrading of equipment and machinery for businesses, strengthened human resource training and promoted technological transformation.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font:400 16px \/ 1.44 NotoSans-Regular\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"color:#222222\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Accompanying with the strong growth momentum of Vietnam&#39;s textile and apparel industry, the International Exhibition of Vietnam&#39;s Textile Industry (VTG 2019), the Exhibition of Textile Machinery, Equipment and Materials (VitaTex) will take place. at Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center (SECC).&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font:400 16px \/ 1.44 NotoSans-Regular\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"color:#222222\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><i style=\"margin:0px; padding:0px; border:0px; font-style:italic; font-variant:inherit; font-weight:inherit; font-stretch:inherit; font-size:inherit; line-height:inherit; font-family:inherit; vertical-align:baseline; letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">The exhibition will take place from the<\/font><\/font><\/i><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;upcoming&nbsp;<\/font><i style=\"margin:0px; padding:0px; border:0px; font-style:italic; font-variant:inherit; font-weight:inherit; font-stretch:inherit; font-size:inherit; line-height:inherit; font-family:inherit; vertical-align:baseline; letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">20 to 23-11<\/font><\/i><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;with 800 booths of 530 exhibitors representing 550 participating brands from 14 countries and territories.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font:400 16px \/ 1.44 NotoSans-Regular\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"color:#222222\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:-0.2px\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Major brands in the world promise to bring a wide range of high-performance automatic textile production machines and a range of high quality yarns, fabrics, threads, and dyes.&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; style=\"background-color:rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">For example, ZSK, Nantex (Germany), Barudan (Japan) will bring high-resolution embroidery machine technology;&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; Sin.&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; flexibility.&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; uniforms.&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; ...<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; Taiwan.&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 24px; padding:0px; style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf \u0111&atilde; \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ebfn r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i. Tuy nhi&ecirc;n m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi c&ograve;n e ng\u1ea1i v\u1ec1 t&iacute;nh an to&agrave;n c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng b\u1edfi quan ni\u1ec7m s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf l&agrave; \u0111&atilde; qua s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 sinh&hellip;.Th\u1eadt ra th&igrave; quan ni\u1ec7m n&agrave;y ch\u1ec9 \u0111&uacute;ng \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng doanh nghi\u1ec7p s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t k&eacute;m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng v&agrave; ch\u01b0a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea5p ph&eacute;p \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m<\/span><\/span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">nylon<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf. \u0110\u1ed1i v\u1edbi <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m<\/span><\/span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">nylon<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1eeb nh\u1eefng c&ocirc;ng ty <\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;uy t&iacute;n, \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea5p ph&eacute;p th&igrave; b\u1ea1n h&atilde;y ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n y&ecirc;n t&acirc;m v\u1ec1 ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng. Kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eefng th\u1ebf m&agrave; c&ograve;n c&ograve;n gi&uacute;p ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m v&agrave; b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 align=\"justify\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:5.2500pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; text-align:justify; text-justify:inter-ideograph; background:#ffffff\"><b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\">L\u1ee3i &iacute;ch khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng <\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\">S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><b>&nbsp;<\/b><b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\">Nylon<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\">&nbsp;t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:13.6500pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\">S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a v&agrave; c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ebf t\u1ea1o t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a t&aacute;i sinh hi\u1ec7n nay \u0111ang d\u1ea7n tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh xu h\u01b0\u1edbng, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3o m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u01b0\u1edfng \u1ee9ng. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t, trong khi tr&aacute;i \u0111\u1ea5t \u0111ang ng&agrave;y m\u1ed9t n&oacute;ng l&ecirc;n, y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng c&agrave;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c quan t&acirc;m th&igrave; nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf c&agrave;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u01b0u ti&ecirc;n l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn. S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng t&uacute;i Nylon t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t h\u1eefu d\u1ee5ng v&igrave; c&oacute; nhi\u1ec1u l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch, nh\u01b0 sau:<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Symbol\"><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 13.65pt; margin-left: 0pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\">Cho ph&eacute;p ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i gi\u1ea3m l\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&iacute; th\u1ea3i CO2 l&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ebfn 92%.<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Symbol\"><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 13.65pt; margin-left: 0pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\">Gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m ti&ecirc;u th\u1ee5 d\u1ea7u: vi\u1ec7c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a m\u1edbi s\u1ebd l&agrave;m ti&ecirc;u hao nhi\u1ec1u kh&iacute; thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n ho\u1eb7c d\u1eabn xu\u1ea5t d\u1ea7u th&ocirc; h\u01a1n so v\u1edbi t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf.<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Symbol\"><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 13.65pt; margin-left: 0pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\">Gi&uacute;p b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&igrave; t\u0103ng t&iacute;nh tu\u1ea7n ho&agrave;n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nh\u1ef1a, l&agrave;m gi\u1ea3m \u0111&aacute;ng k\u1ec3 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng r&aacute;c th\u1ea3i ra ngo&agrave;i m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><span style=\"font-weight:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 13.65pt; margin-left: 0pt; text-align: justify;\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1084\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Recycle%20nylon%20leaflet_page-0001.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 13.65pt; margin-left: 0pt; text-align: justify;\">https:\/\/baobiminhsang.com\/tin-tuc\/<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><strong>What is recycled nylon?<\/strong><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">The use of recycled nylon products is now widely known. However, some people are still concerned about their safety because of the perception that recycled products are used, unhygienic&hellip;. In fact, this concept is only true for businesses that produce poorly. quality and unlicensed production of recycled nylon products. For recycled plastic products made from reputable, licensed manufacturing companies, you can be assured of quality. Not only that, it also saves costs and protects the environment.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><strong>Benefits of using Recycled Nylon Products<\/strong><br \/>\r\nPlastics and products made from recycled plastic are gradually becoming a trend and are widely accepted by people. In particular, while the earth is warming, environmental protection requirements are increasingly focused, giving priority to recycled products. Using recycled nylon bags is especially useful because of many benefits, such as:<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Allows us to reduce CO2 emissions by up to 92%.<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Helps reduce oil consumption: the production of new plastic products uses more natural gas or crude oil derivatives than recycling.<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Help protect the environment by increasing the circulation of plastic use, significantly reducing the amount of waste released into the environment.<\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><span contenteditable=\"false\" tabindex=\"-1\"><img alt=\"\" data-widget=\"image\" height=\"1084\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Recycle%20nylon%20leaflet_page-0001.jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">https:\/\/baobiminhsang.com\/tin-tuc\/<\/span><\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"rycycled-nylon-products-san-pham-nylon-tai-che-va-nhung-dieu-ban-can-biet","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"21","icon":"1671068269_Recycle-nylon-leaflet_page-0001.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1660199101","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"3295","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Rycycled Nylon Products - TH&Ocirc;NG TIN CHUNG<\/span><\/strong><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small>SaigonTex &ndash; Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m C&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam l&agrave; s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t v&agrave; c&oacute; \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam. Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c song song \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi v\u1edbi &nbsp;SaigonFabric &ndash; H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 Nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u D\u1ec7t May Vi\u1ec7t Nam<\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small>L&agrave; th&agrave;nh vi&ecirc;n c\u1ee7a UFI &ndash; Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m&nbsp; (www.ufi.org). SaigonTex \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf c\u1ee7a UFI.<\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small>SaigonTex 2022 s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1eeb ng&agrave;y 27 \u0111\u1ebfn 30 th&aacute;ng 7, n\u0103m 2022 t\u1ea1i Trung t&acirc;m Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m S&agrave;i G&ograve;n (SECC) &ndash; 799 Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Linh, qu\u1eadn 7, th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh.<\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><img alt=\"\" height=\"171\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/123.jpg\" width=\"294\" \/><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><strong>\u0110i\u1ec3n nh\u1ea5n thu h&uacute;t c\u1ee7a tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m n\u0103m&nbsp;2019:<\/strong><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><small>Tri\u1ec5n l&atilde;m ng&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p d\u1ec7t may c&oacute; quy m&ocirc; l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t Vi\u1ec7t Nam t\u1eeb th\u1eadp ni&ecirc;n nh\u1eefng n\u0103m 1990.<\/small><\/li>\r\n\t<li><small>Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m quy m&ocirc; h\u01a1n 35.000 m2. v\u1edbi 10 h\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m.<\/small><\/li>\r\n\t<li><small>H\u01a1n 1050 nh&agrave; Lan, Th\u1ed5 Nh\u0129 K\u1ef3, V\u01b0\u01a1ng qu\u1ed1c Anh, Hoa K\u1ef3, Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111&atilde; tham gia gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v&agrave; nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u cho th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng d\u1ec7t may t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/small><\/li>\r\n\t<li><small>Kh&aacute;ch tham quan tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m: 28,802 (t\u0103ng 10% so v\u1edbi n\u0103m 2018).<\/small><\/li>\r\n\t<li><small>H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o chuy&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ec1 gi&uacute;p doanh nghi\u1ec7p c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt xu h\u01b0\u1edbng kinh t\u1ebf, k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt m\u1edbi<\/small><\/li>\r\n\t<li><small>Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng tr&igrave;nh r&uacute;t th\u0103m v\u1edbi c&aacute;c gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn, nh\u01b0: M&aacute;y t&iacute;nh x&aacute;ch tay, \u0110i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng, ch\u1ec9 v&agrave;ng 9999 v&agrave; nhi\u1ec1u phi\u1ebfu qu&agrave; \u0103n u\u1ed1ng &amp; mua s\u1eafm h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn kh&aacute;c.<\/small><\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p dir=\"ltr\"><small><strong><span style=\"font-size:22px;\">2. TH\u1edcI GIAN &amp; \u0110\u1ecaA \u0110I\u1ec2M<\/span><\/strong><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table>\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td colspan=\"3\"><small><strong>Th\u1eddi gian<\/strong><\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><small>27-30\/ 7\/ 2022<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><small>09:00 &ndash; 17:00<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><small>M\u1edf c\u1eeda cho kh&aacute;ch tham quan<br \/>\r\n\t\t\t(qu\u1ea7y \u0111\u0103ng k&yacute; tham quan s\u1ebd \u0111&oacute;ng v&agrave;o l&uacute;c&nbsp;16:30)<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td rowspan=\"2\"><small>27\/ 7\/ 2022<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><small>09:30 &ndash; 10:00<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><small>L\u1ec5 Khai M\u1ea1c<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><small>10:00 &ndash; 11:00<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><small>Tham quan d&agrave;nh cho kh&aacute;ch VIP &amp; H\u1ecdp b&aacute;o<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td colspan=\"3\"><small><strong>\u0110\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m<\/strong><\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td colspan=\"3\"><small>Trung t&acirc;m H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb v&agrave; Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m S&agrave;i G&ograve;n (SECC)<br \/>\r\n\t\t\t799 Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Linh &ndash; Qu\u1eadn 7 &ndash; TP. H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh &ndash; Vi\u1ec7t Nam<\/small><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><strong><span style=\"font-size:22px;\">3. C&Aacute;C N\u1ed8I DUNG TRI\u1ec2N L&Atilde;M<\/span><\/strong><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table width=\"538\">\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><small><strong>C&Aacute;C B\u1ed8 PH\u1eacN &ndash; M&Aacute;Y M&Oacute;C NG&Agrave;NH D\u1ec6T<\/strong><\/small>\r\n\r\n\t\t\t<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t\t\t<ul>\r\n\t\t\t\t<li><small>Thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v&agrave; &amp; QU\u1ea2N L&Iacute;<\/strong><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><span style=\"font-size:22px;\"><strong>4. TH\u01af M\u1edcI THAM GIA TRI\u1ec2N L&Atilde;M C\u1ee6A C&Ocirc;NG TY TNHH V\u1ea0N N\u0102NG BANOK<\/strong><\/span><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><strong><img alt=\"\" height=\"476\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/t%E1%BA%A5m%201.png\" width=\"944\" \/><\/strong><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><strong><img alt=\"\" height=\"468\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/t%E1%BA%A5m%202.png\" width=\"932\" \/><\/strong><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><span style=\"font-size:22px;\"><\/span><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><strong><span style=\"font-size:22px;\">5. M\u1ed8T S\u1ed0 H&Igrave;NH \u1ea2NH T\u1ea0I TRI\u1ec4N L&Atilde;M N\u0102M 2019<\/span><\/strong><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><img alt=\"\" height=\"169\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/1.jpg\" width=\"300\" \/><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><img alt=\"\" height=\"200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/2.jpg\" width=\"300\" \/><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><img alt=\"\" height=\"200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/3.jpg\" width=\"300\" \/><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small><img alt=\"\" height=\"200\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/4.jpg\" width=\"300\" \/><\/small><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><small>Ngu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;http:\/\/sgntex.com\/<\/small><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size:22px;\"><strong>1. SHOW OVERVIEW<\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">SaigonTex &ndash; Vietnam Textile and Garment Industry Exhibition is the largest and most influential event of the Vietnamese textile and garment industry.The exhibition is held in parallel with<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">SaigonFabric &ndash; Vietnam Textile and Garment Materials Fair.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Be the member of UFI &ndash; The Global Association of the Exhibition Industry (www.ufi.org). SaigonTex is certified to ensure the quality of international exhibitions by UFI.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">SaigonTex 2022 will take place from July 27 to 30, 2022 at Saigon Exhibition Center (SECC) &ndash; 799 Nguyen Van Linh, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><small><img alt=\"\" height=\"171\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/123.jpg\" width=\"294\" \/><\/small><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><b>2019 Show Highlights<\/b><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">The biggest and leading textile and garment industry exhibition in Vietnam since 1990s.<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">The biggest international exhibition (in all industries) in Vietnam.<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Exhibition Scale: 33,000 sqm, with 12 exhibition halls (increased 17% compare with 2018).<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">No. of buyers: 28,802 (increased 10% compare with 2018).<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">No. of exhibitors:&nbsp; 1,042 exhibitors from 25 countries \/ regions.<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">National pavilions organized by:<\/span>\r\n\t<ul>\r\n\t\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Korea Sewing Machinery Industrial Association (KOSMIA)<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Korea Textile Trade Association (KTTA)<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Korea Textile Center (KTC)<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Korea Textile Machinery Research Institute (KOTMI)<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Taiwan Association of Machinery Industry (TAMI)<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Taiwan Textile Federation (TTF)<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">China Jiangsu Province Pavilion<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Hong Kong Apparel Machinery Association<\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<\/ul>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Concurrent events: Seminars, Lucky Draw, VIP Tour, Factory visit, Press meeting, opening Ceremony<\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"font-size:22px;\">2. TIME &amp; LOCATION<\/span><\/strong><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table>\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td colspan=\"3\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><strong>Date &amp; Time<\/strong><\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">27-30 Jul, 2022<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">09:00 &ndash; 17:00<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Open for trade visitors<br \/>\r\n\t\t\t(the visitor registration counter will be closed at 16:30.)<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td rowspan=\"2\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">27 Jul, 2022<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">09:30 &ndash; 10:00<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Open for Ceremony<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">10:00 &ndash; 11:00<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">VIP Visit &amp; Press Conference<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td colspan=\"3\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><strong>Venue Address<\/strong><\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td colspan=\"3\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center (SECC)<br \/>\r\n\t\t\t799 Nguyen Van Linh &ndash; District 7 &ndash; Ho Chi Minh City &ndash; Vietnam<\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"font-size:22px;\">3. \u0111\u1ec1 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ed9 b\u1ec1n \u0111\u1eb9p cho qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o. Ngo&agrave;i ra v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 th\u1ea9m m\u1ec9 c\u0169ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u c\u1eeda h&agrave;ng qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o quan t&acirc;m. Ch&iacute;nh v&igrave; v\u1eady m&agrave; vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong may m\u1eb7c l&agrave; \u0111i\u1ec1u v&ocirc; c&ugrave;ng c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft v&agrave; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c&aacute;c \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb kinh doanh th\u1eddi trang \u01b0a d&ugrave;ng.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Nh\u1ef1a ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y sinh h\u1ecdc ( <strong>biodegradable plastic<\/strong> ) l&agrave; v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u c&oacute; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y th&agrave;nh c&aacute;c th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n n\u01b0\u1edbc, CO2 v&agrave; sinh kh\u1ed1i d\u01b0\u1edbi t&aacute;c d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee7a m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; vi sinh v\u1eadt. V\u1edbi m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u t\u0103ng kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y c\u1ee7a nh\u1ef1a truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng (c&oacute; ngu\u1ed3n g\u1ed1c t\u1eeb d\u1ea7u m\u1ecf), tinh b\u1ed9t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ed1i tr\u1ed9n v\u1edbi n\u1ec1n nh\u1ef1a d\u1ea7u m\u1ecf. M\u1ee5c \u0111&iacute;ch pha tr\u1ed9n nh\u1eb1m gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n d\u1ea7u m\u1ecf, t\u0103ng kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ph&acirc;n hu\u1ef7 sinh h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m compound, t\u1eeb \u0111&oacute; h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf s\u1ef1 &ocirc; nhi\u1ec5m t\u1eeb r&aacute;c th\u1ea3i nh\u1ef1a kh&ocirc;ng ph&acirc;n hu\u1ef7.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"343\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_1(3).png\" width=\"454\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf V\u1edbi c\u01a1 ch\u1ebf ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y sinh h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u, sau khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gia c&ocirc;ng th&agrave;nh s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m cu\u1ed1i, c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th\u1ea3i ra m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; d\u01b0\u1edbi t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a vi sinh v\u1eadt s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf Trong m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng ch&ocirc;n l\u1ea5p, c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c&oacute; tinh b\u1ed9t s\u1ebd h\u1ea5p thu n\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; h\u01a1i \u1ea9m t\u1eeb \u0111&oacute; vi sinh v\u1eadt s\u1ebd ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n l&ecirc;n b\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m. Qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh ph&aacute;t sinh vi khu\u1ea9n s\u1ebd t\u01b0\u01a1ng t&aacute;c v&agrave; ti&ecirc;u th\u1ee5 c&aacute;c ph&acirc;n \u0111o\u1ea1n tinh b\u1ed9t c\u1eaft m\u1ea1ch polymer. Khi tr\u1ecdng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c chu\u1ed7i polymer d\u1ea7u m\u1ecf gi\u1ea3m t\u1edbi m\u1ee9c vi sinh v\u1eadt c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n. Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc c&oacute; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ph&acirc;n hu\u1ef7 th&agrave;nh CO2, CH4, n\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; c&aacute;c h\u1ee3p ch\u1ea5t v&ocirc; c\u01a1, sinh kh\u1ed1i d\u01b0\u1edbi c&aacute;c enzyme t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a vi sinh v\u1eadt m&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 ch\u1ea5t n&agrave;o c&oacute; th\u1ec3 g&acirc;y h\u1ea1i cho m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"343\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_2(4).png\" width=\"499\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf Nhi\u1ec1u n\u01b0\u1edbc tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111&atilde; c&oacute; quy \u0111\u1ecbnh b\u1eaft bu\u1ed9c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y sinh h\u1ecdc thay cho nh\u1ef1a th&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng trong m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c, ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn nh\u1ea5t l&agrave; bao b&igrave; v&agrave; c&aacute;c v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng d&ugrave;ng m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n. S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y sinh h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a PMP \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p trong v&agrave; ngo&agrave;i n\u01b0\u1edbc quan t&acirc;m nh\u01b0 Malaysia, \u1ea4n \u0110\u1ed9, Rumani, Anh,&hellip; \u1ede Vi\u1ec7t Nam, lo\u1ea1i v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u m\u1edbi n&agrave;y c\u0169ng \u0111ang nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ef1 quan t&acirc;m c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; ng\u01b0\u1eddi ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng&nbsp;c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 b\u1eaft k\u1ecbp xu h\u01b0\u1edbng b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng trong ngh&agrave;nh may m\u1eb7c, c&ocirc;ng ty <strong>V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok<\/strong> \u0111&atilde; cho ra \u0111\u1eddi m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m t\u1eeb ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a ph&acirc;n hu\u1ef7 sinh h\u1ecdc&nbsp;<strong>biodegradable <\/strong>:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"521\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(16).jpg\" width=\"750\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278a&nbsp; \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m t\u1eeb ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc, th\u1eddi gian ph&acirc;n hu\u1ef7 trong v&ograve;ng 18 th&aacute;ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278b Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o an to&agrave;n cho trang ph\u1ee5c.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278c&nbsp; Tr\u1ecdng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng nh\u1eb9, d\u1ec5 d&agrave;ng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng mang l\u1ea1i hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 cao.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278d \u0110a d\u1ea1ng ki\u1ec3u d&aacute;ng ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi nhu c\u1ea7u kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278e \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ec3 treo s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m tr&ecirc;n c&aacute;c k\u1ec7 tr\u01b0ng b&agrave;y tai si&ecirc;u th\u1ecb, c\u1eeda h&agrave;ng ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i,...<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><strong>M&oacute;c treo:<\/strong><\/span><\/u><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"262\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Hook%20clip%20B.jpg\" width=\"1520\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><u><strong>K\u1eb9p nh\u1ef1a:<\/strong><\/u><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"262\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Plastic%20Clip%20No%203.jpg\" width=\"648\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong>&quot;S\u1ea2N XU\u1ea4T T\u1ea0I VI\u1ec6T NAM THEO TI&Ecirc;U CHU\u1ea8N NH\u1eacT B\u1ea2N&quot;<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><em>Ngu\u1ed3n<\/em><\/strong>:&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/www.pmp.com.vn\/nhua-phan-huy-sinh-hoc-pmp-dat-chung-nhan-quoc-te\">http:\/\/www.pmp.com.vn\/nhua-phan-huy-sinh-hoc-pmp-dat-chung-nhan-quoc-te<\/a><br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>\u25cf Nowadays, in the garment industry, it is often very important to pay attention to the issue of ensuring the durability of clothes. In addition, the issue of meticulousness is also concerned by many clothing stores. Therefore, the use in apparel is extremely necessary and preferred by fashion business units.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Biodegradable plastic is a material capable of decomposing into water, CO2 and biomass components under the influence of the environment and microorganisms. With the goal of increasing the degradability of traditional plastics (petroleum-based), starch is mixed with a petroleum resin base. The purpose of mixing is to reduce the petroleum composition, increase the biodegradability of the compound product, thereby restricting the pollution from non-biodegradable plastic waste.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"343\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_1(3).png\" width=\"454\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf With the biodegradation mechanism of the raw materials, after being processed into the final product, the products discharged into the environment and under the influence of microorganisms will begin to decompose.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf In the landfill environment, starchy products will absorb water and moisture from which microorganisms will grow on the surface of the product. Bacterial growth process&nbsp;interacts and consumes the starch fractions that cut the polymer chains. When the weight of petroleum polymer chains is reduced to the point where microorganisms can affect and completely decompose. Bioplastic has the ability to decompose into CO2, CH4, water and inorganic compounds, biomass under the action of microbial enzymes without leaving any effects&nbsp;that can be harmful to the environment.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"343\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_2(4).png\" width=\"499\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf Many countries around the world have mandated the use of biodegradable materials instead of conventional plastics in some areas, most commonly packaging and disposable items. Biodegradable products of PMP are being interested by many domestic and international business&nbsp;such as Malaysia, India, Romania, UK, etc. In Vietnam, this new material is also receiving the attention of many businesses&nbsp;and consumers.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf In order to meet the needs of customers&nbsp;as well as catch up with the trend of environmental protection in the garment industry, Van Nang Banok company has launched a number of products made from biodegradable plastic materials:&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"521\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(16).jpg\" width=\"750\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278a&nbsp;&nbsp;Made from bio-plastic material, the decomposition time is within 18 months.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278b Convenient design ensures the safety of clothes.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278c&nbsp;&nbsp;Light weight, easy to use with high efficiency.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278d Diverse designs to suit customer needs.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u278e Especially suitable for hanging products on display shelves at supermarkets, convenience stores,...<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><em><strong>Hook:<\/strong><\/em><\/u><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"262\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Hook%20clip%20B(2).jpg\" width=\"1520\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Plastic clip:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"262\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Plastic%20Clip%20No%203.jpg\" width=\"648\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong>&quot;MADE IN VIET NAM FOLLOWING JAPAN STANDARD QUALITY&quot;<\/strong><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nSource from:&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/www.pmp.com.vn\/nhua-phan-huy-sinh-hoc-pmp-dat-chung-nhan-quoc-te\">http:\/\/www.pmp.com.vn\/nhua-phan-huy-sinh-hoc-pmp-dat-chung-nhan-quoc-te<\/a><\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"moc-treo-va-kep-nhua-sinh-hoc-biodegradable-plastic","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"18","icon":"1622703976_download.png","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1622701802","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"4410","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"M\u00f3c treo v\u00e0 k\u1eb9p nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc (Biodegradable plastic)","seo_title_en":"Biodegradable Hook And Plastic Clip - Applications In Garment Industry","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"M\u00f3c treo v\u00e0 k\u1eb9p nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc (Biodegradable plastic)","seo_keywords_en":"Biodegradable Hook And Plastic Clip - Applications In Garment Industry","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"M\u00f3c treo v\u00e0 k\u1eb9p nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc (Biodegradable plastic)","seo_description_en":"Biodegradable Hook And Plastic Clip - Applications In Garment Industry","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},"235":{"id":"235","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"M\u00d3C TREO \u0110\u1eb6C BI\u1ec6T S\u1ea2N XU\u1ea4T T\u1eea C\u00d4NG TY V\u1ea0N N\u0102NG BANOK","tenbaiviet_en":"THE SPECIAL HANGERS HAVE RELEASED FROM VAN NANG BANOK LIMITED COMPANY","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cf S\u1ef1 ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i c\u1ee7a m&oacute;c treo nh\u1ef1a<\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\nNg&agrave;y nay khi kinh t\u1ebf ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n k&eacute;o&nbsp;theo \u0111\u1eddi s\u1ed1ng c\u1ee7a con ng\u01b0\u1eddi c\u0169ng ng&agrave;y m\u1ed9t n&acirc;ng cao h\u01a1n. N\u1ebfu&nbsp;nh\u01b0 tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111&acirc;y qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1ea5p g\u1ecdn cho v&agrave;o r\u01b0\u01a1ng, h&ograve;m th&igrave; ng&agrave;y nay n&oacute; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o qu\u1ea3n m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn h\u01a1n b\u1eb1ng c&aacute;ch treo m&oacute;c v&agrave;o t\u1ee7. Tuy nhi&ecirc;n khi treo ta c\u0169ng c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ec3 &yacute; v&agrave; l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn lo\u1ea1i m&oacute;c ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p, nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc m&oacute;c treo nh\u1ef1a s\u1ebd gi&uacute;p qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n b\u1ec1n \u0111\u1eb9p h\u01a1n theo th\u1eddi gian.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Nh\u1eefng \u01b0u \u0111i\u1ec3m khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m&oacute;c treo nh\u1ef1a<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf l&agrave;m m&oacute;c treo n&ecirc;n nh\u1eefng ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng th\u01b0\u1eddng c&oacute; \u0111\u1ed9 b\u1ec1n r\u1ea5t cao, v&ocirc; c&ugrave;ng ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn v&agrave; d&ugrave; l&agrave; nh\u1ef1a nh\u01b0ng l\u1ea1i c&oacute; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ch\u1ecbu l\u1ef1c r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng b\u1edfi c&aacute;i y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 b&ecirc;n ngo&agrave;i t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave;o th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft hay nhi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed9.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">M&oacute;c l&agrave;m b\u1eb1ng nh\u1ef1a c&oacute; b\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t nh\u1eb5n b&oacute;ng n&ecirc;n khi treo \u0111\u1ed3 \u0111\u1ea3m&nbsp;b\u1ea3o kh&ocirc;ng khi\u1ebfn qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o b\u1ecb s\u1eddn v\u1ea3i hay l&agrave;m m\u1ea5t d&aacute;ng. \u0110i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 gi&uacute;p b\u1ea1n b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n m&agrave; c\u0169ng s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u lo\u1ea1i chi ph&iacute; kh&aacute;c nhau&nbsp;nh\u01b0 ph\u1ea3i thay m&oacute;c hay qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o th\u01b0\u1eddng xuy&ecirc;n khi b\u1ecb n&oacute; l&agrave;m h\u1ecfng.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">M&oacute;c nh\u1ef1a th\u01b0\u1eddng c&oacute; tr\u1ecdng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng r\u1ea5t nh\u1eb9 n&ecirc;n khi treo l&ecirc;n d&acirc;y ph\u01a1i&nbsp;s\u1ebd kh&ocirc;ng d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ebfn hi\u1ec7n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng b\u1ecb tr&ugrave;ng, gi&uacute;p cho d&acirc;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u0103ng v&agrave; ph\u01a1i qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n bao gi\u1edd h\u1ebft. M&oacute;c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf k&egrave;m theo ph\u1ea7n ch\u1ed1t kho&aacute;&nbsp;c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i trong vi\u1ec7c&nbsp;ph\u01a1i \u0111\u1ed3 l&oacute;t hay nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc &aacute;o, qu\u1ea7n, v\u1edb, kh\u0103n t\u1eafm, v&aacute;y, &nbsp;\u0111\u1ed3 l&oacute;t,&hellip; hay c&aacute;c trang ph\u1ee5c nh\u1eb9 nh&agrave;ng kh&aacute;c.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cf&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Hi\u1ec7n nay m&oacute;c treo nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u ki\u1ec3u d&aacute;ng, c&ocirc;ng d\u1ee5ng v&agrave; m&agrave;u s\u1eafc r\u1ea5t \u0111a d\u1ea1ng. Do \u0111&oacute;, kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng c&oacute; th\u1ec3 d\u1ec5 d&agrave;ng l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p h\u01a1n.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Do \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhu c\u1ea7u thi\u1ebft y\u1ebfu c\u1ee7a kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng, C&ocirc;ng ty V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok \u0111&atilde; cho ra \u0111\u1eddi s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m&oacute;c treo nh\u1ef1a v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u m&agrave;u s\u1eafc, k&iacute;ch c\u1ee1, ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u kh&aacute;c nhau:<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><u>Ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a&nbsp;PP<\/u><\/strong>:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"447\" style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>\u25cf The convenience of plastic hangers:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nNowadays, when the economy develops, people&#39;s living standards are also improved. If in the past, clothes were often folded and put into chests, but today it is preserved more carefully by hanging hooks on cabinets. However, when hanging, we also need to pay attention and choose the right type of hook, the plastic hangers will help your clothes be more durable over time.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf&nbsp;Advantages of using plastic hangers:<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Designed as a hanger, the plastic materials used are often very durable, extremely sturdy, and although it is plastic, it has very good loading&nbsp;capacity. Especially not affected by external factors affecting weather or temperature.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Hooks made of plastic have a smooth surface, so when hanging things, make sure not to cause clothes to fray or lose shape. This will not only help you better protect your clothes, but will also reduce many other costs such as having to change hangers or clothes often when it is damaged.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Plastic hooks are usually very light in weight, so hanging on the clothesline will not lead to the phenomenon of overlapping, helping the rope to be stretched and drying clothes better than ever. The hook is designed with small ledges that can be convenient in wearing underwear or shirts, pants, socks, towels, skirts, underwear, ... or other light clothes.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Currently, plastic hangers are produced with many different designs, uses and colors. Therefore, customers can more easily choose the right product. Therefore, to meet the essential needs of customers, Van Nang&nbsp;Banok Company has launched plastic hangers with a wide variety of&nbsp;colors, sizes, and materials:<br \/>\r\n<br
