(SDGs)","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><strong>V\u1eady SDGs l&agrave; g&igrave;?<\/strong><br \/>\r\n<strong>SDGs<\/strong>&nbsp;(vi\u1ebft t\u1eaft c\u1ee7a &ldquo;<strong>Sustainable&nbsp;Development Goals<\/strong>&rdquo;), hay c&ograve;n g\u1ecdi l&agrave; m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c 193 qu\u1ed1c gia th&agrave;nh vi&ecirc;n c\u1ee7a H\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng Li&ecirc;n h\u1ee3p qu\u1ed1c th\u1ed1ng nh\u1ea5t v&agrave; \u0111\u01b0a v&agrave;o s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng t\u1ea1i H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c n\u0103m 2015.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf V\u1edbi m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u d&agrave;i h\u1ea1n, t\u1ea1o d\u1ef1ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x&atilde; h\u1ed9i ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng cho \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m 2030, c&aacute;c qu\u1ed1c gia tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi bao g\u1ed3m c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n ph\u1ea3i c&ugrave;ng nhau n\u1ed7 l\u1ef1c nh\u1eb1m gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft c&aacute;c v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1ee7a Tr&aacute;i \u0110\u1ea5t, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; h\u01b0\u1edbng t\u1edbi h&agrave;nh \u0111\u1ed9ng b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 Tr&aacute;i \u0110\u1ea5t. C&oacute; t\u1ed5ng c\u1ed9ng 17 m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u01b0a ra nh\u1eb1m ch\u1ea5m d\u1ee9t \u0111&oacute;i ngh&egrave;o, ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn gi&aacute;o d\u1ee5c v&agrave; ch\u0103m s&oacute;c y t\u1ebf, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 l&agrave;:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"453\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Muc-tieu-phat-trien-ben-vung-so-4.png\" width=\"1000\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong>Tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m x&atilde; h\u1ed9i doanh nghi\u1ec7p (CSR):<\/strong><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m x&atilde; h\u1ed9i doanh nghi\u1ec7p l&agrave; kh&aacute;i ni\u1ec7m qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; c&ocirc;ng ty khi l\u1ed3ng gh&eacute;p c&aacute;c kh&iacute;a c\u1ea1nh m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; x&atilde; h\u1ed9i v&agrave;o c&aacute;c ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kinh doanh v&agrave; trong vi\u1ec7c t\u01b0\u01a1ng t&aacute;c v\u1edbi c&aacute;c c\u1ed5 \u0111&ocirc;ng. CSR \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hi\u1ec3u l&agrave; ph\u01b0\u01a1ng th\u1ee9c gi&uacute;p c&ocirc;ng ty c&oacute; th\u1ec3 c&acirc;n b\u1eb1ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c&aacute;c tr\u1ee5 c\u1ed9t kinh t\u1ebf, m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng, v&agrave; x&atilde; h\u1ed9i (ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn ba l\u1edbp \u0111&aacute;y) nh\u01b0ng v\u1eabn ho&agrave;n th&agrave;nh c&aacute;c k\u1ef3 v\u1ecdng th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a doanh nghi\u1ec7p.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf S\u1ef1 kh&aacute;c bi\u1ec7t gi\u1eefa CSR v&agrave; c&aacute;c ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng thi\u1ec7n nguy\u1ec7n: CSR l&agrave; kh&aacute;i ni\u1ec7m qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; doanh nghi\u1ec7p. M\u1eb7c d&ugrave; c&ocirc;ng t&aacute;c thi\u1ec7n nguy\u1ec7n mang l\u1ea1i l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch ti\u1ebfng t\u0103m cho doanh nghi\u1ec7p, CSR v\u01b0\u1ee3t xa t\u1ea7m thi\u1ec7n nguy\u1ec7n.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<em><strong>M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu c\u1ee7a c&ocirc;ng ty V\u1ea1n N\u0103ng Banok:<\/strong><\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><u>M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 9<\/u>:&nbsp;X&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng c\u01a1 s\u1edf h\u1ea1 t\u1ea7ng v\u1eefng ch\u1eafc, \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p h&oacute;a r\u1ed9ng m\u1edf v&agrave; b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng, khuy\u1ebfn kh&iacute;ch \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi.<\/strong><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n c\u01a1 s\u1edf h\u1ea1 t\u1ea7ng v\u1eefng ch\u1eafc, ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng, \u0111&aacute;ng tin c\u1eady v&agrave; b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng, bao g\u1ed3m c\u01a1 s\u1edf h\u1ea1 t\u1ea7ng khu v\u1ef1c v&agrave; xuy&ecirc;n bi&ecirc;n gi\u1edbi, \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n kinh t\u1ebf v&agrave; \u0111\u1eddi s\u1ed1ng con ng\u01b0\u1eddi, t\u1eadp trung v&agrave;o ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn h\u1ee3p l&yacute; v&agrave; c&ocirc;ng b\u1eb1ng cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Th&uacute;c \u0111\u1ea9y c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p h&oacute;a r\u1ed9ng m\u1edf v&agrave; b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng, v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m 2030, t\u0103ng \u0111&aacute;ng k\u1ec3 th\u1ecb ph\u1ea7n lao \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a ng&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; t\u1ef7 tr\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p trong t\u1ed5ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m qu\u1ed1c n\u1ed9i, ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi t&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh t&agrave;i ch&iacute;nh qu\u1ed1c gia, v&agrave; t\u0103ng g\u1ea5p \u0111&ocirc;i th\u1ecb ph\u1ea7n n&agrave;y \u1edf c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc k&eacute;m ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf T\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn c&aacute;c d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 t&agrave;i ch&iacute;nh, bao g\u1ed3m c\u1ea3 t&iacute;n d\u1ee5ng h\u1ee3p l&yacute;, cho c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p quy m&ocirc; nh\u1ecf trong ng&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p kh&aacute;c, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; \u1edf c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ang ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n, v&agrave; gia t\u0103ng s\u1ef1 h\u1ed9i nh\u1eadp c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p n&agrave;y trong chu\u1ed7i gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb v&agrave; th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf \u0110\u1ebfn n\u0103m 2030, n&acirc;ng c\u1ea5p c\u01a1 s\u1edf h\u1ea1 t\u1ea7ng v&agrave; trang b\u1ecb th&ecirc;m cho c&aacute;c ng&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ec3 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng, gia t\u0103ng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n, v&agrave; \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 s\u1ea1ch v&agrave; th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng c&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p h&oacute;a, v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 tham gia c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c qu\u1ed1c gia ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u1ee9ng c\u1ee7a m\u1ed7i n\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><u>M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 11<\/u>: Th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 v&agrave; c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng.<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&quot;Bi\u1ebfn c&aacute;c th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 v&agrave; khu d&acirc;n c\u01b0 th&agrave;nh m\u1ed9t n\u01a1i bao qu&aacute;t, an to&agrave;n, ti\u1ebfn b\u1ed9 v&agrave; b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng.&quot;<br \/>\r\n\u25cf M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u l&agrave; v&agrave;o n\u0103m 2030 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n c&oacute; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn nh&agrave; \u1edf an to&agrave;n v&agrave; gi&aacute; c\u1ea3 ph\u1ea3i ch\u0103ng . Ch\u1ec9 s\u1ed1 (%) \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d&ugrave;ng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111o ti\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed9 m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u, d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n ph\u1ea7n tr\u0103m s\u1ed1 d&acirc;n th&agrave;nh th\u1ecb s\u1ed1ng trong c&aacute;c khu \u1ed5 chu\u1ed9t v&agrave; c&aacute;c khu \u0111\u1ecbnh c\u01b0 kh&ocirc;ng ch&iacute;nh th\u1ee9c .T\u1eeb n\u0103m 2000 \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m 2014, t\u1ef7 tr\u1ecdng \u0111&atilde; gi\u1ea3m t\u1eeb 39% xu\u1ed1ng 30%. Tuy nhi&ecirc;n, c&oacute; s\u1ed1 &iacute;t nh&oacute;m ng\u01b0\u1eddi tuy\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed1i s\u1ed1ng trong c&aacute;c khu \u1ed5 chu\u1ed9t t\u0103ng t\u1eeb 792 tri\u1ec7u ng\u01b0\u1eddi n\u0103m 2000 l&ecirc;n t\u1edbi x\u1ea5p x\u1ec9 880 tri\u1ec7u ng\u01b0\u1eddi v&agrave;o n\u0103m 2014. S\u1ef1 di c\u01b0 t\u1eeb n&ocirc;ng th&ocirc;n l&ecirc;n th&agrave;nh th\u1ecb t\u0103ng nhanh khi d&acirc;n s\u1ed1 t\u0103ng v&agrave; c&oacute; nhi\u1ec1u l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn thay th\u1ebf t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n cho nh&agrave; \u1edf c&oacute; s\u1eb5n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\n<strong><u>M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 12<\/u><\/strong>: <strong>Tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m trong S\u1ea3n Xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; Ti&ecirc;u D&ugrave;ng<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&quot;\u0110\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o c&aacute;c m&ocirc; h&igrave;nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng.&quot;<br \/>\r\n\u25cf M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 12 bao g\u1ed3m vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c&aacute;c&nbsp;ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ph&aacute;p s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t <strong>th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng<\/strong>&nbsp;v&agrave; l&agrave;m gi\u1ea3m l\u01b0\u1ee3ng r&aacute;c th\u1ea3i. K\u1ef3 v\u1ecdng v&agrave;o n\u0103m 2030, t\u1ef7 l\u1ec7 t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf&nbsp;c\u1ee7a qu\u1ed1c gia s\u1ebd t\u0103ng l&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ebfn h&agrave;ng t\u1ea5n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf. Xa h\u01a1n, c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ty n&ecirc;n b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng c&aacute;c k\u0129 thu\u1eadt mang t&iacute;nh l&acirc;u d&agrave;i v&agrave; c&ocirc;ng b\u1ed1 c&aacute;c b&aacute;o c&aacute;o c&oacute; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u \u0111i \u0111\u1ea7u l&agrave; k&ecirc;u g\u1ecdi th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng tr&igrave;nh 10 n\u0103m S\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; Ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng B\u1ec1n v\u1eefng.&nbsp;Khu&ocirc;n kh\u1ed5 n&agrave;y c\u1ee7a ch\u01b0\u01a1ng tr&igrave;nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c&aacute;c qu\u1ed1c gia th&agrave;nh vi&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ed3ng thu\u1eadn t\u1ea1i H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb v\u1ec1 Ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng c\u1ee7a Li&ecirc;n H\u1ee3p Qu\u1ed1c, l&agrave; m\u1ed9t cam k\u1ebft to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u gi&uacute;p \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh chuy\u1ec3n d\u1ecbch sang s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng \u1edf c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111&atilde; v&agrave; \u0111ang ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n.&nbsp;\u0110\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o ra t\u1ed5ng t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft cho b\u01b0\u1edbc nh\u1ea3y v\u1ecdt n&agrave;y, c&aacute;c ch\u01b0\u01a1ng tr&igrave;nh nh\u01b0 M\u1ea1ng M\u1ed9t H&agrave;nh tinh \u0111&atilde; x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng c&aacute;c ph\u01b0\u01a1ng &aacute;n kh&aacute;c nhau \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 12.&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"348\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(14).jpg\" width=\"1000\" \/><br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><u>M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 13<\/u>: H&agrave;nh \u0111\u1ed9ng v&igrave; kh&iacute; h\u1eadu<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&quot;C&oacute; bi\u1ec7n ph&aacute;p kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1ed1ng l\u1ea1i bi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed5i kh&iacute; h\u1eadu v&agrave; c&aacute;c t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a n&oacute;.&quot;<br \/>\r\n\u25cf T\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ph\u1ee5c h\u1ed3i v&agrave; th&iacute;ch \u1ee9ng v\u1edbi c&aacute;c hi\u1ec3m h\u1ecda li&ecirc;n quan \u0111\u1ebfn kh&iacute; h\u1eadu v&agrave; thi&ecirc;n tai \u1edf t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c qu\u1ed1c gia.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf T&iacute;ch h\u1ee3p c&aacute;c bi\u1ec7n ph&aacute;p bi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed5i kh&iacute; h\u1eadu v&agrave;o c&aacute;c ch&iacute;nh s&aacute;ch qu\u1ed1c gia, chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c v&agrave; quy ho\u1ea1ch.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf C\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n gi&aacute;o d\u1ee5c, n&acirc;ng cao nh\u1eadn th\u1ee9c v&agrave; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng c\u1ee7a con ng\u01b0\u1eddi v&agrave; c&aacute;c th\u1ec3 ch\u1ebf v\u1ec1 gi\u1ea3m nh\u1eb9 r\u1ee7i ro thi&ecirc;n tai, th&iacute;ch \u1ee9ng, gi\u1ea3m nh\u1eb9 t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; c\u1ea3nh b&aacute;o s\u1edbm.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n cam k\u1ebft trong C&ocirc;ng \u01b0\u1edbc khung c\u1ee7a Li&ecirc;n h\u1ee3p qu\u1ed1c v\u1ec1 bi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed5i kh&iacute; h\u1eadu \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed3ng &yacute; b\u1edbi c&aacute;c b&ecirc;n tham gia l&agrave; c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u c&ugrave;ng huy \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c 100 t\u1ef7 USD h&agrave;ng n\u0103m cho \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m 2020 t\u1eeb t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c ngu\u1ed3n \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ang ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n trong b\u1ed1i c\u1ea3nh nh\u1eefng bi\u1ec7n ph&aacute;p gi\u1ea3m nh\u1eb9 c&oacute; &yacute; ngh\u0129a v&agrave; minh b\u1ea1ch trong vi\u1ec7c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n v&agrave; v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 Qu\u1ef9 Kh&iacute; h\u1eadu Xanh th&ocirc;ng qua v\u1ed1n c\u1ee7a qu\u1ef9 n&agrave;y c&agrave;ng s\u1edbm c&agrave;ng t\u1ed1t.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Th&uacute;c \u0111\u1ea9y c&aacute;c c\u01a1 ch\u1ebf \u0111\u1ec3 n&acirc;ng cao n\u0103ng l\u1ef1c qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; v&agrave; quy ho\u1ea1ch thay \u0111\u1ed5i li&ecirc;n quan \u0111\u1ebfn kh&iacute; h\u1eadu hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 \u1edf c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ang ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n v&agrave; c&aacute;c qu\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ea3o nh\u1ecf \u0111ang ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n, bao g\u1ed3m vi\u1ec7c t\u1eadp trung v&agrave;o ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef, ng\u01b0\u1eddi tr\u1ebb tu\u1ed5i v&agrave; c&aacute;c c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng v&agrave; nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ecb g\u1ea1t ra ngo&agrave;i l\u1ec1.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><u>M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 15<\/u>: S\u1ef1 s\u1ed1ng tr&ecirc;n c\u1ea1n<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&quot;B\u1ea3o v\u1ec7, ph\u1ee5c h\u1ed3i v&agrave; th&uacute;c \u0111\u1ea9y s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng c&aacute;c h\u1ec7 sinh th&aacute;i tr&ecirc;n c\u1ea1n, qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng c&aacute;c khu r\u1eebng, ch\u1ed1ng sa m\u1ea1c h&oacute;a, ng\u0103n ch\u1eb7n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea9y l&ugrave;i suy tho&aacute;i \u0111\u1ea5t v&agrave; ng\u0103n ch\u1eb7n m\u1ea5t \u0111a d\u1ea1ng sinh h\u1ecdc .&quot;<br \/>\r\n\u25cf M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u n&agrave;y n&ecirc;u r&otilde; c&aacute;c ti&ecirc;u \u0111i\u1ec3m cho vi\u1ec7c b\u1ea3o t\u1ed3n \u0111a d\u1ea1ng sinh h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c h\u1ec7 sinh th&aacute;i r\u1eebng, sa m\u1ea1c v&agrave; n&uacute;i, theo t\u1ef7 l\u1ec7 ph\u1ea7n tr\u0103m c\u1ee7a t\u1ed5ng di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch \u0111\u1ea5t. C&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea1t &quot;s\u1ef1 trung l\u1eadp v\u1ec1 suy tho&aacute;i \u0111\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi&quot; b\u1eb1ng c&aacute;ch kh&ocirc;i ph\u1ee5c nh\u1eefng khu r\u1eebng b\u1ecb suy tho&aacute;i v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea5t b\u1ecb m\u1ea5t do h\u1ea1n h&aacute;n, l\u0169 l\u1ee5t. M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 15 k&ecirc;u g\u1ecdi s\u1ef1 quan t&acirc;m nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c ng\u0103n ch\u1eb7n s\u1ef1 x&acirc;m l\u1ea5n c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c lo&agrave;i du nh\u1eadp v&agrave; b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n c&aacute;c lo&agrave;i c&oacute; nguy c\u01a1 tuy\u1ec7t ch\u1ee7ng. R\u1eebng \u0111&oacute;ng vai tr&ograve; n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt trong th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng c\u1ee7a Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng tr&igrave;nh ngh\u1ecb s\u1ef1 2030, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; v\u1ec1 c&aacute;c d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 h\u1ec7 sinh th&aacute;i, sinh k\u1ebf v&agrave; n\u1ec1n kinh t\u1ebf xanh; nh\u01b0ng \u0111i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y s\u1ebd \u0111&ograve;i h\u1ecfi nh\u1eefng \u01b0u ti&ecirc;n r&otilde; r&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft nh\u1eefng c&acirc;n b\u1eb1ng ch&iacute;nh v&agrave; huy \u0111\u1ed9ng hi\u1ec7p l\u1ef1c v\u1edbi c&aacute;c m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng kh&aacute;c (SDGs).<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><strong>M\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u 17<\/strong><\/u>: <strong>Quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c cho c&aacute;c m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&quot;\u0110\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh c&aacute;ch th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n v&agrave; \u0111em l\u1ea1i s\u1ee9c s\u1ed1ng m\u1edbi cho quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u \u0111\u1ec3 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng.&quot;<br \/>\r\n\u25cf \u0110\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c B\u1eafc-Nam, Nam-Nam, h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c khu v\u1ef1c tam gi&aacute;c v&agrave; h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf v&agrave; ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn khoa h\u1ecdc, c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi,&nbsp;t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng chia s\u1ebb ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 c&aacute;c \u0111i\u1ec1u kho\u1ea3n \u0111&atilde; tho\u1ea3 thu\u1eadn, th&ocirc;ng qua c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n s\u1ef1 ph\u1ed1i h\u1ee3p gi\u1eefa c&aacute;c c\u01a1 ch\u1ebf hi\u1ec7n h&agrave;nh, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; c\u1ea5p Li&ecirc;n H\u1ee3p Qu\u1ed1c v&agrave; th&ocirc;ng qua m\u1ed9t c\u01a1 ch\u1ebf t\u1ea1o thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i cho c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Th&uacute;c \u0111\u1ea9y s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n, chuy\u1ec3n giao, ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn v&agrave; truy\u1ec1n b&aacute; c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1edbi c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ang ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec1u kho\u1ea3n c&oacute; l\u1ee3i&nbsp;<br \/>\r\n\u25cf T\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u cho ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ed5 sung b\u1edfi c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c nhi\u1ec1u b&ecirc;n li&ecirc;n quan nh\u1eb1m huy \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; chia s\u1ebb ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c, chuy&ecirc;n m&ocirc;n,&nbsp;c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 v&agrave; ngu\u1ed3n l\u1ef1c t&agrave;i ch&iacute;nh \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 vi\u1ec7c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n c&aacute;c m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng \u1edf t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ang ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Khuy\u1ec3n kh&iacute;ch v&agrave; th&uacute;c \u0111\u1ea9y c&aacute;c m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3, quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng-t\u01b0 v&agrave; x&atilde; h\u1ed9i d&acirc;n s\u1ef1 , x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng tr&ecirc;n kinh nghi\u1ec7m v&agrave; ngu\u1ed3n l\u1ef1c quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp;<img alt=\"\" height=\"281\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/thumb_1592962393_hinh-toska(1).png\" width=\"800\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong><em><u>Ngu\u1ed3n<\/u><\/em><\/strong>:&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/vbcsd.vn\/detail.asp?id=656\">http:\/\/vbcsd.vn\/detail.asp?id=656<\/a><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><strong><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">So what are SDGs?<\/span><\/strong><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n<strong>SDGs<\/strong> (<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">stand<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">&nbsp;for &ldquo;<strong>Sustainable Development Goals<\/strong>&rdquo;), also known as sustainable development goals, has been agreed by 193 member states of the United Nations Council and <\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">has been<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">&nbsp;use<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">d<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">&nbsp;at the Sustainable Development Conference organized by the United Nations held in 2015.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cfWith the long-term goal of creating a society of sustainable development until 2030, countries around the world including developed countries must work together to solve the problems of the Earth, especially is to take action to protect the Earth. There are a total of 17 goals set forth to end poverty, disseminate education and health care, namely:<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"453\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Muc-tieu-phat-trien-ben-vung-so-4.png\" width=\"1000\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><strong>Corporate Social Responsibility<\/strong> (<strong>CSR<\/strong>):<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Corporate social responsibility is a corporate management concept when integrating environmental and social aspects into business activities and in interactions with shareholders. CSR is understood as a way for a company to balance economic, environmental, and social pillars (reaching the bottom three) while still fulfilling the commercial expectations of the business.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n\u25cf The difference between CSR and philanthropic activities: CSR is a corporate management concept. While philanthropy benefits a business&#39; reputation, CSR goes beyond philanthropy.<\/span><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<em><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Main development goals of<\/span><strong><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">&nbsp;<u>Van Nang Banok Company<\/u>:<\/span><\/strong><\/em><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n<strong><u>Goal 9<\/u>: &nbsp;Build solid infrastructure, promote open and sustainable industrialization, and encourage innovation.<\/strong><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Develop solid, quality, reliable and sustainable infrastructure, including regional and transboundary infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on reasonality and justice to all.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Promote open and sustainable industrialization and to 2030, significantly increase the labor market industry and the industry in domestic product, consistent with the national financial situation , and double this section in less developed countries.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Increase access to financial services, including affordable credit, for small-scale enterprises in industry and other businesses, particularly in developing countries, and increase the integration of these enterprises in value chains and markets.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and equip more for industries for sustainable development, increase resource efficiency, and apply more clean and environmentally friendly technologies along with the process of industrialization, with the participation of countries in accordance with the respective capabilities of each country.<\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><u>Goal 11<\/u>: Sustainable cities and communities.<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&quot;Make cities and neighborhoods inclusive, safe, progressive and sustainable.&quot;<br \/>\r\n\u25cf The goal is to ensure that by 2030 people have access to safe and affordable housing. The index (%) is used to measure target progress, based on the percentage of urban population living in slums and informal settlements. Between 2000 and 2014, the share has decreased from 39 % down to 30%. However, there is an absolute minority of people living in slums, which increased from 792 million people in 2000 to approximately 880 million people in 2014. Migration from rural to urban areas increased rapidly as the population increased and there are much better alternatives to housing available.<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><u><strong>Goal 12<\/strong><\/u>: <strong>Responsi<\/strong><\/span><strong><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">ble Consumption And<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">&nbsp;Production<\/span><\/strong><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n&quot;Ensure sustainable patterns of production and consumption.&quot;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Goal 12 includes the use of environmentally friendly production methods and reduce the amount of waste. It is expected that by 2030, the country&#39;s recycling rate will increase to tons of recycled materials. Going forward, companies should start applying sustainable techniques and publish potentially sustainable reports.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n\u25cf The leading goal is to call for the implementation of the 10-year Sustainable Production and Consumption Program. This framework of the program, agreed by Member States at the United Nations Conference on Sustainable Development, is a global commitment to help accelerate the transition to sustainable production and consumption in developed countries and growing. To create the total impact needed for this <\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">step<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">, programs like the One Planet Network have developed various options for the successful implementation of Goal 12.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"348\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(15).jpg\" width=\"1000\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><u>Goal 13:<\/u> Climate action<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&quot;There is urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.&quot;<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cf <\/span>Strengthen resilience and adaptation to climate-related hazards and disasters in all countries.<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cf <\/span>Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and plans.<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cf <\/span>Improve education, awareness and capacity of people and institutions on disaster risk reduction, adaptation, mitigation and early warning.<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cf <\/span>Implement commitments in the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change agreed by the developed country parties to achieve the goal of jointly mobilizing USD 100 billion annually by 2020 from all sources to address the needs of developing countries in the context of meaningful and transparent mitigation measures in the full implementation and operation of the Green Climate Fund through its capital as soon as possible. the better.<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cf <\/span>Promote mechanisms to build capacity for effective climate-related change planning and management in developing countries and small island developing states, including with a focus on women, young people age and local communities and marginalized people.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><u>Goal 15:<\/u> Life on land<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&quot;Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, prevent and reverse land degradation, and halt biodiversity loss.&quot; &quot;<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">\u25cf <\/span>This goal outlines the focus for biodiversity conservation of forest, desert and mountain ecosystems, as a percentage of the total land area. &quot;World soil degradation neutrality&quot; can be achieved by restoring degraded forests and land lost to droughts and floods. Goal 15 calls for greater attention to preventing the invasion of introduced species and greater protection of endangered species. Forests play a prominent role in the success of the 2030 Agenda, particularly in terms of ecosystem services, livelihoods and green economies; but this will require clear priorities to address key tradeoffs and synergize with other sustainable development goals (SDGs).<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><u><strong>Goal 17<\/strong><\/u>: <strong>Partnership<\/strong><\/span><strong><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">s<\/span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">F<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">or <\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">G<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">oals<\/span><\/strong><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n&quot;Strengthen the way it is done and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development.&quot;<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Promote North-South, South-South cooperation, triangular regional cooperation and international cooperation and access to science, technology and innovation, Strengthen knowledge sharing on agreed terms, through improved coordination among existing mechanisms, particularly at the United Nations level, and through a global technology facilitation mechanism.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally friendly technologies to developing countries on favorable terms<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Strengthening global partnerships for sustainable development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partners to mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources to support implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, especially developing countries.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Encourage and promote effective public partnerships, public-private partnerships and civil society, building on the experience and resources of strategic partnerships.<\/span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" height=\"300\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/thumb_1592962393_hinh-toska(2).png\" width=\"853\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><em><u><strong>Source from<\/strong><\/u><\/em>:&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/vbcsd.vn\/detail.asp?id=656\">http:\/\/vbcsd.vn\/detail.asp?id=656<\/a><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span (SDGs)","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},"223":{"id":"223","id_user":"1","id_parent":"8","tenbaiviet_vi":"Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc Bio-based - \u1ee8ng d\u1ee5ng trong ng\u00e0nh may m\u1eb7c","tenbaiviet_en":"Bio-based (Rice Husk) plastic - Applications in garment industry","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">1. <strong>Bio-based:<\/strong><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Thu\u1eadt ng\u1eef Bio-based c&oacute; ngh\u0129a l&agrave; v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u ho\u1eb7c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m (m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n ho\u1eb7c to&agrave;n ph\u1ea7n) c&oacute; ngu\u1ed3n g\u1ed1c t\u1eeb sinh kh\u1ed1i (sinh v\u1eadt). Ngu\u1ed3n sinh kh\u1ed1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc v&iacute; d\u1ee5 nh\u01b0 b\u1eafp, m&iacute;a, ho\u1eb7c v\u1ecf tr\u1ea5u,&hellip;<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">2.<strong> T\u1eadn d\u1ee5ng ph\u1ebf ph\u1ea9m n&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p:<\/strong><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc \u0111\u01b0\u01a1c t\u1ea1o ra t\u1eeb ph\u1ebf ph\u1ea9m n&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p v&iacute; d\u1ee5 nh\u01b0 v\u1ecf tr&aacute;i d\u1ea7u c\u1ecd t\u1eeb c&acirc;y c\u1ecd d\u1ea7u, v\u1ecf tr\u1ea5u t\u1eeb h\u1ea1t l&uacute;a n&ecirc;n kh&ocirc;ng \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng an ninh l\u01b0\u01a1ng th\u1ef1c.<\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><img alt=\"Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc l\u00e0m t\u1eeb v\u1ecf qu\u1ea3 c\u1ecd v\u00e0 h\u1ea1t g\u1ea1o\" height=\"323\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/bioplastics_01-.jpg\" width=\"1000\" \/><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><img alt=\"\" height=\"490\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/bioplastics_02.jpg\" width=\"1000\" \/><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">3. <strong>Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng:<\/strong><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u01a1n so v\u1edbi nh\u1ef1a th&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng do c\u1ea7n &iacute;t h\u01a1n n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ho&aacute; th\u1ea1ch \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v&agrave; th\u1ea3i ra l\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&iacute; nh&agrave; k&iacute;nh nh\u1ecf h\u01a1n.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"340\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/timthumb%20(1).jpg\" width=\"450\" \/><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><\/span><\/span><img alt=\"\" height=\"340\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/timthumb.jpg\" width=\"450\" \/><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">4. <strong>L\u1ee3i &iacute;ch c\u1ee7a nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc Bio-based:<\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf Nh\u01b0a sinh h\u1ecdc biobased c&oacute; th\u1ec3 gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m s\u1ef1 ph\u1ee5 thu\u1ed9c v&agrave;o ngu\u1ed3n t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n ho&aacute; th\u1ea1ch \u0111ang h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf, d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd tr\u1edf n&ecirc;n \u0111\u1eaft h\u01a1n \u0111&aacute;ng k\u1ec3 trong nh\u1eefng th\u1eadp k\u1ef7 t\u1edbi.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf N<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">h\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc biobased \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1eeb c&aacute;c ngu\u1ed3n t&aacute;i t\u1ea1o thay v&igrave; t\u1eeb d\u1ea7u v&agrave; theo c&aacute;ch \u0111&oacute; d\u1ea7n d\u1ea7n s\u1ebd thay th\u1ebf c&aacute;c t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n ho&aacute; th\u1ea1ch \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u1ef1a b\u1eb1ng c&aacute;c t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n t&aacute;i t\u1ea1o (ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu l&agrave; c&acirc;y tr\u1ed3ng h\u1eb1ng n\u0103m).<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf Nh\u1ef1a&nbsp;sinh h\u1ecdc biobased c\u0169ng c&oacute; ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng trong vi\u1ec7c gi\u1ea3m l\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&iacute; th\u1ea3i GHG ho\u1eb7c th\u1eadm ch&iacute; l&agrave; trung t&iacute;nh carbon. Th\u1ef1c v\u1eadt h\u1ea5p th\u1ee5 carbon dioxide trong kh&iacute; quy\u1ec3n khi ch&uacute;ng ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n . S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng sinh v\u1eadt sinh kh\u1ed1i \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc t\u1ea1o th&agrave;nh m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i b\u1ecf t\u1ea1m th\u1eddi kh&iacute; nh&agrave; k&iacute;nh (CO2) kh\u1ecfi kh&iacute; quy\u1ec3n, gi&uacute;p gi\u1ea3m CO2, gi\u1ea3m hi\u1ec7u \u1ee9ng nh&agrave; k&iacute;nh.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf M\u1ed9t l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch l\u1edbn kh&aacute;c c\u1ee7a nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc biobased l&agrave; ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng c\u1ee7a ch&uacute;ng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111&oacute;ng chu k&igrave; v&agrave; t\u0103ng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>S\u1ea2N PH\u1ea8M \u0110\u01af\u1ee2C L&Agrave;M T\u1eea CH\u1ea4T LI\u1ec6U NH\u1ef0A&nbsp;<strong>BIO-BASED (V\u1ece TR\u1ea4U)<\/strong> T\u1ea0I C&Ocirc;NG TY <strong>V\u1ea0N N\u0102NG BANOK<\/strong>:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"561\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(10).jpg\" width=\"400\" \/><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"631\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20SAU(10).jpg\" width=\"450\" \/><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:20px;\"><strong>\u01afu \u0111i\u1ec3m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt:<\/strong><\/span><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf L<span style=\"font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;\">&agrave; nh\u1ef1a h\u1ed7n h\u1ee3p tr\u1ed9n chung nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u l&agrave; v\u1ecf tr\u1ea5u v&agrave; nh\u1ef1a t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p (c&oacute; th\u1ec3 tr\u1ed9n m&agrave;u)<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf <\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf <\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>Kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ch\u1ecbu nhi\u1ec7t t\u1ed1t<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf <\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>Kh&ocirc;ng ph&acirc;n hu\u1ef7 nh\u01b0 nh\u1ef1a PMP nh\u01b0ng l&agrave;m gi\u1ea3m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u01b0\u1ee3ng kh&iacute; CO2 th\u1ea3i ra m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; gi\u1ea3m vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng d\u1ea7u trong nh\u1ef1a. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t kh&ocirc;ng gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n th\u1eddi gian s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf <\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c&oacute; t&iacute;nh ch\u1ea5t v\u1eadt l&yacute; gi\u1ed1ng h\u1ec7t nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a th&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng: m\u1ecfng, b\u1ec1n v&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ea5m n\u01b0\u1edbc,...<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf <\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>Ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ec3 treo s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m tr&ecirc;n c&aacute;c k\u1ec7 tr\u01b0ng b&agrave;y nh\u01b0 trong si&ecirc;u th\u1ecb, c\u1eeda h&agrave;ng ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i,...<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong><span style=\"font-size:18px;\">S\u1ea2N PH\u1ea8M \u0110\u01af\u1ee2C S\u1ea2N XU\u1ea4T T\u1ea0I VI\u1ec6T NAM THEO TI&Ecirc;U CHU\u1ea8N C\u1ee6A NH\u1eacT B\u1ea2N&nbsp;<\/span><\/strong><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nNgu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/www.inabata.vn\/services\/bioplastics\/\">https:\/\/www.inabata.vn\/services\/bioplastics\/<\/a>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-right:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:21.0000pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt ; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">1. <\/span><\/span><b><span class=\"15\" style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\">Bio-based:<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">The term Bio-based means a material or product (partially or entirely) derived from biomass (organism). Biomass sources are used for bioplastics such as corn, sugarcane, or rice husks, ...<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">2.<\/span><\/span><b>&nbsp;<\/b><b><span class=\"15\" style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\">Make use of agricultural waste<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Bioplastics are made from agricultural waste such as empty fruit bunches (EFB) from oil palm trees, rice husks from rice production which do not affect food security.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"Nh\u1ef1a sinh h\u1ecdc l\u00e0m t\u1eeb v\u1ecf qu\u1ea3 \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">3. <\/span><\/span><b><span class=\"15\" style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\">Environmental protection<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><b><span class=\"15\" style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\">:<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">Bio-plastics are more environmentally than regular plastics as less fossil energy is required for their manufacturing and lower green house is emitted.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"340\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/timthumb%20(1).jpg\" width=\"450\" \/><\/span><\/span><img alt=\"\" height=\"340\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/timthumb.jpg\" width=\"450\" \/><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span \/><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\">\u200b<\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">4. <\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><b><span class=\"15\" style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">Benifits of<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><b><span class=\"15\" style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">&nbsp;Bio-based plastic:<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/b><span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:12.0000pt\"><span style=\"font-family:'Times New Roman'\"><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>&nbsp;B<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">iobased plastic can help reduce dependence on limited fossil resources, which is expected to become significantly more expensive in the coming decades.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-right:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:21.0000pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt ; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf Biobased resin is produced from renewable sources instead of oil and in that way will gradually replace the fossil resources used to make plastics with renewable resources (industrial crops&nbsp;yearly).<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-right:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:21.0000pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt ; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf Biobased biobased also has potential in reducing GHG or even carbon neutral emissions. Plants absorb carbon dioxide in the atmosphere as they grow. Using biomass to produce bioplastics forms a temporary removal of greenhouse gas (CO2) from the atmosphere, helping to reduce CO2, reducing the greenhouse effect.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">\u25cf It is a mixture of materials including rice husks and synthetic resin (can be mixed with colors).<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p align=\"justify\" class=\"p\" style=\"margin-top:0.0000pt; margin-right:0.0000pt; margin-bottom:21.0000pt; margin-left:0.0000pt; padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt ; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span style=\"color:#000000\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:0.2500pt\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\">THE PRODUCT MADE OF <strong>BIO-BASED MATERIAL (RICE HUSK)<\/strong> AT <strong>VAN NANG LIMITED COMPANY<\/strong>:<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\"><span plastic. Especially no limited time to use<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><span style=\"font-size:13.0000pt\"><span style=\"background:#ffffff\"><span s\u1ee9c m\u1ea1nh<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ec3&nbsp;s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t h&agrave;ng lo\u1ea1t<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Th\u1eddi gian chu k&igrave; v&agrave; l&agrave;m m&aacute;t ng\u1eafn h\u01a1n (tu\u1ef3 thu\u1ed9c v&agrave;o \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng)<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ea3 ra kh&iacute; th\u1ea3i trong m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ed1t<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Ti&ecirc;u th\u1ee5 n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng th\u1ea5p h\u01a1n trong qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh \u0111&uacute;c<br \/>\r\n\u25cf \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1ec3 &eacute;p phun, \u0111&uacute;c th\u1ed5i, &eacute;p<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><strong>\u1ee8NG D\u1ee4NG TRONG S\u1ea2N PH\u1ea8M:<\/strong><\/u><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"480\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_2.png\" width=\"726\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nS\u1ea2N PH\u1ea8M \u0110\u01af\u1ee2C L&Agrave;M T\u1eea CH\u1ea4T LI\u1ec6U NH\u1ef0A <strong>MAPKA REBORN (GI\u1ea4Y T&Aacute;I CH\u1ebe)<\/strong> T\u1ea0I <strong>C&Ocirc;NG TY V\u1ea0N N\u0102NG BANOK<\/strong>:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"491\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(8).jpg\" width=\"350\" \/><img alt=\"\" height=\"491\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20SAU(5).jpg\" width=\"350\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><strong>\u01afU \u0110I\u1ec2M N\u1ed4I B\u1eacT:<\/strong><\/u><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n\u25cf \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m t\u1eeb ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u nh\u1ef1a Mapka Reborn, kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y ra \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng x\u1ea5u \u0111\u1ebfn m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng xung quanh, v\u1edbi kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng t&aacute;i s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, kh&ocirc;ng gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n th\u1eddi gian s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf ti\u1ec7n l\u1ee3i \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o an to&agrave;n cho trang ph\u1ee5c.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf Tr\u1ecdng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng nh\u1eb9, d\u1ec5 d&agrave;ng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng mang l\u1ea1i hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 cao.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf \u0110a d\u1ea1ng ki\u1ec3u d&aacute;ng ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi nhu c\u1ea7u kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<em><strong>S\u1ea2N PH\u1ea8M \u0110\u01af\u1ee2C S\u1ea2N XU\u1ea4T T\u1ea0I VI\u1ec6T NAM THEO TI&Ecirc;U CHU\u1ea8N NH\u1eacT B\u1ea2N.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nNgu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/ecobioplastics.jp\/en\/products\/mapka.php\">https:\/\/ecobioplastics.jp\/en\/products\/mapka.php<\/a><\/strong><\/em><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><u><strong>MAPKA&reg;<\/strong> <\/u>is our trade name of paper powder reinforced plastic composites. Based on our unique dry paper grinding system, we have developed one &amp; only business model, consisting of fiber know-how, unique machine design, processing expertise,compounding experiences and molding techniques. We must not forget the needs of customers.<br \/>\r\nWe are continuing the development of new products and applications and it can be said that paper plastic composite can meet a wide variety of conventional plastic products as shown below:<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"480\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_1(1).png\" width=\"726\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><strong>UNIQUE FEATURES:<\/strong><\/u><br \/>\r\n\u25cf New plastic resin with high renewable material content to reduce fossil based materials ideal to replace conventional plastics<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Waste paper from paper companies and paper products factories can be used to reduce carbon footprint dramatically<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Proprietary dry paper grinding technology enables the mass production of micron szie paper powder<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><strong>MARKET IMPACT:<\/strong><\/u><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Wide range of end product applications<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Competitive price by using waste paper<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Improve your brand image and claim bio-based origin<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Recyclable both for material recycling and thermal recycling<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Global need increasing for this new eco-friendly bio-plastics<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><strong>MAPKA&reg; DIFFERENCES:<\/strong><\/u><br \/>\r\n\u25cf Principal ingredients are paper powder and polyolefin (mainly polypropylene)<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Lower shrinkage rate<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Improve heat resistance (good for microwave and dish washer)<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Improve sonic function (vibration damping and sound attenuation)<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Improve stiffness and strength<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Consistent high quality for mass production<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Shorter cycle &amp; cooling time (depending on applications)<br \/>\r\n\u25cf No toxic gas emission in case of incineration<br \/>\r\n\u25cf BPA Free<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Lower energy consumption during the molding process<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Designed for injection molding, blow molding, extrusion including sheet and thermoforming<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Available both in master batch form for custom compounders and ready-to-mold thermoplastic composite pellets for molder<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<u><strong>APPLICATION EXAMPLES:<\/strong><\/u><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"480\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_2.png\" width=\"726\" h\u1ed7n h\u1ee3p Mapka Reborn (Gi\u1ea5y t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf) - \u1ee8ng d\u1ee5ng trong ng\u00e0nh may m\u1eb7c","seo_title_en":"The composite Plastic Mapka Reborn ((Recycled material with Paper contents) - Applications in garment industry","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"Nh\u1ef1a h\u1ed7n h\u1ee3p Mapka Reborn (Gi\u1ea5y t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf) - \u1ee8ng d\u1ee5ng trong ng\u00e0nh may m\u1eb7c","seo_keywords_en":"The composite Plastic Mapka Reborn ((Recycled material with Paper contents) - Applications in garment industry","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"Nh\u1ef1a contents) - Applications in garment industry","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},"204":{"id":"204","id_user":"1","id_parent":"8","tenbaiviet_vi":"Nh\u1ef1a t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf PP - D\u00e2y treo th\u1ebb b\u00e0i - \u1ee8ng d\u1ee5ng trong ngh\u00e0nh may m\u1eb7c","tenbaiviet_en":"Recycle PP - String Fasteners And Applications In Garment Industry","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"","mota_en":"<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"239\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_1.png\" width=\"300\" \/><\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"239\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_1.png\" width=\"300\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Polypropylene (PP) l&agrave; m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i polymer nhi\u1ec7t d\u1ebbo c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i trong c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m kh&aacute;c nhau. PP \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh v&agrave; b\u1ec1n v\u1edbi c&aacute;c dung m&ocirc;i h&oacute;a h\u1ecdc, axit v&agrave; baz\u01a1 kh&aacute;c nhau. M&atilde; nh\u1eadn d\u1ea1ng c\u1ee7a PP cho nh\u1ef1a l&agrave; 5 v&agrave; n&oacute; c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nC&oacute; nhu c\u1ea7u t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ed1i m\u1ea1nh tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m PP. T\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c Nghi&ecirc;n c\u1ee9u Th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng Minh b\u1ea1ch \u0111&atilde; b&aacute;o c&aacute;o r\u1eb1ng th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng PP hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u01b0\u1edbc t&iacute;nh kho\u1ea3ng h\u01a1n 80 t\u1ef7 \u0111&ocirc; la tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi. Theo c\u01a1 quan nghi&ecirc;n c\u1ee9u, \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m 2023, n&oacute; s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ea1t 133,3 t\u1ef7 \u0111&ocirc; la.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:20px;\"><strong>T\u1ea7m quan tr\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a vi\u1ec7c t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf Polypropylene:&nbsp;<\/strong><\/span><br \/>\r\nPP c&oacute; tu\u1ed5i th\u1ecd ng\u1eafn, v&igrave; v\u1eady h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft \u0111\u1ea5t nh\u1ef1a nhi\u1ec7t d\u1ebbo n&agrave;y s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c v\u1ee9t b\u1ecf \u1edf b&atilde;i ch&ocirc;n l\u1ea5p. Theo C\u01a1 quan B\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 M&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng Hoa K\u1ef3, kho\u1ea3ng 20% \u200b\u200bch\u1ea5t th\u1ea3i r\u1eafn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea1o ra bao g\u1ed3m m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 d\u1ea1ng nh\u1ef1a trong \u0111&oacute; c&oacute; PP. PP ch\u1ee9a ch\u1ea5t th\u1ea3i r\u1eafn trong c&aacute;c b&atilde;i ch&ocirc;n l\u1ea5p, lo\u1ea1i ch\u1ea5t th\u1ea3i n&agrave;y xu\u1ed1ng c\u1ea5p r\u1ea5t ch\u1eadm, kho\u1ea3ng 20 \u0111\u1ebfn 30 n\u0103m m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n. \u0110i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y t\u1ea5t nhi&ecirc;n g&acirc;y ra m\u1ed9t m\u1ed1i \u0111e d\u1ecda nghi&ecirc;m tr\u1ecdng cho c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng. C&aacute;c ch\u1ea5t ph\u1ee5 gia \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong nh\u1ef1a c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ch\u1ee9a c&aacute;c ch\u1ea5t g&acirc;y &ocirc; nhi\u1ec5m nh\u01b0 ch&igrave; v&agrave; cadmium. Cadmium ch\u1ee9a nh\u1ef1a c&oacute; kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng th\u1ea9m th\u1ea5u v&agrave; c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng sinh h\u1ecdc nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ecbnh. Khi nh\u1ef1a nhi\u1ec7t d\u1ebbo nh\u01b0 PP b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed1t ch&aacute;y, n&oacute; c&oacute; th\u1ec3 th\u1ea3i ra ch\u1ea5t g&acirc;y &ocirc; nhi\u1ec5m v&agrave; vinyl clorua. T&aacute;i ch\u1ebf polypropylene l&agrave; l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7n c&oacute; \u0111\u1ec3 x\u1eed l&yacute; t&igrave;nh hu\u1ed1ng n&agrave;y theo c&aacute;ch th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m chi ph&iacute;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:20px;\"><strong>L\u1ee3i &iacute;ch m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a PP t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf:<\/strong><\/span><br \/>\r\nKhi PP \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf, vi\u1ec7c ti&ecirc;u th\u1ee5 c&aacute;c ngu\u1ed3n t&agrave;i nguy&ecirc;n th&ocirc;, h\u1eefu h\u1ea1n, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 d\u1ea7u v&agrave; kh&iacute; propan, s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3m xu\u1ed1ng. Kho\u1ea3ng 8% l\u01b0\u1ee3ng d\u1ea7u tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng (kho\u1ea3ng 400 tri\u1ec7u t\u1ea5n) \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong c&aacute;c ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ph&aacute;p s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t nh\u1ef1a th&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng v\u1edbi 4% l&agrave; &quot;nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u th&ocirc;&quot; v&agrave; 4% kh&aacute;c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t. Vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u0169ng gi\u1ea3m 88% khi nh\u1ef1a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a. Nh\u1ef1a th&acirc;n thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng th&ocirc;ng qua vi\u1ec7c t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf ch\u1ea5t th\u1ea3i.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nDo t&iacute;nh linh ho\u1ea1t v\u1ed1n c&oacute; c\u1ee7a n&oacute;, PP c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i th&agrave;nh nhi\u1ec1u m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng bao g\u1ed3m:<br \/>\r\n\u25cf M\u1eb7t v\u1ea3i&nbsp;cho qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o, c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Ch\u1ed5i&nbsp;qu&eacute;t s&acirc;n v\u01b0\u1eddn, th&ugrave;ng r&aacute;c, pallet v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n, t\u1ea5m tr\u1ea3i, khay,...<br \/>\r\n\u25cf C&aacute;c \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng d&agrave;nh cho &ocirc; t&ocirc;, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 h\u1ed9p \u0111\u1ef1ng pin, \u0111&egrave;n t&iacute;n hi\u1ec7u, c&aacute;p pin, ch\u1ed5i v&agrave; b&agrave;n ch\u1ea3i, m&aacute;y n\u1ea1o \u0111&aacute;, ph\u1ec5u h\u1ee9ng d\u1ea7u v&agrave; gi&aacute; \u0111\u1ec3 xe \u0111\u1ea1p.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf G\u1edd gi\u1ea3m t\u1ed1c.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nKho\u1ea3ng 30% polypropylene \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf t\u1eeb c&aacute;c ng&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p ch&iacute;nh, nh\u01b0ng m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn v\u1eabn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed5 v&agrave;o b&atilde;i ch&ocirc;n l\u1ea5p. Hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i, t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf PP kh&ocirc;ng mang l\u1ea1i hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 kinh t\u1ebf cao nh\u01b0 t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i polyme kh&aacute;c, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; HDPE, LDPE v&agrave; PET. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ta hy v\u1ecdng r\u1eb1ng v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng ti\u1ebfn b\u1ed9 trong c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf, \u0111i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y s\u1ebd thay \u0111\u1ed5i trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai g\u1ea7n.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:20px;\">S\u1ea2N PH\u1ea8M L&Agrave;M T\u1eea CH\u1ea4T LI\u1ec6U <strong>RECYCLE PP (CH\u1ec8 GRS)<\/strong>&nbsp;T\u1ea0I <strong>C&Ocirc;NG TY V\u1ea0N N\u0102NG BANOK<\/strong><\/span><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"491\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(7).jpg\" width=\"350\" \/><img alt=\"\" height=\"490\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/__thumbs\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20SAU.jpg\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20SAU__228x320.jpg\" width=\"349\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong>\u01afu \u0111i\u1ec3m:<\/strong><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n\u25cf L&agrave; m\u1ed9t s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1eb7t bi\u1ec7t li&ecirc;n quan \u0111\u1ebfn xu h\u01b0\u1edbng b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf S\u1ee3i ch\u1ec9 m\u1ec1m c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf Ph\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u kho&aacute; nh\u1ecf g\u1ecdn v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb9p, d&acirc;y treo c&oacute; th\u1ec3 l&agrave;m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf Sau khi thao t&aacute;c kho&aacute;, d&acirc;y treo t\u1ea1o th&agrave;nh 1 v&ograve;ng tr&ograve;n kh&eacute;p k&iacute;n kh&ocirc;ng l&agrave;m l\u1ed9 ra \u0111\u1ea7u x\u1ecf, tr&aacute;nh g&acirc;y tr\u1ea7y x\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n\u25cf&nbsp; Lo\u1ea1i s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m n&agrave;y ch\u1ec9 d&ugrave;ng ngu\u1ed3n nh\u1ef1a d\u01b0 ra trong qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ef1a t\u1ea1i nh&agrave; m&aacute;y, kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1eeb lo\u1ea1i d&acirc;y \u0111&atilde; d&ugrave;ng, kh&ocirc;ng gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n&nbsp;th\u1eddi gian s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<em><strong>S\u1ea2N PH\u1ea8M \u0110\u01af\u1ee2C S\u1ea2N XU\u1ea4T T\u1ea0I VI\u1ec6T NAM THEO TI&Ecirc;U CHU\u1ea8N NH\u1eacT B\u1ea2N.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nNgu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/blueskyrecycling.com\/vi\/news\/tai-che-nhua-pp\/\">https:\/\/blueskyrecycling.com\/vi\/news\/tai-che-nhua-pp\/<\/a><\/strong><\/em><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"239\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/Screenshot_1.png\" width=\"300\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Polypropylene (PP) is a recyclable thermoplastic polymer which is widely used in various products. PP is stable and resistant to the differents chemical solvents, acids and bases. PP&rsquo;s indentification code for resin is 5, and it is recyclable.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>There is relatively strong global demand for PP products. Transparency Market Research has reported that the PP market is currently estimated at over $80 billion worldwide. According to the research agency, by 2023 it will be hitting $133.3 billion.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:20px;\"><strong>Importance of Polypropylene Recycling:<\/strong><\/span><br \/>\r\nPP has a short life, so most of these thermoplastics land is to be discarded in landfill. According to the US Environmental Protection Agency, about twenty per cent of solid waste generated consists of some form of plastic which includes PP. It PP contained solid waste in landfills which deteriorated very slowly, around 20 to 30 years to be fully decomposed. This of course poses a serious threat to the community. Additives that are used in plastics may contain contaminants such as lead and cadmium. Plastic-containing cadmium has the ability to permeate and can affect certain bio-systems. When thermoplastics such as PP are burned it can emit contaminants and vinyl chloride. &nbsp;Polypropylene recycling is the best option available to handle this situation in an environmentally friendly and cost-effective manner.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:20px;\"><strong>The Environmental Benefits of Recycling PP:<\/strong><\/span><br \/>\r\nOnce PP is recycled, the consumption of raw, finite resources, such as oil and propane gas, is decreased. About 8% of the worldwide oil used (about 400 million tons) is used in conventional plastic production methods with 4% being &lsquo; feedstock &lsquo; and another 4% being used in manufacture. Energy usage is also decreased by 88 per cent when plastic is made from plastic. Plastic is environmentally friendly through waste recycling.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Because of its inherent versatility, PP can be recycled back into many items including:<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Fibers for clothing, industrial.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Garden rakes, storage bins, shipping pallets, sheeting, trays.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Automobile applications, such as battery cases, signal lights, battery cables, brooms and brushes, ice scrapers, oil funnels, and bicycle racks.<br \/>\r\n\u25cf Speed humps.<br \/>\r\nApproximately 30 percent of polypropylene is recycled from major industries, but a large proportion is still poured into landfill. At present, recycling PP is not as economically viable as recycling other polymers, especially HDPE, LDPE and PET. It&rsquo;s hoped that with advancements in recycling technologies, this will change in the near future.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nPRODUCTS MADE OF <strong>RECYCLE PP (GRS YARN)<\/strong>&nbsp;AT <strong>VAN NANG LIMITED COMPANY<\/strong><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"491\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(6).jpg\" width=\"350\" \/><img alt=\"\" height=\"490\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/__thumbs\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20SAU.jpg\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20SAU__228x320.jpg\" width=\"349\" \/><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<strong>Advantages:<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf This is&nbsp;a special product related to the trend of environmental protection in the world.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf Soft thread gives customers a feeling of high quality products.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf The head part is compact and beautiful, the suspension cord can highlight&nbsp;the product effectively.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u25cf After the lock operation, the hanging string forms a closed circle, not exposing the piercing end, avoiding scratching the product.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n\u25cf&nbsp; This type of product only uses the residual plastic source in the production process of plastic products at the factory, can not be produced from the used wire, unlimited to use time.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<em><strong>MADE IN VIET NAM FOLLOWING JAPANESE STANDARD<\/strong><\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><em><strong>Source from:<\/strong>&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/blueskyrecycling.com\/vi\/news\/tai-che-nhua-pp\/\">https:\/\/blueskyrecycling.com\/vi\/news\/tai-che-nhua-pp\/<\/a><\/em><\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"nhua-tai-che-pp","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"12","icon":"1618544043_MAT-TRUOC--Copy.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1618554843","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"5465","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Nh\u1ef1a t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf PP","seo_title_en":"Recycle PP","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"Nh\u1ef1a t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf PP","seo_keywords_en":"Recycle PP","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"Nh\u1ef1a t\u00e1i ch\u1ebf PP","seo_description_en":"Recycle PP","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},"167":{"id":"167","id_user":"1","id_parent":"8","tenbaiviet_vi":"Xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u: D\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn \u200b\u200bs\u1ebd \"sang trang m\u1edbi\" nh\u1edd EVFTA","tenbaiviet_en":"Exports: Expecting to \u201cturn the table\u201d thanks to EVFTA","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p><strong segoe=\"\" style=\"font-weight:bolder; ghi nh\u1eadn s\u1ef1 s\u1ee5t gi\u1ea3m nghi&ecirc;m tr\u1ecdng trong t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng quan tr\u1ecdng.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">T&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh...............<\/font><\/font><\/p>","mota_en":"<p><strong>VCN&nbsp;<\/strong>&ndash;
