This situation would change in the second half if ........<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><strong segoe=\"\" style=\"font-weight:bolder; color:#333333; font-family:\" ui=\"\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">VCN<\/font><\/font><\/strong><font segoe=\"\" style=\"color:#333333; font-family:\" ui=\"\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;- Ch\u1ecbu \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng nghi&ecirc;m tr\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch Covid-19, trong n\u1eeda \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m nay, h&agrave;ng h&oacute;a xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111&atilde; ghi nh\u1eadn s\u1ef1 s\u1ee5t gi\u1ea3m nghi&ecirc;m tr\u1ecdng trong t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng quan tr\u1ecdng.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">T&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh n&agrave;y s\u1ebd thay \u0111\u1ed5i trong n\u1eeda sau n\u1ebfu t&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch Covid-19 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ki\u1ec3m so&aacute;t tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi v&agrave; n\u01b0\u1edbc n&agrave;y t\u1eadn d\u1ee5ng c&aacute;c hi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecbnh th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i t\u1ef1 do (FTA) bao g\u1ed3m c\u1ea3 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i t\u1ef1 do Vi\u1ec7t Nam-EU (EVFTA) s\u1ebd c&oacute; hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c t\u1eeb ng&agrave;y 1 th&aacute;ng T&aacute;m.<\/font><\/font><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u hy v\u1ecdng s\u1ebd l\u1eadt ng\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3ng nh\u1edd evfta\" src=\"https:\/\/customsnews.vn\/stores\/news_dataimages\/thanhthuy\/072020\/05\/15\/in_article\/4539_4703_1-1.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><em>Making good use of EVFTA to boost exports in the second half, Vietnam still has a chance to recover export in the first half. Photo: Tuan Anh<\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:14px\"><strong style=\"font-weight:bolder\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Ba l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ed1i m\u1eb7t v\u1edbi kh&oacute; kh\u0103n<\/font><\/font><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Theo d\u1eef li\u1ec7u m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a T\u1ed5ng c\u1ee5c Th\u1ed1ng k&ecirc; (B\u1ed9 K\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch v&agrave; \u0110\u1ea7u t\u01b0), trong s&aacute;u th&aacute;ng \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m, t\u1ed5ng kim ng\u1ea1ch xu\u1ea5t nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u h&agrave;ng h&oacute;a l&agrave; 238,4 t\u1ef7 USD, gi\u1ea3m 2,1% so v\u1edbi c&ugrave;ng k\u1ef3 n\u0103m ngo&aacute;i.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Trong \u0111&oacute;, xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u \u0111\u1ea1t 121,2 t\u1ef7 USD, gi\u1ea3m 1,1%;&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u \u0111\u1ea1t 117,2 t\u1ef7 USD, gi\u1ea3m 3%.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Trong s&aacute;u th&aacute;ng \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m, Vi\u1ec7t Nam c&oacute; th\u1eb7ng d\u01b0 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i 4 t\u1ef7 \u0111&ocirc; la.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">V\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u, trong 6 th&aacute;ng qua, khu v\u1ef1c kinh t\u1ebf trong n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ea1t 41,38 t\u1ef7 USD, t\u0103ng 11,7%, chi\u1ebfm 34,1% t\u1ed5ng kim ng\u1ea1ch xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u, trong khi khu v\u1ef1c FDI (bao g\u1ed3m c\u1ea3 d\u1ea7u th&ocirc;) \u0111\u1ea1t 79,83 t\u1ef7 USD, gi\u1ea3m 6,7%, chi\u1ebfm 6,7%. cho 65,9%.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">B\u1ed9 C&ocirc;ng Th\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111&aacute;nh gi&aacute; r\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p trong n\u01b0\u1edbc duy tr&igrave; t\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ed9 t\u0103ng tr\u01b0\u1edfng hai con s\u1ed1 trong b\u1ed1i c\u1ea3nh kim ng\u1ea1ch xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p FDI gi\u1ea3m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c coi l&agrave; m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m s&aacute;ng c\u1ee7a ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u h&agrave;ng h&oacute;a.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">B\u1ed9 C&ocirc;ng Th\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111&atilde; ph&acirc;n t&iacute;ch r\u1eb1ng \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111&aacute;ng ch&uacute; &yacute; trong b\u1ee9c tranh xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u trong nh\u1eefng th&aacute;ng \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m nay l&agrave; xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a c\u1ea3 ba l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c quan tr\u1ecdng.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">C\u1ee5 th\u1ec3, trong 5 th&aacute;ng \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m, nh&oacute;m c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn c&oacute; m\u1ee9c gi\u1ea3m th\u1ea5p nh\u1ea5t 1,2% so v\u1edbi c&ugrave;ng k\u1ef3 n\u0103m 2019, ti\u1ebfp theo l&agrave; n&ocirc;ng s\u1ea3n v&agrave; h\u1ea3i s\u1ea3n v\u1edbi m\u1ee9c gi\u1ea3m 4,7% v&agrave; nhi&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u kho&aacute;ng s\u1ea3n c&oacute; m\u1ee9c gi\u1ea3m cao nh\u1ea5t 31,3%.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&quot;Do \u0111&oacute;, n&oacute; kh&ocirc;ng c&ograve;n ch\u1ec9 l&agrave; m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 gi\u1ea3m t\u1ed1c, ch\u1ecbu \u0111\u1ef1ng \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch Covid-19, b\u1ecb c\u1eaft gi\u1ea3m b\u1edfi nhi\u1ec1u \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c, xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam ng&agrave;y c&agrave;ng g\u1eb7p kh&oacute; kh\u0103n trong qu&yacute; II n\u0103m 2020&quot;, B\u1ed9 C&ocirc;ng Th\u01b0\u01a1ng cho bi\u1ebft.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Ng&agrave;nh g\u1ed7 l&agrave; m\u1ed9t v&iacute; d\u1ee5 \u0111i\u1ec3n h&igrave;nh.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Sau nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m li&ecirc;n ti\u1ebfp duy tr&igrave; t\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ed9 t\u0103ng tr\u01b0\u1edfng trung b&igrave;nh kho\u1ea3ng 12-15% m\u1ed7i n\u0103m, trong 5 th&aacute;ng \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m nay, xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u g\u1ed7 v&agrave; s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m g\u1ed7 ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ea1t 3,94 t\u1ef7 USD, gi\u1ea3m 2,5% so v\u1edbi c&ugrave;ng k\u1ef3 n\u0103m 2019 .<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Trao \u0111\u1ed5i v\u1edbi Navy News, \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i G\u1ed7 v&agrave; L&acirc;m s\u1ea3n Vi\u1ec7t Nam (VIFORES), \u0111\u1ebfn nay, h\u01a1n 80% c&aacute;c nh&agrave; xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u sang th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng M\u1ef9 \u0111&atilde; tuy&ecirc;n b\u1ed1 ng\u1eebng mua, h\u1ee7y \u0111\u01a1n h&agrave;ng v&agrave; ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i m\u1ed9t t&igrave;nh hu\u1ed1ng m\u1edbi.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Kho\u1ea3ng 81% doanh nghi\u1ec7p xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u sang th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng EU \u0111&atilde; nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th&ocirc;ng b&aacute;o h\u1ee7y \u0111\u01a1n h&agrave;ng ho\u1eb7c gia h\u1ea1n \u0111\u01a1n h&agrave;ng.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">C&aacute;c th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, H&agrave;n Qu\u1ed1c v&agrave; Trung Qu\u1ed1c c\u0169ng gi\u1ea3m 60-80%.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">V\u1edbi s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n ph\u1ee9c t\u1ea1p c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch, kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng \u0111&atilde; kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ebfn nh&agrave; m&aacute;y \u0111\u1ec3 ph&ecirc; duy\u1ec7t m\u1eabu.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Do \u0111&oacute;, c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p g\u1ed7 Vi\u1ec7t Nam ch\u01b0a k&yacute; \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng m\u1edbi cho giai \u0111o\u1ea1n 2020-2021.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">N&oacute; c&oacute; th\u1ec3 d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ebfn nguy c\u01a1 \u0111&oacute;ng c\u1eeda v&agrave; ng\u1eebng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u nh&agrave; m&aacute;y trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai g\u1ea7n, ngh\u0129a l&agrave; h&agrave;ng tr\u0103m ng&agrave;n c&ocirc;ng nh&acirc;n s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ed1i m\u1eb7t v\u1edbi th\u1ea5t nghi\u1ec7p, m\u1ea5t an ninh c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c v&agrave; an sinh x&atilde; h\u1ed9i cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi lao \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ebd kh&ocirc;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o trong th\u1eddi gian d&agrave;i.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">M\u1eb7c d&ugrave; Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111&atilde; th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng trong cu\u1ed9c chi\u1ebfn ch\u1ed1ng l\u1ea1i Covid-19, nh\u01b0ng vi\u1ec7c thu h&uacute;t \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 v&agrave; x&uacute;c ti\u1ebfn xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u ph\u1ee5 thu\u1ed9c ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn v&agrave;o c&aacute;c y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 b&ecirc;n ngo&agrave;i.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Trong khi \u0111&oacute;, \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch Covid-19 tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi v\u1eabn \u0111ang c&oacute; nh\u1eefng di\u1ec5n bi\u1ebfn ph\u1ee9c t\u1ea1p v&agrave; \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng nghi&ecirc;m tr\u1ecdng \u0111\u1ebfn n\u1ec1n kinh t\u1ebf to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u, do \u0111&oacute; qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh ph\u1ee5c h\u1ed3i s\u1ebd m\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">B\u1ed9 C&ocirc;ng Th\u01b0\u01a1ng cho bi\u1ebft, trong nh\u1eefng th&aacute;ng t\u1edbi, xu\u1ea5t nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam c&oacute; th\u1ec3 s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c ph\u1ee5c h\u1ed3i nh\u01b0ng doanh thu v\u1eabn s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3m so v\u1edbi n\u0103m 2019.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><strong style=\"font-weight:bolder\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">K\u1ef3 v\u1ecdng cho&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/strong><strong style=\"font-weight:bolder\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;EVFTA<\/font><\/font><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">B&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh nh\u1eefng kh&oacute; kh\u0103n, B\u1ed9 C&ocirc;ng Th\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u0169ng ch\u1ec9 ra nhi\u1ec1u y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u trong n\u1eeda cu\u1ed1i n\u0103m.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Chu\u1ed7i cung \u1ee9ng, th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng xu\u1ea5t nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u b\u1ecb gi&aacute;n \u0111o\u1ea1n do \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch Covid-19.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Nh\u01b0ng t\u1eeb gi\u1eefa th&aacute;ng 4 \u0111\u1ebfn nay, t&igrave;nh h&igrave;nh \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n v&agrave; c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc ch&acirc;u &Acirc;u \u0111&atilde; d\u1ea7n m\u1edf c\u1eeda tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Nhi\u1ec1u qu\u1ed1c gia \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0a ra c&aacute;c g&oacute;i k&iacute;ch th&iacute;ch quy m&ocirc; l\u1edbn, t\u0103ng chi ti&ecirc;u t&agrave;i kh&oacute;a \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed1i ph&oacute; v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch, duy tr&igrave; c&aacute;c ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng thi\u1ebft y\u1ebfu v&agrave; h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 ng\u01b0\u1eddi lao \u0111\u1ed9ng.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">T\u1ea1i M\u1ef9, v&agrave;o cu\u1ed1i th&aacute;ng 5, t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 50 ti\u1ec3u bang \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1edf c\u1eeda tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i sau hai th&aacute;ng \u0111&oacute;ng c\u1eeda \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n c&aacute;c bi\u1ec7n ph&aacute;p h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf ch\u1ed1ng l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">B&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh \u0111&oacute;, ki\u1ec3m so&aacute;t \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0111&aacute;nh gi&aacute; cao, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c coi l&agrave; y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 thu h&uacute;t th&ecirc;m \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 n\u01b0\u1edbc ngo&agrave;i v&agrave;o Vi\u1ec7t Nam.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Trong khi \u0111&oacute;, c&aacute;c t\u1eadp \u0111o&agrave;n xuy&ecirc;n qu\u1ed1c gia \u0111ang xem x&eacute;t chuy\u1ec3n d\u1ecbch \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0, \u0111&acirc;y l&agrave; c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 Vi\u1ec7t Nam b\u1eaft \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;n s&oacute;ng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 n&agrave;y.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">G\u1ea7n \u0111&acirc;y, ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ee7 Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111&atilde; chi 2,2 t\u1ef7 \u0111&ocirc; la \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi Trung Qu\u1ed1c.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ee7 Hoa K\u1ef3 c\u0169ng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ty M\u1ef9 di d\u1eddi c&aacute;c nh&agrave; m&aacute;y c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd ra kh\u1ecfi Trung Qu\u1ed1c s\u1edbm.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">C\u0169ng \u0111&atilde; c&oacute; r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th&ocirc;ng tin r\u1eb1ng c&aacute;c t\u1eadp \u0111o&agrave;n c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 l\u1edbn c&oacute; k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch chuy\u1ec3n chu\u1ed7i s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t sang Vi\u1ec7t Nam.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">C\u1ee5 th\u1ec3, LG \u0111&atilde; chuy\u1ec3n to&agrave;n b\u1ed9 d&acirc;y chuy\u1ec1n s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1eeb \u200b\u200bH&agrave;n Qu\u1ed1c sang H\u1ea3i Ph&ograve;ng.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Theo Nikkei, trong qu&yacute; II n\u0103m 2020, Apple s\u1ebd s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t 3-4 tri\u1ec7u AirPods t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng g\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n ba t\u1ed5ng kh\u1ed1i l\u01b0\u1ee3ng AirPods tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Foxconn - nh&agrave; cung c\u1ea5p linh ki\u1ec7n cho Apple \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u1eb7t nh&agrave; m&aacute;y t\u1ea1i B\u1eafc Giang.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Panasonic Vi\u1ec7t Nam c\u0169ng \u0111ang chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1ee7 l\u1ea1nh v&agrave; m&aacute;y gi\u1eb7t c&oacute; c&ocirc;ng su\u1ea5t l\u1edbn t\u1eeb Th&aacute;i Lan v&agrave;o \u0111\u1ea7u th&aacute;ng 9.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">\u0110&aacute;ng ch&uacute; &yacute;, EVFTA d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn \u200b\u200bs\u1ebd c&oacute; hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c t\u1eeb th&aacute;ng 8 n\u0103m 2020, v&igrave; v\u1eady n&oacute; s\u1ebd t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng l\u1ef1c m\u1edbi cho xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u trong nh\u1eefng th&aacute;ng cu\u1ed1i n\u0103m 2020 v&agrave; nh\u1eefng n\u0103m t\u1edbi.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">S\u1ef1 ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn c\u1ee7a EVFTA t\u1ea1i th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m n&agrave;y s\u1ebd t\u1ea1o ra \u0111\u1ed9ng l\u1ef1c cho s\u1ef1 ph\u1ee5c h\u1ed3i c\u1ee7a n\u1ec1n kinh t\u1ebf trong n\u01b0\u1edbc sau \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Tr\u1ea7n Thanh H\u1ea3i, Ph&oacute; C\u1ee5c tr\u01b0\u1edfng C\u1ee5c Xu\u1ea5t nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u (B\u1ed9 C&ocirc;ng Th\u01b0\u01a1ng) ph&acirc;n t&iacute;ch: Xu\u1ea5t v\u1edbi EVFTA, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i c&oacute; s\u1ee9c m\u1ea1nh r\u1ea5t l\u1edbn.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">M\u1ed9t v&agrave;i qu\u1ed1c gia \u0111&atilde; k&yacute; th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn v\u1edbi EU.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">\u1ede ch&acirc;u &Aacute;, EU ch\u1ec9 k&yacute; th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c v\u1edbi H&agrave;n Qu\u1ed1c v&agrave; Singapore, tuy nhi&ecirc;n, hai n\u01b0\u1edbc kh&ocirc;ng c&oacute; c\u01a1 c\u1ea5u s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 Vi\u1ec7t Nam.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Do \u0111&oacute;, v\u1ec1 l&acirc;u d&agrave;i, th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn s\u1ebd t\u1ea1o ra l\u1ee3i th\u1ebf \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh cho h&agrave;ng xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Ph\u1ea1m T\u1ea5t Th\u1eafng - chuy&ecirc;n gia th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i cho bi\u1ebft, n\u1ebfu EU ki\u1ec3m so&aacute;t \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch Covid-19 trong qu&yacute; II \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ph\u1ee5c h\u1ed3i s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t trong qu&yacute; 3 v&agrave; 4, EVFTA s\u1ebd l&agrave; c&aacute;nh c\u1eeda r\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a h&agrave;ng h&oacute;a v&agrave;o th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng EU.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng EU c\u1ea7n c&aacute;c m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng nh\u1eadp kh\u1ea9u nh\u01b0 d\u1ec7t may, gi&agrave;y d&eacute;p, \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t, \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i v&agrave; linh ki\u1ec7n \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">\u0110&acirc;y \u0111\u1ec1u l&agrave; nh\u1eefng m\u1eb7t h&agrave;ng c&oacute; kim ng\u1ea1ch xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u l\u1edbn v&agrave; l\u1edbn c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">N\u1ebfu Vi\u1ec7t Nam c&oacute; th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng t\u1ed1t EVFTA, h\u1ecd v\u1eabn c&oacute; th\u1ec3 b\u1ed3i th\u01b0\u1eddng thi\u1ec7t h\u1ea1i tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111&acirc;y \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi h&agrave;ng h&oacute;a xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u do \u0111\u1ea1i d\u1ecbch Covid-19 g&acirc;y ra.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\">&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\">By Thanh Nguy\u1ec5n\/Thanh Thuy<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\">&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Ngu\u1ed3n tin t\u1ee9c: T&Ugrave;Y CH\u1ec8NH<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>","noidung_en":"<h1>Exports: Expecting to &ldquo;turn the table&rdquo; thanks to EVFTA<\/h1>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Date: 2020-07-24<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>News Type: Marketing News<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>VCN&nbsp;<\/strong>&ndash; Suffering from the serious impact of the Covid-19 pandemic, in the first half of this year, export goods of Vietnam recorded a serious decline in all key commodities. This situation would change in the second half if the situation of Covid-19 pandemic was controlled worldwide and the country takes advantage of free trade agreements (FTA) including Vietnam-EU free trade (EVFTA) that will take effect from August 1.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"exports expecting to turn the table thanks to evfta\" src=\"https:\/\/customsnews.vn\/stores\/news_dataimages\/thanhthuy\/072020\/05\/15\/in_article\/4539_4703_1-1.jpg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><em>Making good use of EVFTA to boost exports in the second half, Vietnam still has a chance to recover export in the first half. Photo: Tuan Anh<\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Three main sectors face difficulty<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>According to the latest data from the General Statistics Office (Ministry of Planning and Investment), in the first six months, total import-export turnover of goods was $238.4 billion, down by 2.1% lower than the same period last year. In particular, exports reached $121.2 billion, down 1.1%; imports reached $117.2 billion, down 3%. In the first six months, Vietnam has a trade surplus of $4 billion.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>In terms of export, in the past six months, the domestic economic sector reached $41.38 billion, up 11.7%, accounting for 34.1% of total export turnover, while the FDI sector (including crude oil) reached $79.83 billion, down 6.7%, accounting for 65.9%.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The Ministry of Industry and Trade assessed that the fact that domestic enterprises maintained a double-digit growth rate in the context of declining export turnover of FDI enterprises was considered a bright spot of exporting commodity activities.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The Ministry of Industry and Trade analysed that the remarkable point in the picture of exporting in the first months of this year was a decrease in export of all three important sectors. Specifically, in the first five months of the year, the group of processing industry had the lowest decrease of 1.2% compared to the same period in 2019, followed by agricultural products and seafood with a decrease of 4.7% and mineral fuels with the highest decrease of 31.3%. &quot;Therefore, it is no longer just a deceleration, suffering from the Covid-19 pandemic, being cut orders by many partners, Vietnam&#39;s exports increasingly faced difficulties in the second quarter of 2020,&quot; the Ministry of Industry and Trade said.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>The wood industry is a typical example. After many consecutive years of maintaining an average growth rate of about 12-15% per year, in the first five months of this year, the export of wood and wood products only hit $3.94 billion, down 2.5% compared to the same period in 2019.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Talking to Customs News, a representative of the Vietnam Timber and Forest Product Association (VIFORES), up to now, more than 80% of exporters to the US market have announced to stop buying, cancel orders and wait for a new situation. Some 81% of enterprises exporting to the EU market have received a notice of canceling orders or extending orders. The markets of Japan, South Korea and China also dropped by 60-80%.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>With the complex development of the pandemic, customers did not come to the factory to approve samples. Therefore, Vietnamese timber enterprises have not signed new orders for 2020-2021. It could lead to the risk of closing and stopping operation for many factories in the near future, meaning hundreds of thousands of workers would face unemployment, job insecurity and social security for workers would not be guaranteed in the long run.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Although Vietnam has succeeded in the fight against Covid-19, the attraction of investment and export promotion depends largely on external factors. Meanwhile, the Covid-19 pandemic in the world is still making complex developments and seriously affecting the global economy, thus the recovery process will take a long time. The Ministry of Industry and Trade said that in the coming months, Vietnam&#39;s import and export would likely continue to recover but turnover would still decrease compared to 2019.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Expectations for<\/strong><strong>&nbsp;EVFTA<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Besides difficulties, the Ministry of Industry and Trade also pointed out many factors to support exports in the second half of the year. The supply chain, import and export market was interrupted by the impact of Covid-19 pandemic. But from mid-April to now, the situation has improved and European countries have gradually reopened. Many countries have launched large-scale stimulus packages, increased fiscal spending to cope with the pandemic, maintained essential activities and supported workers. In the US, by the end of May, all 50 states were partially reopened after two months of closure for implementing restrictive measures against the pandemic.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Besides that, Vietnam&#39;s pandemic control has been highly appreciated by the international community, which is considered a factor to attract more foreign investment into Vietnam. Meanwhile, transnational corporations are considering shifting investment, this is a great opportunity for Vietnam to catch this investment wave. Recently, the Japanese government spent $2.2 billion to support enterprises to leave China. The US government also requested American firms relocate their factories out of China soon.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>There has also been a lot of information that major technology corporations plan to move production chains to Vietnam. Specifically, LG moved the entire production line from South Korea to Hai Phong. According to Nikkei, in the second quarter of 2020, Apple would produce 3-4 million AirPods in Vietnam, equivalent to nearly a third of the total volume of AirPods worldwide. Foxconn - a component supplier for Apple has located its factory in Bac Giang. Panasonic Vietnam is also preparing to produce refrigerators and washing machine with large capacity from Thailand at the beginning of September.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Notably, the EVFTA is expected to come into effect from August 2020, so it will create a new motivation for exports in the last months of 2020 and the coming years. The approval of the EVFTA at this time will create motivation for the recovery of domestic economy after the pandemic. Tran Thanh Hai, Deputy Director of Import-Export Department (Ministry of Industry and Trade) analysed: &ldquo;With the EVFTA, we had great strength.&nbsp; A few countries signed agreements with the EU. In Asia, the EU only signed a cooperation agreement with South Korea and Singapore, however, the two countries do not have the same production structure as Vietnam. Therefore, in the long run, the agreement will create a stable advantage for Vietnam&#39;s exports.&rdquo;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Pham Tat Thang - trade expert, said that if the EU controlled the Covid-19 pandemic in the second quarter to start recovering production in the third and fourth quarters, the EVFTA would be a wide door to bring goods to the EU market. The EU market needs imported items such as textiles, footwear, furniture, phones and electronic components. These are all items that have a large and major export turnover of Vietnam. If Vietnam can make good use of the EVFTA, it can still compensate for the previous damage on export goods caused by the Covid-19 pandemic.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>By Thanh Nguy\u1ec5n\/Thanh Thuy<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>News Source : CUSTOMSNEWS<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"xuat-khau-du-kien-\u200b\u200bse-sang-trang-moi-nho-evfta","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"10","icon":"1596506570_maers.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1596506841","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"6795","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u: D\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn \u200b\u200bs\u1ebd \"sang trang m\u1edbi\" nh\u1edd EVFTA","seo_title_en":"Exports: Expecting to \u201cturn the table\u201d thanks to EVFTA","seo_title_cn":"","seo_keywords_vi":"Xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u: D\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn \u200b\u200bs\u1ebd \"sang trang m\u1edbi\" nh\u1edd EVFTA","seo_keywords_en":"Exports: Expecting to \u201cturn the table\u201d thanks to EVFTA","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_description_vi":"Xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u: D\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn \u200b\u200bs\u1ebd \"sang trang m\u1edbi\" nh\u1edd EVFTA","seo_description_en":"Exports: Expecting to \u201cturn the table\u201d thanks to EVFTA","seo_description_cn":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","gia_tri_1_vi":"","gia_tri_2_vi":"","gia_tri_3_vi":""},"166":{"id":"166","id_user":"1","id_parent":"8","tenbaiviet_vi":"Vi\u1ec7t Nam t\u1eadn d\u1ee5ng CPTPP, EVFTA \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ee5c h\u1ed3i kinh t\u1ebf sau Covid-19","tenbaiviet_en":"Vietnam takes advantage of CPTPP, EVFTA for economic recovery after Covid-19","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p><em segoe=\"\" style=\"font-style:normal; trung t&acirc;m c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t m\u1ea1ng l\u01b0\u1edbi th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i t\u1ef1 do to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u, chi\u1ebfm 59% d&acirc;n s\u1ed1 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi v&agrave; 68% th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u.<\/font><\/font><\/p>","mota_en":"<p><em>The Hanoitimes<\/em>&nbsp;- With 16 FTAs in effect or under negotiation, Vietnam has been at the center of a global network of free trade that accounts for 59% of the world population and 68% of global trade.....<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><em style=\"font-style:normal; font-weight:normal\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">The Hanoitimes<\/font><\/font><\/em><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp;&nbsp;- V\u1edbi 16 FTA c&oacute; hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c ho\u1eb7c \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111&agrave;m ph&aacute;n, Vi\u1ec7t Nam l&agrave; trung t&acirc;m c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t m\u1ea1ng l\u01b0\u1edbi th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i t\u1ef1 do to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u, chi\u1ebfm 59% d&acirc;n s\u1ed1 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi v&agrave; 68% th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Trong giai \u0111o\u1ea1n h\u1ed9i nh\u1eadp kinh t\u1ebf to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u m\u1edbi, Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u01b0u ti&ecirc;n cao trong vi\u1ec7c t\u1eadn d\u1ee5ng c&aacute;c hi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecbnh th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i t\u1ef1 do (FTA), \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; Hi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecbnh to&agrave;n di\u1ec7n v&agrave; ti\u1ebfn b\u1ed9 v\u1ec1 quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c xuy&ecirc;n Th&aacute;i B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng (CPTPP) v&agrave; Hi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecbnh th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i t\u1ef1 do Vi\u1ec7t Nam - EU (EVFTA), \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ee5c h\u1ed3i kinh t\u1ebf, theo Ph&oacute; Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Ph\u1ea1m B&igrave;nh Minh.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"http:\/\/media.hanoitimes.vn\/2020\/7\/21\/C14A2182.jpeg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><em segoe=\"\" style=\"font-style:normal; font-weight:400; color:#333333; font-family:\" ui=\"\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Ph&oacute; Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Ph\u1ea1m B&igrave;nh Minh t\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">\u1ea2nh: VGP.&nbsp;<\/font><\/font><\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Ph&oacute; th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Minh cho bi\u1ebft t\u1ea1i&nbsp;cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp c\u1ee7a ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ee7 v&agrave;o ng&agrave;y 20 th&aacute;ng 7, c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng doanh nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i doanh nghi\u1ec7p n&ecirc;n \u0111&oacute;ng vai tr&ograve; t&iacute;ch c\u1ef1c h\u01a1n trong vi\u1ec7c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n c&aacute;c cam k\u1ebft c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam trong c&aacute;c FTA v&agrave; \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t c&aacute;c bi\u1ec7n ph&aacute;p \u0111\u1ec3 ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ee7 t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng c\u1ea1nh tranh v&agrave; hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 trong b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">V\u1edbi&nbsp; FTA 16 c&oacute; hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c v&agrave;&nbsp;\u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111&agrave;m ph&aacute;n, Vi\u1ec7t Nam l&agrave; trung t&acirc;m c\u1ee7a m\u1ea1ng l\u01b0\u1edbi th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i t\u1ef1 do to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u, chi\u1ebfm 59% d&acirc;n s\u1ed1 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi v&agrave; 68% th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">T&igrave;nh tr\u1ea1ng n&agrave;y mang l\u1ea1i l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch chung cho Vi\u1ec7t Nam v&agrave; c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i l\u1edbn c\u1ee7a n\u01b0\u1edbc n&agrave;y, &ocirc;ng Minh n&oacute;i th&ecirc;m.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Ph&oacute; th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Minh y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u c&aacute;c c\u01a1 quan ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ee7 x&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh c&aacute;c th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng m\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111a d\u1ea1ng h&oacute;a c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam trong b\u1ed1i c\u1ea3nh Covid-19 ph\u1ee9c t\u1ea1p tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Theo &ocirc;ng Minh, m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 th&agrave;nh t\u1ef1u \u0111&aacute;ng ch&uacute; &yacute; c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng n\u1ed7 l\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam trong h\u1ed9i nh\u1eadp kinh t\u1ebf to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u trong nh\u1eefng n\u0103m qua bao g\u1ed3m vi\u1ec7c k&yacute; k\u1ebft v&agrave; th\u1ef1c thi CPTPP;&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">vi\u1ec7c ph&ecirc; chu\u1ea9n EVFTA;&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">ph&aacute;t huy vai tr&ograve; c\u1ee7a C\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng kinh t\u1ebf ASEAN v&agrave; m\u1ed1i li&ecirc;n k\u1ebft kinh t\u1ebf gi\u1eefa ASEAN v&agrave; c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c;&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">\u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;p t&iacute;ch c\u1ef1c v&agrave;o c&aacute;c c\u01a1 ch\u1ebf h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c \u0111a ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 l&agrave; Li&ecirc;n h\u1ee3p qu\u1ed1c, T\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c Th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i Th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi (WTO), H\u1ee3p t&aacute;c kinh t\u1ebf ch&acirc;u &Aacute; - Th&aacute;i B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng (APEC), H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb ch&acirc;u &Aacute; - ch&acirc;u &Acirc;u (ASEM), trong s\u1ed1 c&aacute;c qu\u1ed1c gia kh&aacute;c.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\">&nbsp;<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:15px\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"line-height:24px\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Ngu\u1ed3n tin t\u1ee9c: Th\u1eddi b&aacute;o H&agrave; N\u1ed9i<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:1.12em 0px; padding:0px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<h1>Vietnam to take advantage of CPTPP, EVFTA for economic recovery post Covid-19<\/h1>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Date: 2020-07-23<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>News Type: Marketing News<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><em>The Hanoitimes<\/em>&nbsp;- With 16 FTAs in effect or under negotiation, Vietnam has been at the center of a global network of free trade that accounts for 59% of the world population and 68% of global trade.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>During a new phase of global economic integration, Vietnam gives high priority to taking advantage of free trade agreements (FTAs), especially the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans &ndash; Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the EU &ndash; Vietnam Free Trade Agreement (EVFTA), for economic recovery, according to Deputy Prime Minister Pham Binh Minh.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" src=\"http:\/\/media.hanoitimes.vn\/2020\/7\/21\/C14A2182.jpeg\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><em>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Deputy Prime Minister Pham Binh Minh at the meeting.<\/em><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\nWith 16 FTAs in effect or under negotiation, Vietnam has been at the center of a global network of free trade that accounts for 59% of the world population and 68% of global trade. This status&nbsp; is mutually beneficial for Vietnam and its major trade partners, Minh added.The business community and business associations should play a more active role in realizing Vietnam&rsquo;s commitments in FTAs, and propose measures to the government to boost competitiveness and efficiency in trade protection, Minh said at a government meeting on July 20.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Minh requested government agencies to identify new potential markets and partners for for the diversification of Vietnam&rsquo;s export products amid the complicated Covid-19 progression globally.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>According to Minh, some notable achievements of Vietnam&rsquo;s efforts in global economic integration over the past years included the signing and enforcement of the CPTPP; the ratification of the EVFTA; promoting the role of ASEAN Economic Community and the economic linkage between ASEAN and its partners; actively contributing to multilateral cooperation mechanisms, specifically the United Nations, the World Trade Organization (WTO), the Asia &ndash; Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC), the Asia &ndash; Europe Meeting (ASEM), among others.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>News Source : Hanoi Times<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"viet-nam-tan-dung-cptpp-evfta-de-phuc-hoi-kinh-te-sau-covid-19","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"9","icon":"1596447968_RRR.jpeg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1596418876","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"4341","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"Vi\u1ec7t \u0111&oacute;ng g&oacute;i th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea9m ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may.............<\/p>","mota_en":"<p>\ud835\uddd4\ud835\uddfb d\u1ec7t may***<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" b\u1ecb ph&acirc;n h\u1ee7y ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n sau m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi gian ng\u1eafn do ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a vi sinh v\u1eadt khi b\u1ecb ch&ocirc;n v&ugrave;i trong \u0111\u1ea5t v\u1edbi \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n th&iacute;ch h\u1ee3p<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc12\ud835\udc1a\u0309\ud835\udc27 \ud835\udc29\ud835\udc21\ud835\udc1a\u0302\u0309\ud835\udc26 \ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc28\u0301 \ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc21\ud835\udc1e\u0302\u0309 \ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc1a\u0301\ud835\udc22 \ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc21\ud835\udc1e\u0302\u0301: c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m sau khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c&oacute; th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t&aacute;i ch\u1ebf &iacute;t nh\u1ea5t m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n v\u1edbi c&ugrave;ng m\u1ed9t quy tr&igrave;nh c\u1ee7a nh\u1ef1a th&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc01\ud835\udc1a\u0309\ud835\udc28 \ud835\udc2a\ud835\udc2e\ud835\udc1a\u0309\ud835\udc27 \ud835\udc1d\ud835\udc1e\u0302\u0303 \ud835\udc1d\ud835\udc1a\u0300\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc20: c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ec9 xu\u1ed1ng c\u1ea5p trong m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ea5t v\u1edbi \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p, d\u01b0\u1edbi t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed9 \u1ea9m v&agrave; vi sinh v\u1eadt, kh&ocirc;ng c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i lo l\u1eafng v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c gi\u1ea3m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m trong th\u1eddi gian t\u1ed3n kho ho\u1eb7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc12\ud835\udc1a\u0309\ud835\udc27 \ud835\udc31\ud835\udc2e\ud835\udc1a\u0302\u0301\ud835\udc2d \ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc1a\u0323\ud835\udc22 \ud835\udc15\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc1e\u0323\u0302\ud835\udc2d \ud835\udc0d\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc26 \ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc21\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc28 \ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc28\u0302\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc20 \ud835\udc27\ud835\udc20\ud835\udc21\ud835\udc1e\u0323\u0302 \ud835\udc0d\ud835\udc21\ud835\udc1a\u0323\u0302\ud835\udc2d \ud835\udc01\ud835\udc1a\u0309\ud835\udc27<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"1112\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/M%E1%BA%B6T%20TR%C6%AF%E1%BB%9AC(16).jpg\" style=\"float:left\" width=\"1600\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"\" src=\"https:\/\/scontent.fdad2-1.fna.fbcdn.net\/v\/t1.0-9\/102740330_1604027823086964_2780923654402072242_o.jpg?_nc_cat=108&amp;ccb=2&amp;_nc_sid=730e14&amp;_nc_ohc=gkOIYbp-ii8AX-m8uuE&amp;_nc_ht=scontent.fdad2-1.fna&amp;oh=e1a580999ae3b2cb4e66e29a2acc6c9f&amp;oe=5FB9DD68\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>\ud835\udc01\ud835\udc08\ud835\udc0e\ud835\udc03\ud835\udc04\ud835\udc06\ud835\udc11\ud835\udc00\ud835\udc03\ud835\udc00\ud835\udc01\ud835\udc0b\ud835\udc04 \ud835\udc0f\ud835\udc0b\ud835\udc00\ud835\udc12\ud835\udc13\ud835\udc08\ud835\udc02 \ud835\udc07\ud835\udc0e\ud835\udc0e\ud835\udc0a &amp; \ud835\udc02\ud835\udc0b\ud835\udc08\ud835\udc0f<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&quot;\ud835\uddd4\ud835\uddfb \ud835\uddf2\ud835\uddfb\ud835\ude03\ud835\uddf6\ud835\uddff\ud835\uddfc\ud835\uddfb\ud835\uddfa\ud835\uddf2\ud835\uddfb\ud835\ude01\ud835\uddee\ud835\uddf9\ud835\uddf9\ud835\ude06 \ud835\uddf3\ud835\uddff\ud835\uddf6\ud835\uddf2\ud835\uddfb\ud835\uddf1\ud835\uddf9\ud835\ude06 \ud835\ude00\ud835\uddfc\ud835\uddf9\ud835\ude02\ud835\ude01\ud835\uddf6\ud835\uddfc\ud835\uddfb \ud835\uddf3\ud835\uddfc\ud835\uddff \ud835\ude01\ud835\uddf2\ud835\ude05\ud835\ude01\ud835\uddf6\ud835\uddf9\ud835\uddf2 \ud835\uddfd\ud835\uddee\ud835\uddf0\ud835\uddf8\ud835\uddee\ud835\uddf4\ud835\uddf6\ud835\uddfb\ud835\uddf4&quot;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc04\ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc28-\ud835\udc1f\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc1d\ud835\udc25\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2c\ud835\udc2c: Biodegradable plastic products can be totally bio-degraded after the short time by activities of microorganisms when being buried in soil with suitable conditions<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc11\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc32\ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc25\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc1b\ud835\udc25\ud835\udc1e \ud835\udc29\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc1d\ud835\udc2e\ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc2c: the after used products can be recycled at least one time with the same process of conventional plastics<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc04\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc2c\ud835\udc32 \ud835\udc29\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2c\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc2f\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc27: the products only degrade in the soil environment with suitable conditions, under the impact of humidity and microorganisms, no need to worry about the downgrade of products during stock or using time.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\n<img alt=\"\" height=\"1112\" \ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc1f\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc26\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc1d \ud835\udc1b\ud835\udc32 \ud835\udc01\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc1a-\ud835\udc25\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc1b \ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2c\ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc20<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><br l\u1edbp<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Trong h\u00ecnh \u1ea3nh c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 c\u00f3: v\u0103n b\u1ea3n\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>+ Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf nh\u1ecf g\u1ecdn v&agrave; m&agrave;u s\u1eafc n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt ri&ecirc;ng cho 4 lo\u1ea1i s&uacute;ng, gi&uacute;p ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&ugrave;ng d\u1ec5 ph&acirc;n bi\u1ec7t m\u1ee5c \u0111&iacute;ch s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>+ Khe c\u1eafm ti b\u1eafn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn gi&uacute;p thanh ti 100 s\u1ee3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ea9y m\u01b0\u1ee3t li&ecirc;n t\u1ee5c<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>+ G\u1ea1t th&aacute;o r\u1eddi ti b\u1eafn: Gi&uacute;p l\u1ea5y ti b\u1eafn ra kh\u1ecfi d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee5 m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch nh\u1eb9 nh&agrave;ng, kh&ocirc;ng g&acirc;y h\u01b0 h\u1ecfng d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee5 v&agrave; ti b\u1eafn<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>+ Th&iacute;ch h\u1ee3p cho \ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc1a\u0302\u0301\ud835\udc2d B\u1ea3n<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>New attaching tool series from \ud835\udc15\ud835\udc00\ud835\udc0d \ud835\udc0d\ud835\udc00\ud835\udc0d\ud835\udc06 \ud835\udc01\ud835\udc00\ud835\udc0d\ud835\udc0e\ud835\udc0a<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc15\ud835\udc0f \ud835\udc13\ud835\udc0e\ud835\udc0e\ud835\udc0b \ud835\udc0f\ud835\udc11\ud835\udc0e \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>4 types were updated, expecting to suit for all different purposes:<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>+ \ud835\udc15\ud835\udc0f \ud835\udc13\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc25 \ud835\udc0f\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc28 \ud835\udc12: standard needle, for general tagging and fastening<br \/>\r\n+ \ud835\udc15\ud835\udc0f \ud835\udc13\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc25 \ud835\udc0f\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc28 \ud835\udc12\ud835\udc0b: standard long needle, for heavy and thick fabrics<br \/>\r\n+ \ud835\udc15\ud835\udc0f \ud835\udc13\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc25 \ud835\udc0f\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc28 \ud835\udc05: fine needle, for delicate fabrics<br \/>\r\n+ \ud835\udc15\ud835\udc0f \ud835\udc13\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc25 \ud835\udc0f\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc28 \ud835\udc05\ud835\udc0b: fine long needle, for thick and delicate fabrics<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"Trong h\u00ecnh \u1ea3nh c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 c\u00f3: v\u0103n \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc0d\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc30 \ud835\udc1d\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2c\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc20\ud835\udc27 \ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc1d \ud835\udc1c\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc25\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc2b: excellent design and 4 different colors help to distinguish the purpose of each Tool<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc13\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc20 \ud835\udc29\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc27 \ud835\udc22\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc29\ud835\udc2e\ud835\udc2d: VP TOOL PRO can tag out 100 pcs tag pin smoothly and continuously<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc0b\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2f\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2b: help to remove unfinished tag pin easily without damage<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Suitable for \ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc25\ud835\udc25 \ud835\udc24\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc1d \ud835\udc28\ud835\udc1f \ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc20 \ud835\udc29\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc27 in the market<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\ud835\udc0c\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc1d\ud835\udc1e \ud835\udc22\ud835\udc27 \ud835\udc15\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc1e\ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc26 \ud835\udc1f\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc25\ud835\udc25\ud835\udc28\ud835\udc30\ud835\udc22\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc20 \ud835\udc09\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc29\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc27 \ud835\udc2c\ud835\udc2d\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc27\ud835\udc1d\ud835\udc1a\ud835\udc2b\ud835\udc1d<\/p>","noidung_cn":"","tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":"","seo_name":"dong-dung-cu-gan-nhan-moi-nhat-tu-van-nang-banok","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"7","icon":"1593422769_VAN-NANG.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1593411202","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"4395","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"*** D\u00d2NG D\u1ee4NG C\u1ee4 G\u1eaeN NH\u00c3N M\u1edaI NH\u1ea4T T\u1eea V\u1ea0N N\u0102NG BANOK ***","seo_title_en":"New attaching tool series from \ud835\udc15\ud835\udc00\ud835\udc0d d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee7a d\u00e2y treo th\u1ebb b\u00e0i","tenbaiviet_en":"USE OF TAG HANGERS","tenbaiviet_cn":"","mota_vi":"<p><strong>C&ocirc;ng d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee7a d&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i l&agrave;&nbsp;g&igrave;? D&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i c&ograve;n nh\u1eefng t&ecirc;n g\u1ecdi g&igrave;? T\u1ea1i sao ta l\u1ea1i c\u1ea7n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ch&uacute;ng? \u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b........<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","mota_en":"<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"outline:none\"><span style=\"list-style:none\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><strong style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">What is the use of tag&nbsp;hangers? <\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">What are the name of the tag&nbsp;hangers? <\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Why do we need to use them?..........<\/font><\/font><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p><strong>C&ocirc;ng d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee7a d&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i l&agrave;i g&igrave;? D&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i c&ograve;n nh\u1eefng t&ecirc;n g\u1ecdi g&igrave;? T\u1ea1i sao ta l\u1ea1i c\u1ea7n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ch&uacute;ng? Ch&uacute;ng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m n&agrave;o? \u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; nh\u1eefng c&acirc;u h\u1ecfi chung c\u1ee7a t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi v\u1ec1 lo\u1ea1i d&acirc;y n&agrave;y. Ch&iacute;nh v&igrave; th\u1ebf, b&agrave;i vi\u1ebft n&agrave;y t&ocirc;i s\u1ebd chia s\u1ebb&nbsp;v&agrave; n&oacute;i v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 tr&ecirc;n. R\u1ea5t mong gi\u1ea3i \u0111&aacute;p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1eafc m\u1eafc cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi.<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&oacute; l\u1ebd m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi ch&uacute;ng ta c\u0169ng \u0111&atilde; t\u1eebng \u0111i mua qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o, gi&agrave;y d&eacute;p, t&uacute;i x&aacute;ch&hellip; M\u1ed7i m\u1ed9t s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m khi ta mua s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c treo 1 d&acirc;y. Tr&ecirc;n m\u1ed7i s\u1ee3i d&acirc;y s\u1ebd c&oacute; 1 ho\u1eb7c v&agrave;i th\u1ebb, n\u1ed9i dung th\u1ebb bao g\u1ed3m: nh&atilde;n hi\u1ec7u, xu\u1ea5t x\u1ee9, th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n, h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, gi&aacute; c\u1ea3, m&atilde; s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m&hellip; th\u1ebb n&agrave;y g\u1ecdi l&agrave; th\u1ebb b&agrave;i v&agrave; d&acirc;y d&ugrave;ng \u0111\u1ec3 treo th\u1ebb n&agrave;y g\u1ecdi l&agrave; d&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-164\" id=\"attachment_164\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"348\" src=\"https:\/\/www.chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/04\/chi-san-xuat-mac-quan-ao-2.gif\" width=\"450\" \/>\r\n<figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-164\">M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng m\u1eabu d&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p>D&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i c&ograve;n c&oacute; nhi\u1ec1u t&ecirc;n g\u1ecdi kh&aacute;c nh\u01b0: d&acirc;y theo nh&atilde;n m&aacute;c, d&acirc;y treo m&aacute;c qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o, d&acirc;y treo tem nh&atilde;n, d&acirc;y g\u1eafn tag qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o&hellip; T&ugrave;y theo khu v\u1ef1c m&agrave; s\u1ebd c&oacute; t&ecirc;n g\u1ecdi kh&aacute;c nhau. M\u1ee5c \u0111&iacute;ch c\u1ee7a d&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i \u0111&uacute;ng nh\u01b0 t&ecirc;n g\u1ecdi c\u1ee7a n&oacute; l&agrave; d&ugrave;ng \u0111\u1ec3 treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i. V&agrave; m\u1ee5c \u0111&iacute;ch c\u1ee7a th\u1ebb b&agrave;i l&agrave; bao g\u1ed3m:<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>\u0110&aacute;nh d\u1ea5u, ghi ch&uacute; l\u1ea1i t&ecirc;n nh&atilde;n hi\u1ec7u, th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u v&agrave; xu\u1ea5t x\u1ee9 c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m;<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Ghi ch&uacute; th&agrave;nh ph\u1ea7n c\u1ea5u t\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m;<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Ghi ch&uacute; h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m;<\/li>\r\n\t<li>L&agrave; n\u01a1i in m&atilde; s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m;<\/li>\r\n\t<li>L&agrave; n\u01a1i ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c&oacute; th\u1ec3 xem \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi&aacute; c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111&oacute;.<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<figure aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-485\" id=\"attachment_485\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"694\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px\" src=\"https:\/\/www.chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/the-bai.jpg\" srcset=\"https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/the-bai.jpg 1024w, https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/the-bai-300x203.jpg 300w, https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/the-bai-768x521.jpg 768w, https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/the-bai-110x75.jpg 110w\" width=\"1024\" \/>\r\n<figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-485\">\r\n<p>Nh\u1eefng k&iacute;ch th\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; m\u1eabu m&atilde; c\u1ee7a th\u1ebb b&agrave;i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p>L\u0129nh v\u1ef1c th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nhi\u1ec1u d&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i l&agrave;:<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>Ng&agrave;nh may m\u1eb7c: c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nh\u01b0 qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o, kh\u0103n, kh\u0103n cho&agrave;ng&hellip; M\u1ed7i s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m qu\u1ea7n ho\u1eb7c &aacute;o s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ra \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eafn 1 d&acirc;y treo m&aacute;c qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o. Ch&iacute;nh v&igrave; th\u1ebf, nhu c\u1ea7u s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng d&acirc;y treo hi\u1ec7n nay r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u.\r\n\t<figure aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-486\" id=\"attachment_486\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"510\" sizes=\"(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px\" src=\"https:\/\/www.chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/quan-ao-gan-the-bai.jpg\" srcset=\"https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/quan-ao-gan-the-bai.jpg 600w, https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/quan-ao-gan-the-bai-300x255.jpg 300w\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-486\">D&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eafn tr&ecirc;n qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o<\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>Ng&agrave;nh da gi&agrave;y: c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m gi&agrave;y d&eacute;p, balo, t&uacute;i x&aacute;ch&hellip; c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 qu\u1ea7n &aacute;o, m\u1ed7i s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ra \u0111\u1ec1u c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ebfn d&acirc;y treo tem nh&atilde;n. M&agrave; s\u1ea3n l\u01b0\u1ee3ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m trong ng&agrave;nh da gi&agrave;y hi\u1ec7n nay r\u1ea5t cao. Ch&iacute;nh v&igrave; th\u1ebf nhu c\u1ea7u s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m n&agrave;y r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u.\r\n\t<figure aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-487\" id=\"attachment_487\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"350\" sizes=\"(max-width: 350px) 100vw, 350px\" src=\"https:\/\/www.chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/balo-g%E1%BA%AFn-th%E1%BA%BB-b%C3%A0i.jpg\" srcset=\"https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/balo-g\u1eafn-th\u1ebb-b\u00e0i.jpg 350w, https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/balo-g\u1eafn-th\u1ebb-b\u00e0i-150x150.jpg 150w, https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/08\/balo-g\u1eafn-th\u1ebb-b\u00e0i-300x300.jpg 300w\" width=\"350\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-487\">\r\n\t<p>D&acirc;y treo th\u1ebb b&agrave;i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eafn tr&ecirc;n balo<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>Ngu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;<a href=\"https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/\">https:\/\/chuyendaychi.com\/<\/a><\/p>\r\n\t<\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>","noidung_en":"<p style=\"border:0px none;
