vertical-align:inherit\">What products are they used for?&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">These are the general questions of everyone about this type of wire.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Therefore, this article I will share and talk about the above issues.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">We hope to answer the questions for everyone.<\/font><\/font><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px none; padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 20px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"outline:none\"><span style=\"list-style:none\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Perhaps each of us everyone, everyone has been buying clothes, shoes, bags ... Each product when we buy will be hung 1 wire.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">On each string will have one or several cards, the card content includes: brand, origin, ingredients, instructions for use, price, product code ... this card is called the card and the rope used to hang the card This is called hanging tag.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-164\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\" id=\"attachment_164\" style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px auto 5px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; clear:both; line-height:18px; text-align:left; font-style:italic; max-width:100%; color:#333333; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size:13px; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; font-weight:400; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2; text-transform:none; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:#ffffff; text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; width:450px\"><img alt=\"\" class=\"size-full wp-image-164 tie-appear\" src=\"https:\/\/www.chuyendaychi.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/04\/chi-san-xuat-mac-quan-ao-2.gif\" style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; max-width:100%; height:348px; vertical-align:middle; opacity:1; transition:all 0.4s ease-in-out 0s; width:450px\" \/>\r\n<figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\" id=\"caption-attachment-164\" style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">One of the hanging strings of cards<\/font><\/font><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px none; padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 20px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"outline:none\"><span style=\"list-style:none\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Tag hangers also have many other names such as labels, clothing hangers, label hangers, clothing tag tags ... Depending on the area, there will be different names.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">The purpose of the card string is as its name implies.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">And the purpose of the card is to include:<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 20px 15px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; color:#333333; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size:13px; font-style:normal; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; font-weight:400; letter-spacing:normal; orphans:2; text-transform:none; white-space:normal; widows:2; word-spacing:0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px; background-color:#ffffff; text-decoration-style:initial; text-decoration-color:initial; text-align:justify\">\r\n\t<li style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 5px; outline:none; list-style:outside none disc; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Mark and note down the brand name, brand and origin of the product;<\/font><\/font><\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 5px; outline:none; list-style:outside none disc; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Notes the composition of the product;<\/font><\/font><\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 5px; outline:none; list-style:outside none disc; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Note instructions for use of the product;<\/font><\/font><\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 5px; outline:none; list-style:outside none disc; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">The place to print the product code;<\/font><\/font><\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px 0px 5px; outline:none; list-style:outside none disc; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">A place where users can see the price of that product.<\/font><\/font><\/li>\r\n<\/ul>\r\n\r\n<figure aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-485\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" id=\"attachment_485\" style=\"padding:0px; vertical-align:inherit\">Commonly used fields of tag hangers are:<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul style=\"padding:0px; vertical-align:inherit\">Garment industry: products such as clothes, scarves, scarves, etc. Each garment product or shirt produced is attached with a clothesline.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"padding:0px; margin:0px; outline:none; list-style:none; border:0px none; box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Therefore, the demand for hanging wires today is very high.<\/font><\/font>\r\n\r\n\t<figure aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-486\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\" id=\"attachment_486\" style=\"padding:0px; s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n th\u01b0\u1eddng ni&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, quy t\u1ee5 nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p trong n\u01b0\u1edbc v&agrave; qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf c&oacute; n\u1ec1n c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p d\u1ec7t may ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n,&nbsp;l&agrave; c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i gi&uacute;p c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p d\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi m&aacute;y m&oacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb, ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 ti&ecirc;n ti\u1ebfn, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t t&igrave;m ki\u1ebfm \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c l&agrave;m \u0103n l&acirc;u d&agrave;i, t\u1ea1o c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i giao th\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1edbi c&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Trong k\u1ef3 tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111&oacute;, Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m c&oacute; tr&ecirc;n&nbsp;800 gian h&agrave;ng c\u1ee7a 562 doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb 17 qu\u1ed1c gia v&agrave; v&ugrave;ng l&atilde;nh th\u1ed5 nh\u01b0 Bangladesh, Trung Qu\u1ed1c, \u0110\u1ee9c, Hong Kong, \u1ea4n \u0110\u1ed9, Indonesia, Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, H&agrave;n Qu\u1ed1c, Malaysia, Singapore, \u0110&agrave;i Loan, Th\u1ed5 Nh\u0129 K\u1ef3 v&agrave; Vi\u1ec7t Nam. \u0110&oacute;n ti\u1ebfp tr&ecirc;n 12,000 l\u01b0\u1ee3t kh&aacute;ch tham quan.&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><iframe allowfullscreen=\"allowfullscreen\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/ML_892fda9I\" width=\"560\"><\/iframe><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Tr\u01b0ng b&agrave;y t\u1ea1i tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m c&oacute; c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i m&aacute;y d\u1ec7t, m&aacute;y may, m&aacute;y in, nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may, thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb th&ecirc;u, thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb ki\u1ec3m tra v&agrave; \u0111i\u1ec1u khi\u1ec3n, h&oacute;a ch\u1ea5t v&agrave; thu\u1ed1c nhu\u1ed9m, nguy&ecirc;n ph\u1ee5 li\u1ec7u ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may, c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 in \u1ea5n tr&ecirc;n c&aacute;c ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u v\u1ea3i,&hellip; B&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh \u0111&oacute;, c&ograve;n c&oacute; m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 d&ograve;ng m&aacute;y in l\u1ee5a c&oacute; \u0111\u1ed9 ch&iacute;nh x&aacute;c cao v&agrave; v&ugrave;ng in \u1ea5n l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1ea1i \u0110\u1ee9c; M&aacute;y in m&agrave;u th\u0103ng hoa t\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ed9 cao s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t t\u1ea1i H&agrave;n Qu\u1ed1c; M&aacute;y \u0111\u1ee5c l\u1ed7 t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng&hellip;c&aacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb may c&ocirc;ng nghi\u1ec7p, thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb gi\u1eb7t, \u1ee7i, c&aacute;c ph\u1ee5 t&ugrave;ng thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb ph\u1ee5 tr\u1ee3 cung c\u1ea5p k\u1ecbp th\u1eddi cho kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Trong th\u1eddi gian tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m, m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1t c&aacute;c h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o chia s\u1ebb ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng th&aacute;ch th\u1ee9c c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 gi\u1ea3i ph&aacute;p cho c&aacute;c v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 v\u1ec1 th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i, d\u1ec7t may, b&ocirc;ng, s\u01a1 x\u1ee3i \u1edf Vi\u1ec7t Nam s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c di\u1ec5n ra. Chu\u1ed7i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o VTG n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed9c \u0111\u1ed1i tho\u1ea1i c&oacute; &yacute; ngh\u0129a v&agrave; cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng hi\u1ec3u bi\u1ebft c&oacute; gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb v\u1ec1 tri\u1ec3n v\u1ecdng ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n nhanh ch&oacute;ng c\u1ee7a th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng D\u1ec7t may Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>V\u1edbi s\u1ef1 tham gia \u0111&ocirc;ng \u0111\u1ea3o c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb nhi\u1ec1u n\u01b0\u1edbc, VTG 2020 h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n mang l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t di\u1ec5n \u0111&agrave;n kinh doanh t\u1ed1t, t\u1ea1o c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i giao l\u01b0u, g\u1eb7p g\u1ee1 v&agrave; th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp gi\u1eefa c&aacute;c nh&agrave; cung c\u1ea5p v&agrave; c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p. Tri\u1ec3n l&atilde;m&nbsp;c\u0169ng l&agrave; c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i cho c&aacute;c c&aacute; nh&acirc;n c&oacute; nhu c\u1ea7u mua b&aacute;n v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 trong ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may, th&ecirc;u, \u0111an v&agrave; nguy&ecirc;n li\u1ec7u ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n ng&agrave;nh d\u1ec7t may.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>L\u0128NH V\u1ef0C TR\u01afNG B&Agrave;Y<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>M&aacute;y D\u1ec7t May<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>&bull; ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n d\u1ec7t<br \/>\r\n&bull; M&aacute;y qu\u1ea5n<br \/>\r\n&bull; Ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n v&agrave; m&aacute;y ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn s\u1ee3i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<hr \/>\r\n<h3>&nbsp; M&aacute;y May Qu\u1ea7n &Aacute;o<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>&bull; M&aacute;y Ch\u1ebf Bi\u1ebfn &amp; Nguy&ecirc;n Ph\u1ee5 Li\u1ec7u Da Gi&agrave;y<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<h3>&nbsp; Thu\u1ed1c Nhu\u1ed9m, B\u1ed9t M&agrave;u &amp; H&oacute;a Ch\u1ea5t D\u1ec7t<\/h3>","noidung_en":"<p>The 20th Vietnam Int&#39;l Textile and Garment Machinery Exhibition (VTG) concurrent with Vietnam Int&#39;l Textile and Apparel Accessories Exhibition (VitaTex), Vietnam Int&#39;l Footwear Machinery and Material Industry Exhibition (VFM) and Vietnam Int&rsquo;l Dyeing and Chemical Industry Exhibition (DYECHEM); the four exhibitions jointly showcase a wide range of exhibits, covering the whole apparel industry supply chain from large to small scale textile and garment machinery and equipment, to all kinds of machine parts, fibers, fabrics, dyes, accessories, etc.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><iframe allowfullscreen=\"allowfullscreen\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/ML_892fda9I\" width=\"560\"><\/iframe><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Over the past few years, VTG has spared no effort to lead the world&#39;s leading manufacturers to introduce revolutionary and advanced products and equipment into the local market. Various companies have considered VTG as an ideal platform to enter the Vietnam market. This year, VTG as usual will be one of the most prestigious industrial exhibitions in Vietnam, and will be held at the Saigon Exhibition &amp; Convention Center (SECC) from November 25th to 28rd, which attract 520 exhibitors from 14 countries and regions, featuring more than 550 brands in 800 booths. It is definitely the must go exhibition for anyone in the textile and garment industry!<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>EXHIBITS PROFILE<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>Textile Machinery<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>&bull; \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quan h\u1ec7 ngo\u1ea1i giao v&agrave;o th&aacute;ng 9\/1973. &ldquo;Ch&uacute;ng ta h&atilde;y c&ugrave;ng nhau h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c n&acirc;ng quan h\u1ec7 l&ecirc;n t\u1ea7m cao m\u1edbi&rdquo;, Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh.<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p><img alt=\"tt\" src=\"http:\/\/thoibaotaichinhvietnam.vn\/Pictures12020\/trinhanhtuan-tbtc\/149723598.gif\" \/><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Nguy\u1ec5n Xu&acirc;n Ph&uacute;c ph&aacute;t bi\u1ec3u t\u1ea1i Giao l\u01b0u Vi\u1ec7t Nam - Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n. \u1ea2nh VGP\/Quang Hi\u1ebfu<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>T\u1ed1i 12\/1, t\u1ea1i TP. \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng, Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Nguy\u1ec5n Xu&acirc;n Ph&uacute;c v&agrave; T\u1ed5ng th\u01b0 k&yacute; \u0110\u1ea3ng D&acirc;n ch\u1ee7 T\u1ef1 do Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, Ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch Li&ecirc;n minh Ngh\u1ecb s\u0129 h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb Nh\u1eadt &ndash; Vi\u1ec7t Nikai Toshihiro \u0111&atilde; d\u1ef1 Giao l\u01b0u Vi\u1ec7t Nam &ndash; Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C&ugrave;ng d\u1ef1 c&oacute; Ph&oacute; Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng V\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0110&igrave;nh Hu\u1ec7; Tr\u01b0\u1edfng Ban T\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c Trung \u01b0\u01a1ng Ph\u1ea1m Minh Ch&iacute;nh, \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n c&aacute;c B\u1ed9, ng&agrave;nh, c&aacute;c t\u1ec9nh, th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1, c&aacute;c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c kinh t\u1ebf, x&atilde; h\u1ed9i, h\u1ed9i h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb, nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p Vi\u1ec7t Nam&hellip; v&agrave; kho\u1ea3ng 1.000 \u0111\u1ea1i bi\u1ec3u c\u1ee7a \u0111o&agrave;n giao l\u01b0u kinh t\u1ebf, v\u0103n h&oacute;a, du l\u1ecbch Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ph&aacute;t bi\u1ec3u t\u1ea1i \u0110&ecirc;m Giao l\u01b0u, Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Nguy\u1ec5n Xu&acirc;n Ph&uacute;c ch&agrave;o \u0111&oacute;n T\u1ed5ng Th\u01b0 k&yacute; Nikai Toshihiro, ng\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ea1n th&acirc;n thi\u1ebft c\u1ee7a nh&acirc;n d&acirc;n Vi\u1ec7t Nam, d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ea7u \u0110o&agrave;n giao l\u01b0u kinh t\u1ebf, v\u0103n h&oacute;a, du l\u1ecbch Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n c&oacute; quy m&ocirc; l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t t\u1eeb tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ebfn nay v\u1edbi h\u01a1n 1.000 \u0111\u1ea1i bi\u1ec3u, l&agrave; c&aacute;c ngh\u1ecb s\u0129, quan ch\u1ee9c c\u1ea5p cao, \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, nhi\u1ec1u doanh nghi\u1ec7p v&agrave; b\u1ea1n b&egrave; Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n t\u1edbi th\u0103m Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Theo Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng, \u0111&acirc;y l&agrave; s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n giao l\u01b0u \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t, c&oacute; &yacute; ngh\u0129a quan tr\u1ecdng minh ch\u1ee9ng sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng cho s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd, to&agrave;n di\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a quan h\u1ec7 \u0110\u1ed1i t&aacute;c chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c s&acirc;u r\u1ed9ng Vi\u1ec7t Nam - Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, t\u1eeb s\u1ef1 tin c\u1eady cao trong ch&iacute;nh tr\u1ecb, an ninh, qu\u1ed1c ph&ograve;ng, ngo\u1ea1i giao, r\u1ed9ng m\u1edf, hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 trong h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c kinh t\u1ebf, \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0, th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i, \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 phong ph&uacute;, chan h&ograve;a, th\u1eafm t&igrave;nh th&acirc;n &aacute;i trong giao l\u01b0u v\u0103n h&oacute;a, du l\u1ecbch, h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i nh&acirc;n d&acirc;n&hellip;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<table>\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>&nbsp;<img alt=\"tt\" src=\"http:\/\/thoibaotaichinhvietnam.vn\/Pictures12020\/trinhanhtuan-tbtc\/291185870.gif\" \/><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\r\n\t\t\t<p><em>Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Nguy\u1ec5n Xu&acirc;n Ph&uacute;c v&agrave; T\u1ed5ng Th\u01b0 k&yacute; Nikai th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n nghi th\u1ee9c tr\u1ed3ng sen Oga.<\/em><\/p>\r\n\t\t\t<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng cho bi\u1ebft, nh\u1ecbp giao l\u01b0u gi\u1eefa ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n hai n\u01b0\u1edbc Vi\u1ec7t Nam - Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111&atilde; b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch r\u1ea5t t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n t\u1eeb nhi\u1ec1u th\u1ebf k\u1ef7 xa x\u01b0a, trong \u0111&oacute; c&oacute; nhi\u1ec1u s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n g\u1eafn v\u1edbi d\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ea5t mi\u1ec1n Trung Vi\u1ec7t Nam, n\u01a1i ch&uacute;ng ta h\u1ed9i ng\u1ed9 h&ocirc;m nay. Th\u1ebf k\u1ef7 th\u1ee9 8, nh&agrave; s\u01b0 Ph\u1eadt Tri\u1ebft c\u1ee7a L&acirc;m \u1ea4p, mi\u1ec1n Trung Vi\u1ec7t Nam, \u0111&atilde; t\u1edbi Na-ra, kinh \u0111&ocirc; Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n th\u1eddi \u0111&oacute; \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u, giao l\u01b0u &acirc;m nh\u1ea1c c\u1ee7a L&acirc;m \u1ea4p v&agrave; t\u1edbi nay nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t thanh \u0111i\u1ec7u \u0111&oacute; ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ea5y trong Nh&atilde; nh\u1ea1c Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n v&agrave; \u0111&oacute; l&agrave; s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed3ng \u0111i\u1ec7u v\u1ec1 thanh &acirc;m v\u1edbi Nh&atilde; nh\u1ea1c cung \u0111&igrave;nh Hu\u1ebf Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&ldquo;Ng&agrave;y h&ocirc;m qua, t&ocirc;i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft Ng&agrave;i Nikai v&agrave; nhi\u1ec1u b\u1ea1n \u0111&atilde; \u0111i th\u0103m H\u1ed9i An, di s\u1ea3n v\u0103n h&oacute;a th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, n\u01a1i t\u1eeb th\u1ebf k\u1ef7 16-17 l&agrave; m\u1ed9t th\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ea3ng qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf ph\u1ed3n vinh, \u0111&atilde; \u0111&oacute;n nhi\u1ec1u thuy\u1ec1n bu&ocirc;n, doanh nh&acirc;n qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf, Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ebfn giao th\u01b0\u01a1ng nh\u1ed9n nh\u1ecbp v&agrave; x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng n&ecirc;n khu ph\u1ed1 Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, m&agrave; ng&agrave;y nay \u0111&atilde; tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfn y&ecirc;u th&iacute;ch c\u1ee7a du kh&aacute;ch Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n v&agrave; qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf&rdquo;, Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng n&oacute;i.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Tr\u1ea3i qua bao th\u0103ng tr\u1ea7m c\u1ee7a l\u1ecbch s\u1eed, ng&agrave;y nay, quan h\u1ec7 Vi\u1ec7t Nam - Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111ang \u1edf trong giai \u0111o\u1ea1n ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp quan h\u1ec7 ngo\u1ea1i giao v&agrave;o th&aacute;ng 9\/1973.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<table>\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>&nbsp;<img alt=\"tt\" src=\"http:\/\/thoibaotaichinhvietnam.vn\/Pictures12020\/trinhanhtuan-tbtc\/380395198.gif\" \/><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p>Tr&ecirc;n c\u01a1 s\u1edf quan h\u1ec7 h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb, h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p v&agrave; nh\u1eefng b\u01b0\u1edbc ti\u1ebfn v\u01b0\u1ee3t b\u1eadc trong th\u1eddi gian qua, Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng n&ecirc;u m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ecbnh h\u01b0\u1edbng l\u1edbn \u0111\u1ec3 c&ugrave;ng nhau h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c ph&aacute;t huy nh\u1eefng ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng to l\u1edbn.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1ee9 nh\u1ea5t, Ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ee7 v&agrave; nh&acirc;n d&acirc;n Vi\u1ec7t Nam lu&ocirc;n coi Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, c\u01b0\u1eddng qu\u1ed1c h&ugrave;ng m\u1ea1nh tr&ecirc;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, l&agrave; \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c tin c\u1eady, quan tr\u1ecdng h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u, h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c l&acirc;u d&agrave;i. Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n c\u0169ng coi Vi\u1ec7t Nam l&agrave; \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1ea1i khu v\u1ef1c. Vi\u1ec7t Nam l&agrave; qu\u1ed1c gia \u0111i\u1ec1u ph\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 ASEAN - Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n nhi\u1ec7m k\u1ef3 2018 - 2021, Ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch ASEAN 2020 v&agrave; \u1ee6y vi&ecirc;n kh&ocirc;ng th\u01b0\u1eddng tr\u1ef1c H\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng B\u1ea3o an Li&ecirc;n H\u1ee3p Qu\u1ed1c nhi\u1ec7m k\u1ef3 2020 - 2021. &ldquo;Ch&uacute;ng ta h&atilde;y c&ugrave;ng nhau h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c n&acirc;ng quan h\u1ec7 l&ecirc;n t\u1ea7m cao m\u1edbi&rdquo;, Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1ee9 hai, Vi\u1ec7t Nam v&agrave; Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n chia s\u1ebb nhi\u1ec1u l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch chung, n\u1ec1n kinh t\u1ebf hai n\u01b0\u1edbc \u1edf tr&igrave;nh \u0111\u1ed9 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n kh&aacute;c nhau, mang t&iacute;nh b\u1ed5 sung cho nhau h\u01a1n l&agrave; c\u1ea1nh tranh. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u01b0a th&iacute;ch hoa qu\u1ea3, h\u1ea3i s\u1ea3n, t&ocirc;m, c&aacute; ng\u1eeb,&hellip; t\u01b0\u01a1i ngon c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam v&agrave; ng\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ea1i ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n Vi\u1ec7t Nam \u01b0a chu\u1ed9ng h&agrave;ng \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed, xe m&aacute;y, &ocirc; t&ocirc; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao mang th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n. Hi\u1ec7n nay, Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n l&agrave; n\u01b0\u1edbc cung c\u1ea5p vi\u1ec7n tr\u1ee3 ODA l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t, nh&agrave; \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 th\u1ee9 2, \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c th\u1ee9 3 v\u1ec1 du l\u1ecbch v&agrave; th\u1ee9 4 v\u1ec1 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam. Nh\u1eefng th\u1ee9 h\u1ea1ng n&agrave;y s\u1ebd s\u1edbm \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thay \u0111\u1ed5i v&agrave; Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n s\u1ebd l&agrave; \u0111\u1ed1i t&aacute;c l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai g\u1ea7n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1ee9 ba, ti\u1ebfp n\u1ed1i nh\u1eefng giao l\u01b0u c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n t\u1eeb xa x\u01b0a, hai n\u01b0\u1edbc c&ugrave;ng chia s\u1ebb nh\u1eefng gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb v\u1ec1 v\u0103n h&oacute;a, t\u1eadp qu&aacute;n, nh\u01b0 c&ugrave;ng d&ugrave;ng \u0111\u0169a, u\u1ed1ng tr&agrave;; ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n Vi\u1ec7t Nam v&agrave; Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ec1u ch\u0103m ch\u1ec9, c\u1ea7n c&ugrave;, hi\u1ebfu h\u1ecdc, \u0111\u1ec1 cao c&aacute;c gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea1o \u0111\u1ee9c, gia \u0111&igrave;nh, k&iacute;nh tr&ecirc;n nh\u01b0\u1eddng d\u01b0\u1edbi, c&ugrave;ng y&ecirc;u th&iacute;ch s\u1eafc h\u1ed3ng t\u01b0\u01a1i trong gi&oacute; xu&acirc;n c\u1ee7a hoa \u0111&agrave;o&hellip; C\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi Vi\u1ec7t Nam t\u1ea1i Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111&atilde; tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi n\u01b0\u1edbc ngo&agrave;i l\u1edbn th\u1ee9 3 v\u1edbi g\u1ea7n 400 ngh&igrave;n ng\u01b0\u1eddi. N\u0103m 2019 c&oacute; h\u01a1n 900 ngh&igrave;n du kh&aacute;ch Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ebfn Vi\u1ec7t Nam m&agrave; H\u1ed9i An l&agrave; m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfn y&ecirc;u th&iacute;ch. \u0110\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi c&oacute; tr&ecirc;n 400 ngh&igrave;n ng\u01b0\u1eddi Vi\u1ec7t Nam th\u0103m Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1ee9 t\u01b0, t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i gi\u1eefa hai n\u1ec1n kinh t\u1ebf th&ocirc;ng qua Hi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecbnh CPTPP, v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n cao, to&agrave;n di\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n v&agrave; Vi\u1ec7t Nam h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c, \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0, chuy\u1ec3n giao c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7, ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng v&agrave; c&ugrave;ng tham gia v&agrave;o chu\u1ed7i gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb to&agrave;n c\u1ea7u.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1ee9 n\u0103m, t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ef1 g\u1eafn k\u1ebft gi\u1eefa Ch&iacute;nh ph\u1ee7, Qu\u1ed1c h\u1ed9i, c&aacute;c B\u1ed9, ng&agrave;nh, \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, giao l\u01b0u nh&acirc;n d&acirc;n hai n\u01b0\u1edbc v\u1edbi c&aacute;c h&igrave;nh th\u1ee9c phong ph&uacute;, d\u1ef1 &aacute;n h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3, th\u1ef1c ch\u1ea5t nh\u01b0 Tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Vi\u1ec7t - Nh\u1eadt. T\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ef1 g\u1eafn k\u1ebft, hi\u1ec3u bi\u1ebft l\u1eabn nhau gi\u1eefa nh&acirc;n d&acirc;n hai n\u01b0\u1edbc, nh\u1ea5t l&agrave; th\u1ebf h\u1ec7 tr\u1ebb, m&agrave; ch&uacute;ng ta c&oacute; th\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng t\u1eeb c&aacute;c s&aacute;ng ki\u1ebfn v\u1ec1 giao l\u01b0u hoa sen Oga v&agrave; l\u1eadp t\u1ee7 s&aacute;ch c\u1ee7a T\u1ed5ng Th\u01b0 k&yacute; Nikai t\u1eb7ng cho m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ecdc mi\u1ec1n Trung.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&ldquo;H\u1ee3p t&aacute;c, g\u1eafn k\u1ebft gi&uacute;p ch&uacute;ng ta c&oacute; th&ecirc;m s\u1ee9c m\u1ea1nh \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a quan h\u1ec7 \u0110\u1ed1i t&aacute;c chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c s&acirc;u r\u1ed9ng Vi\u1ec7t Nam - Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n l&ecirc;n t\u1ea7m cao m\u1edbi v&igrave; l\u1ee3i &iacute;ch c\u1ee7a nh&acirc;n d&acirc;n hai n\u01b0\u1edbc, v&igrave; h&ograve;a b&igrave;nh, \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh, h\u1ee3p t&aacute;c v&agrave; ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n c\u1ee7a khu v\u1ef1c v&agrave; th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi&rdquo;, Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng n&ecirc;u r&otilde;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<table>\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>&nbsp;<img alt=\"tt\" src=\"http:\/\/thoibaotaichinhvietnam.vn\/Pictures12020\/trinhanhtuan-tbtc\/492865082.gif\" \/><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p>T\u1ed5ng Th\u01b0 k&yacute; Nikai Toshihiro cho r\u1eb1ng, m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 hai n\u01b0\u1edbc ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p, giao l\u01b0u nh&acirc;n d&acirc;n r\u1ea5t s&ocirc;i n\u1ed5i. N\u0103m 2019, giao l\u01b0u nh&acirc;n d&acirc;n gi\u1eefa hai n\u01b0\u1edbc l&ecirc;n t\u1edbi 1.400 ngh&igrave;n ng\u01b0\u1eddi. M\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb hai n\u01b0\u1edbc Vi\u1ec7t Nam - Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111ang \u1edf giai \u0111o\u1ea1n t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t t\u1eebng c&oacute;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&ldquo;Gi\u1ed1ng sen Oga c&oacute; l\u1ecbch s\u1eed h\u01a1n 2.000 n\u0103m. Hoa sen c\u0169ng l&agrave; qu\u1ed1c hoa c\u1ee7a Vi\u1ec7t Nam. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; bi\u1ec3u t\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u1ee7a h&ograve;a b&igrave;nh&rdquo;, &ocirc;ng Nikai Toshihiro chia s\u1ebb v&agrave; cho bi\u1ebft: D\u1ef1 \u0111&ecirc;m giao l\u01b0u c&oacute; nhi\u1ec1u h\u1ecdc sinh c\u1ea5p 3 Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n th\u0103m Vi\u1ec7t Nam. &ldquo;Ch&uacute;ng ta ph\u1ea3i truy\u1ec1n m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 h\u1eefu ngh\u1ecb Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n - Vi\u1ec7t Nam cho th\u1ebf h\u1ec7 mai sau \u0111\u1ec3 m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 hai n\u01b0\u1edbc ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n. T&ocirc;i mong mu\u1ed1n h\u1ecdc sinh Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n th\u0103m Vi\u1ec7t Nam l\u1ea7n n&agrave;y c&oacute; th\u1ec3 h\u1ecdc h\u1ecfi kinh nghi\u1ec7m v&agrave; sau khi tr\u1edf v\u1ec1 Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n h&atilde;y h\u1ecdc h\u1ecfi ch\u0103m ch\u1ec9, g&oacute;p ph\u1ea7n v&agrave;o m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng nguy\u1ec7n v\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, \u0111\u01b0a quan h\u1ec7 hai n\u01b0\u1edbc ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai&rdquo;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>T\u1ea1i \u0111&ecirc;m giao l\u01b0u, Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng Nguy\u1ec5n Xu&acirc;n Ph&uacute;c v&agrave; T\u1ed5ng Th\u01b0 k&yacute; Nikai th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n nghi th\u1ee9c tr\u1ed3ng sen Oga, ch\u1ee9ng ki\u1ebfn l\u1ec5 t\u1eb7ng s&aacute;ch ti\u1ebfng Nh\u1eadt cho m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ecdc t\u1ea1i mi\u1ec1n Trung.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Theo Chinhphu.vn<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p><font 1973.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"line-height:1.5; font-style:normal; color:#001551; font-family:Arial; font-size:12px; font-variant-ligatures:normal; font-variant-caps:normal; font-weight:700; Hieu<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">12\/1 evening, in the city.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Da Nang, Prime Minister Nguyen Xuan Phuc and General Secretary of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan, Chairman of Japan-Vietnam Parliamentary Friendship Union Nikai Toshihiro attended the Vietnam-Japan Exchange.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span Central Organizing Committee Pham Minh Chinh, representatives of ministries, branches, provinces, cities, socio-economic organizations, friendship associations, many Vietnamese enterprises ... and about 1,000 delegates of the delegation save Japan economy, culture and tourism.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span the Vietnamese people, to lead the largest exchange of Japanese economic, cultural and tourism exchanges. So far, more than 1,000 delegates, including parliamentarians, senior officials, local representatives, many Japanese businesses and friends have come to visit Vietnam.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span comprehensive development of the extensive Vietnam - Japan strategic partnership, from trustworthiness. high in politics, security, defense, diplomacy, openness, efficiency in economic cooperation, investment, trade, to the richness, harmony, affection for cultural exchanges, calendar, local cooperation, connecting people ....<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Prime Minister Nguyen Xuan Phuc and General Secretary Nikai perform the ritual of growing Oga lotus.<\/font><\/font><\/em><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\t\t\t<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">The Prime Minister said the exchange between the people of Vietnam and Japan began naturally in the ancient centuries, including many events associated with the central strip of Vietnam, where they We meet again today.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">In the 8th century, the Buddhist monk Triet of Lam Ap, Central Vietnam, came to Na-ra, the Japanese capital at that time to introduce and exchange Lam Ap&#39;s music and until now these tones continue. continue to be seen in Japanese music and that is in harmony with the sound of Hue Royal Music in Vietnam.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&ldquo;Yesterday, I learned that Mr. Nikai and many friends have visited Hoi An, a world cultural heritage, where from the 16th to 17th centuries was a prosperous international trading port, which welcomed many merchant ships and businessmen. internationally, Japan came to bustling trade and built the Japanese neighborhood, which today has become a favorite destination for Japanese and international tourists, &rdquo;the Prime Minister said.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Experiencing many ups and downs of history, today, Vietnam - Japan relations are in the best development phase since establishing diplomatic relations in September 1973.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table style=\"border-width:0px; height:auto !important; min-height:inherit !important; margin:0px; padding:0px; border:undefined\">\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td style=\"border-collapse:collapse\"><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\">&nbsp;<img alt=\"tt\" src=\"http:\/\/thoibaotaichinhvietnam.vn\/Pictures12020\/trinhanhtuan-tbtc\/380395198.gif\" style=\"border:none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent; max-width:480px; display:table; margin:0px; vertical-align:top; white-space:normal !important; padding:0px\" \/><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">On the basis of friendly relations, good traditional cooperation and great strides in recent years, the Prime Minister stated a number of great orientations to work together to promote great potentials.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Firstly, the Government and people of Vietnam always consider Japan, a powerful power in the world, a reliable, important and leading partner for long-term cooperation.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Japan also considers Vietnam to be the leading strategic partner in the region.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Vietnam is the country coordinating the ASEAN-Japan relationship for the 2018-2021 term, the ASEAN Chair 2020 and the non-permanent member of the United Nations Security Council for the 2020-2021 term. &ldquo;Let&#39;s work together. elevating relations to new heights, &rdquo;the Prime Minister emphasized.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Second, Vietnam and Japan share many common interests, the economies of the two countries are at different levels of development, complementary to each other rather than competitive.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Japanese people like fresh fruits, seafood, shrimp, tuna, etc. in Vietnam and vice versa, Vietnamese people prefer high-quality Japanese-branded electronics, motorbikes and cars.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Currently, Japan is the largest ODA provider, the 2nd investor, the 3rd partner on tourism and the 4th trade in Vietnam.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">These rankings will soon be changed and Japan will be Vietnam&#39;s largest partner in the near future.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Thirdly, following the exchanges of people from ancient times, the two countries shared values \u200b\u200bof culture and customs, such as using chopsticks and drinking tea;&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Vietnamese and Japanese people are hard-working, industrious, studious, uphold the moral values, family, glass on the bottom, and love the bright pink in the spring breeze of peach blossom ... Vietnamese community Male in Japan has become the 3rd largest expatriate community with nearly 400 thousand people.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">In 2019, there are more than 900 thousand Japanese visitors to Vietnam, which Hoi An is a favorite destination.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">At the same time, over 400 thousand Vietnamese visit Japan.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Fourthly, strengthening connectivity between the two economies through the CPTPP Agreement, with high and comprehensive standards for Japanese and Vietnamese enterprises to cooperate, invest, transfer technology and develop markets. and join the global value chain.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Fifthly, strengthening the cohesion between the Government, the National Assembly, ministries, branches and localities, exchanging people of the two countries with various forms and concrete and substantive cooperation projects like Vietnamese University. - Japan.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Strengthening the cohesion and mutual understanding between the peoples of the two countries, especially the young generation, that we can take inspiration from the initiatives on exchanging Oga lotus and establishing bookcases of Secretary General Nikai for some central schools.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&ldquo;Cooperation and cohesion help us have more strength to bring the extensive strategic partnership between Vietnam and Japan to new heights for the benefit of the peoples of the two countries, for peace, stability and cooperation. and development of the region and the world, &rdquo;the Prime Minister stated.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table style=\"border-width:0px; height:auto !important; min-height:inherit !important; margin:0px; padding:0px; border:undefined\">\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td style=\"border-collapse:collapse\"><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\">&nbsp;<img alt=\"tt\" src=\"http:\/\/thoibaotaichinhvietnam.vn\/Pictures12020\/trinhanhtuan-tbtc\/492865082.gif\" style=\"border:none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent; max-width:480px; display:table; margin:0px; vertical-align:top; white-space:normal !important; padding:0px\" \/><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">General Secretary Nikai Toshihiro said that the relationship between the two countries developed well and people-to-people exchanges were very lively.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">In 2019, the people-to-people exchange between the two countries will reach 1,400 thousand.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">The friendly relationship between Vietnam and Japan is in the best phase ever.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:13px\"><span style=\"color:#363636\"><span style=\"line-height:18px\"><span segoe=\"\" style=\"font-family:\" ui=\"\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"line-height:1.5\"><span style=\"font-style:normal !important\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&ldquo;Oga lotus varieties have a history of over 2,000 years.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Lotus is also the national flower of Vietnam.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">Especially a symbol of peace, &rdquo;Mr. Nikai Toshihiro shared and said: There were many high school students in Japan attending Vietnam night.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">&ldquo;We must pass the Japan-Vietnam friendship relationship to the next generation so that the relationship between the two countries can continue to develop.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">I want Japanese students to visit Vietnam this time to learn from experience and after returning to Japan, please study hard, contribute to the relationship to meet the aspiration of the Japanese people, bringing The two countries continue to develop in the future &rdquo;.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"vertical-align:inherit\">At the night of exchanging, Prime Minister Nguyen Xuan Phuc and General Secretary Nikai performed Oga lotus planting ceremony, witnessed the ceremony of giving Japanese books to some schools in the Central region.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n<\/div>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div products must be cultivated from the root of each business.......<\/p>","mota_cn":"","noidung_vi":"<p>Tri\u1ebft l&iacute; kinh doanh: N&oacute;i &iacute;t, l&agrave;m nhi\u1ec1u; s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vun tr\u1ed3ng t\u1eeb g\u1ed1c \u0111&atilde; \u0103n s&acirc;u v&agrave;o t\u1eebng doanh nghi\u1ec7p, l&agrave; c\u1ed9i r\u1ec5 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p Nh\u1eadt.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&ocirc;ng ph\u1ea3i ng\u1eabu nhi&ecirc;n, ng\u01b0\u1eddi mi\u1ec1n Nam \u0111\u1ebfn ng&agrave;y nay v\u1eabn g\u1ecdi xe m&aacute;y l&agrave; xe Honda, hay slogan &ldquo;n&eacute;t nh\u01b0 Sony&rdquo;, &ldquo;t\u1ee7 l\u1ea1nh Electrolux - 40 n\u0103m v\u1eabn ch\u1ea1y t\u1ed1t&rdquo; tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh c&acirc;u c\u1eeda mi\u1ec7ng c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi Vi\u1ec7t. \u0110&oacute; l&agrave; uy t&iacute;n &quot;v&ocirc; \u0111\u1ed1i&quot; v\u1ec1 ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c th\u01b0\u01a1ng C&oacute; th\u1ec3 n&oacute;i ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt \u0111&atilde; th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam khi t\u1ea1o \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng b\u1ea5t di b\u1ea5t d\u1ecbch &ldquo;c\u1ee9 h&agrave;ng Nh\u1eadt l&agrave; t\u1ed1t, l&agrave; b\u1ec1n&rdquo;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>C\u1ed9i ngu\u1ed3n ni\u1ec1m tin ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng m&agrave; doanh nghi\u1ec7p Nh\u1eadt t\u1ea1o d\u1ef1ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave; nh\u1edd t&aacute;c phong, cung c&aacute;ch qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; kinh doanh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 quy tr&igrave;nh qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ri&ecirc;ng bi\u1ec7t. Tri\u1ebft l&iacute; kinh doanh: n&oacute;i &iacute;t, l&agrave;m nhi\u1ec1u; s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vun tr\u1ed3ng t\u1eeb g\u1ed1c \u0111&atilde; \u0103n s&acirc;u v&agrave;o t\u1eebng doanh nghi\u1ec7p, l&agrave; c\u1ed9i r\u1ec5 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p n&agrave;y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>Th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng nh\u1edd ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n l&agrave; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng. \u0110&acirc;y ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; \u0111i\u1ec3m m\u1ea5u ch\u1ed1t t\u1ea1o n&ecirc;n s\u1ef1 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng cho c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n. \u0110i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n r&otilde; n&eacute;t trong m\u1ecdi l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t, t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ed3 th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m, m\u1ef9 ph\u1ea9m, s\u1eefa, \u0111\u1ebfn h&agrave;ng ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng gia d\u1ee5ng, h&agrave;ng \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed, c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7, xe c\u1ed9...<\/p>\r\n\r\n<table align=\"center\">\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><img alt=\"\" data-bind-event=\"true\" data-title=\"null\" slide-pos=\"1\" src=\"https:\/\/znews-photo.zadn.vn\/w660\/Uploaded\/pgi_xvauqbnau\/2014_03_13\/n1.jpg\" title=\"null\" \/><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>Xe h\u01a1i Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111i \u0111\u1ea7u v\u1ec1 ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9 b\u1ec1n b\u1ec9.<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p>C&aacute;c nh&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n quan ni\u1ec7m r\u1eb1ng, c&agrave;ng ng&agrave;y con ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1ebd d\u1ea7n d\u1ea7n ch\u1ecdn cho m&igrave;nh nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c&oacute; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 cho nhu c\u1ea7u ng&agrave;y c&agrave;ng cao c\u1ee7a m&igrave;nh. Ch&iacute;nh v&igrave; v\u1eady, n\u1ebfu doanh nghi\u1ec7p cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c&oacute; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng k&eacute;m, ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1eb1ng doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111&oacute; s\u1ebd kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 c&oacute; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n, s\u1ef1 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt lu&ocirc;n c&oacute; t&iacute;nh c\u1ea7u to&agrave;n, do \u0111&oacute; trong s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ng\u01b0\u1eddi ta v\u1eabn \u01b0u ti&ecirc;n l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn nh\u1eefng nguy&ecirc;n v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u c&oacute; ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao nh\u1ea5t, m&aacute;y m&oacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t, \u0111&acirc;y l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 l&agrave;m cho gi&aacute; th&agrave;nh s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u0103ng l&ecirc;n. Th&ecirc;m v&agrave;o \u0111&oacute;, nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m n&agrave;y n\u1ebfu xu\u1ea5t kh\u1ea9u sang n\u01b0\u1edbc ngo&agrave;i l\u1ea1i ph\u1ea3i ch\u1ecbu m\u1ed9t m\u1ee9c thu\u1ebf quan kh&aacute; cao g&oacute;p ph\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0a gi&aacute; b&aacute;n l&ecirc;n cao h\u01a1n n\u1eefa. B&ugrave; l\u1ea1i, ng\u01b0\u1eddi ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng c&oacute; th\u1ec3 ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n y&ecirc;n t&acirc;m khi l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m n&agrave;y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>\u0110\u1ec1 cao uy t&iacute;n<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>\u1ede Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n, vi\u1ec7c gi\u1eef ch\u1eef t&iacute;n \u0111&atilde; tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh m\u1ed9t n&eacute;t v\u0103n h&oacute;a, ngh\u0129a l&agrave; b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 ai c\u0169ng c&oacute; &yacute; th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c n&agrave;y. &Yacute; th\u1ee9c \u0111&oacute; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nu&ocirc;i d\u01b0\u1ee1ng ngay t\u1eeb khi c&ograve;n nh\u1ecf t\u1eeb s\u1ef1 gi&aacute;o d\u1ee5c c\u1ee7a gia \u0111&igrave;nh. Trong m\u1ed9t x&atilde; h\u1ed9i m&agrave; ai c\u0169ng gi\u1eef ch\u1eef t&iacute;n nh\u01b0 v\u1eady, n\u1ebfu c&oacute; ai kh&ocirc;ng tu&acirc;n th\u1ee7, ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch&uacute; &yacute; theo h\u01b0\u1edbng ti&ecirc;u c\u1ef1c. V&agrave; nh\u01b0 v\u1eady, h\u1ecd nhanh ch&oacute;ng \u0111&aacute;nh m\u1ea5t h&igrave;nh \u1ea3nh c\u1ee7a m&igrave;nh tr\u01b0\u1edbc m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<table align=\"center\">\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><img alt=\"\" data-bind-event=\"true\" data-title=\"null\" slide-pos=\"2\" src=\"https:\/\/znews-photo.zadn.vn\/w660\/Uploaded\/pgi_xvauqbnau\/2014_03_13\/n2.jpg\" title=\"null\" \/><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>Ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt lu&ocirc;n bi\u1ebft ch\u1ecbu tr&aacute;ch nhi\u1ec7m tr\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m&igrave;nh l&agrave;m ra.<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p>Khi s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c&oacute; l\u1ed7i, h\u1ecd s\u1eb5n s&agrave;ng nh\u1eadn l\u1ed7i, thu h\u1ed3i s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m, kh\u1eafc ph\u1ee5c m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch th\u1ecfa \u0111&aacute;ng nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o uy t&iacute;n. V\u1edbi ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt, xin l\u1ed7i l&agrave; m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec1u ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n b&igrave;nh th\u01b0\u1eddng. B\u1edfi xin l\u1ed7i kh&ocirc;ng ph\u1ea3i l&agrave; th\u1ea5t b\u1ea1i, kh&ocirc;ng ph\u1ea3i l&agrave; b\u1ecb c\u1ea5p tr&ecirc;n \u0111&aacute;nh gi&aacute; th\u1ea5p&hellip; m&agrave; \u0111&oacute; ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; s\u1ef1 nh&igrave;n nh\u1eadn th\u1eb3ng th\u1eafn v&agrave;o s\u1ef1 th\u1eadt \u0111\u1ec3 c&oacute; s\u1ef1 c\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn cho c&ocirc;ng vi\u1ec7c ti\u1ebfp theo, r&uacute;t ra kinh nghi\u1ec7m cho m&igrave;nh. Do \u0111&oacute;, ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt quan ni\u1ec7m r\u1eb1ng, ng\u01b0\u1eddi n&agrave;o bi\u1ebft xin l\u1ed7i l&agrave; ng\u01b0\u1eddi c&oacute; &yacute; ch&iacute; c\u1ea7u ti\u1ebfn, ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n m&igrave;nh v&agrave; s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111&aacute;nh gi&aacute; cao.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3>V&igrave; con ng\u01b0\u1eddi<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>V\u0103n h&oacute;a kinh doanh c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n l&agrave; &quot;\u0111\u1eb7c s\u1ea3n&quot; trong c&aacute;c t\u1eadp gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb l&agrave;m n&ecirc;n ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m v&agrave; s\u1ef1 th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. \u0110i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea3 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi c&ocirc;ng nh\u1eadn v&agrave; t\u1eebng ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt c\u0169ng t\u1ef1 h&agrave;o. B\u1ea3n ch\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a v\u0103n h&oacute;a \u0111&oacute; l&agrave;: Xem con ng\u01b0\u1eddi l&agrave; y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh, c&aacute;ch s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng v&agrave; khuy\u1ebfn kh&iacute;ch con ng\u01b0\u1eddi l&agrave; y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 s\u1ed1 1, gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft t\u1ed1t c&aacute;c quan h\u1ec7 gi\u1eefa con ng\u01b0\u1eddi l&agrave; y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 xuy&ecirc;n su\u1ed1t. C\u1ea3 3 \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111&oacute; \u0111\u1ec1u d\u1ef1a tr&ecirc;n n\u1ec1n t\u1ea3ng tinh hoa v\u0103n h&oacute;a x&atilde; h\u1ed9i Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n: t\u1ef1 c\u01b0\u1eddng, t\u1ef1 ch\u1ee7, t\u1ef1 h&agrave;o, t\u1ef1 gi&aacute;c, t\u1ef1 t&ocirc;n... \u0111&atilde; tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh t\u1eebng gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb lao \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<table align=\"center\">\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><img alt=\"\" data-bind-event=\"true\" data-title=\"null\" slide-pos=\"3\" src=\"https:\/\/znews-photo.zadn.vn\/w660\/Uploaded\/pgi_xvauqbnau\/2014_03_13\/n3.jpg\" title=\"null\" \/><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>Trong l&uacute;c kh&oacute; kh\u0103n nh\u1ea5t, ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt v\u1eabn t&ocirc;n tr\u1ecdng nh\u1eefng quy t\u1eafc, nh\u01b0\u1eddng nh\u1ecbn v&agrave; y&ecirc;u th\u01b0\u01a1ng nhau.<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ch\u1eafc kh&ocirc;ng ai trong ch&uacute;ng ta l&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1edb \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1ea3m h\u1ecda k&eacute;p \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ea5t, s&oacute;ng th\u1ea7n t\u1ea1i t\u1ec9nh Fukushima (Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n) v&agrave;o n\u0103m 2011 \u0111&atilde; l&agrave;m ch\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ea3 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi. Nh\u01b0ng c\u1ea3 th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi c&ograve;n c&oacute; m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ch\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ed9ng kh&aacute;c, \u0111&oacute; l&agrave; th&aacute;i \u0111\u1ed9 b&igrave;nh t\u0129nh v&agrave; t&ocirc;n tr\u1ecdng, nh\u01b0\u1eddng nh\u1ecbn v&agrave; y&ecirc;u th\u01b0\u01a1ng nhau c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi d&acirc;n Nh\u1eadt. H\u1ecd gi&uacute;p \u0111\u1ee1 l\u1eabn nhau trong ho\u1ea1n n\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 r\u1ed3i v\u01b0\u01a1n l&ecirc;n m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd. \u0110\u1ec3 r\u1ed3i \u0111i \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 qu\u1ed1c gia n&agrave;o, c&aacute;c doanh nghi\u1ec7p Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n c\u0169ng t\u1eeb c&aacute;i tinh th\u1ea7n \u1ea5y m&agrave; lu&ocirc;n gi&uacute;p \u0111\u1ee1 v&agrave; h\u01b0\u1edbng t\u1edbi con ng\u01b0\u1eddi.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam, nh\u1eefng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng ti&ecirc;n phong t\u1ea1o n&ecirc;n gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb c\u1ee7a c&aacute;c th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111ang ng&agrave;y c&agrave;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c th\u01b0\u1eddng xuy&ecirc;n h\u01a1n. \u0110&oacute; l&agrave; c&aacute;c ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng c&ocirc;ng t&aacute;c x&atilde; h\u1ed9i v&agrave; b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng, nh\u1eb1m h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng nh\u01b0 \u0111\u1ed1i t\u01b0\u1ee3ng c&aacute;c em sinh vi&ecirc;n c&oacute; ho&agrave;n c\u1ea3nh kh&oacute; kh\u0103n, h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 c&aacute;c c\u1ee5 gi&agrave; neo \u0111\u01a1n, c&aacute;c tr\u1ea1i tr\u1ebb m\u1ed3 c&ocirc;i.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<table align=\"center\">\r\n\t<tbody>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td><img alt=\"\" data-bind-event=\"true\" data-title=\"null\" slide-pos=\"4\" src=\"https:\/\/znews-photo.zadn.vn\/w660\/Uploaded\/pgi_xvauqbnau\/2014_03_13\/n4.jpg\" title=\"null\" \/><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>Bridgestone &ndash; m\u1ed9t th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u l\u1ed1p \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n \u0111&atilde; c&oacute; nh\u1eefng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng x&atilde; h\u1ed9i t&iacute;ch c\u1ef1c t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam.<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ch&uacute;ng ta c&oacute; th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y nh\u1eefng tri\u1ebft l&yacute; n&agrave;y qua c&aacute;c c&ocirc;ng ty n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1ea1i Vi\u1ec7t Nam. L\u1ea5y v&iacute; d\u1ee5 nh\u01b0 h&atilde;ng l\u1ed1p Bridgestone &ndash; h&atilde;ng l\u1ed1p Nh\u1eadt uy t&iacute;n \u0111ang ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1ea1i th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng Vi\u1ec7t Nam. Trong tri\u1ebft l&yacute; kinh doanh c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd, con ng\u01b0\u1eddi v&agrave; s\u1ef1 an to&agrave;n c\u1ee7a con ng\u01b0\u1eddi lu&ocirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t l&ecirc;n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u. Nh&agrave; s&aacute;ng l\u1eadp Bridgestone - Shojiro Ishibashi \u0111&atilde; t\u1eebng ph&aacute;t bi\u1ec3u: &ldquo;Ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kinh doanh kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 nh\u1eb1m m\u1ee5c \u0111&iacute;ch sinh l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn, m&agrave; quan tr\u1ecdng nh\u1ea5t l&agrave; s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ra nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng, ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 nhu c\u1ea7u x&atilde; h\u1ed9i v&agrave; g\u1eafn li\u1ec1n v\u1edbi c&aacute;c ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng v&igrave; con ng\u01b0\u1eddi, m&ocirc;i tr\u01b0\u1eddng...&rdquo;. Quan ni\u1ec7m nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf, n&ecirc;n ng\u01b0\u1eddi Nh\u1eadt \u0111&atilde; t\u1ea1o ra \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng nh\u01b0 v\u1eady. V&agrave; \u0111&oacute; l&agrave; c\u01a1 s\u1edf \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o ra th&agrave;nh c&ocirc;ng c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Nh\u1eadt B\u1ea3n tr&ecirc;n d\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ea5t h&igrave;nh ch\u1eef S.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ngu\u1ed3n: zingnews<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"<p class=\"the-article-summary\" style=\"border:0px; margin:0px 0px 18px; padding:0px; width:660px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"clear:both\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Business philosophy: Speak less, do more;&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Quality products must be cultivated from the root of each business, which is the root of success for Japanese businesses.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"the-article-body\" style=\"border:0px; margin:0px; padding:0px; width:660px; text-align:start; -webkit-text-stroke-width:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin-top:0px !important; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:18px; margin-left:0px; padding:0px; width:660px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:none\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">It is no coincidence that the Southern people today still call the motorbike a Honda car, or the slogan &quot;like Sony&quot;, &quot;the refrigerator Electrolux - 40 years still running well&quot; became the mouth of the Vietnamese.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">It is the &quot;unmatched&quot; reputation for the quality of Japanese brands to Vietnamese users.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">It can be said that the Japanese have succeeded in Vietnam when creating the immutable impression &quot;every Japanese product is good, is durable&quot;.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">The source of consumer confidence that Japanese businesses have built up is their unique style, business management practices and quality management processes.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Business philosophy: talk less, do more;&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Quality products must be cultivated from the root of each business, which is the root of their success.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:0px; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; margin:10px 0px; padding:0px; border:0px; font-size:1.4em; vertical-align:baseline; background:transparent; text-size-adjust:100%; float:left; width:660px; letter-spacing:-1px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Success through quality<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin-top:80px !important; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:18px; margin-left:0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box;
