vertical-align:inherit\">The first is quality.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">This is the key to the success of Japanese businesses.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">This is evident in all areas of production, from food, cosmetics, milk, to consumer goods, electronics, technology, vehicles ...<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table align=\"center\" class=\"picture\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; border-collapse:collapse; border-spacing:0px; width:660px; font-family:sans-serif; color:#888888\">\r\n\t<tbody style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:0px; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Japanese cars are at the forefront of quality and durability.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Japanese manufacturers believe that more and more people will gradually choose for themselves good quality products to serve their increasing needs.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Therefore, if an enterprise provides products of poor quality, it is certain that it will not be able to achieve sustainable development and success.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">The Japanese are always perfectionist, so in production, they still prefer to choose the highest quality raw materials, the best machinery and equipment, this is one of the factors that make the product price. increase.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">In addition, these products, if exported to foreign countries, are subject to a relatively high tariff, contributing to higher selling prices.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">In return, consumers can feel secure when choosing these products.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 style=\"box-sizing:border-box; float:left; width:660px; letter-spacing:-1px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Promote reputation<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin-top:80px !important; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:18px; margin-left:0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">In Japan, keeping credibility has become a cultural trait, meaning that anyone is aware of it.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">That consciousness is nurtured from an early age from the education of the family.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">In a society where everyone holds such credibility, if anyone does not comply, it will certainly be noticed in the negative direction.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">And so, they quickly lost their image in front of everyone.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table align=\"center\" class=\"picture\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; border-collapse:collapse; border-spacing:0px; width:660px; font-family:sans-serif; color:#888888\">\r\n\t<tbody style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:0px; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:0px; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; margin:0px; padding:0px; border:0px; font-size:14.08px; vertical-align:baseline; background:transparent; text-size-adjust:100%\">\r\n\t\t\t<td class=\"pCaption caption\" style=\"border:0px; background:transparent\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:0px; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:baseline; margin:0px; padding:5px 0px 8px; font-size:14.08px; text-size-adjust:100%; position:relative\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Japanese people are always responsible for the products they make.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">When products have errors, they are willing to accept errors, recall products, and solve them in a most satisfactory way to ensure reputation.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">To Japanese people, apologizing is a completely normal thing.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Because apologizing is not a failure, it is not being underestimated by the higher authorities ... but it is a straightforward recognition of the truth for improvement for the next job, drawing experience for us.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Therefore, the Japanese conception that those who apologize are those who have the will to progress, develop themselves and will be appreciated.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<h3 style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:0px; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; margin:10px 0px; padding:0px; border:0px; font-size:1.4em; vertical-align:baseline; background:transparent; text-size-adjust:100%; float:left; width:660px; letter-spacing:-1px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">For humans<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin-top:80px !important; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:18px; margin-left:0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">The business culture of Japanese businesses is &quot;specialty&quot; in the value sets that make up the quality of their products and their success.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">This is recognized worldwide and each Japanese is proud.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">The essence of that culture is: See people as a decisive factor, how to use and encourage people as the number one factor, and well solve the relationships between people as a cross-cutting element.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">All three things are based on the essence of Japanese social culture: self-reliance, self-control, pride, self-discipline, self-respect ... have become each labor value of each Japanese.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table align=\"center\" class=\"picture\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:0px; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px; border:0px; font-size:0.8em; vertical-align:baseline; background:transparent; text-size-adjust:100%; border-collapse:collapse; border-spacing:0px; width:660px; font-family:sans-serif; color:#888888\">\r\n\t<tbody style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:0px; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">In the most difficult times, the Japanese still respect the rules, yield and love each other.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">Probably none of us does not remember the double earthquake and tsunami in Fukushima Prefecture (Japan) in 2011 that shocked the world.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">But there was another commotion in the world, the calm and respectful attitude, giving in and loving one another of the Japanese people.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">They help each other in tribulation and then grow strong.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">And then to any country, Japanese businesses also from that spirit that always help and towards people.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; vertical-align:inherit\">In fact, in Vietnam, the pioneering activities that create value of Japanese brands are being organized more and more often.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">These are social work and environmental protection activities, aimed at supporting the community like disadvantaged students, supporting lonely elderly people, orphanages.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<table align=\"center\" class=\"picture\" style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Bridgestone - a tire brand from Japan has had active social activities in Vietnam.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t<\/tbody>\r\n<\/table>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\"><span style=\"font-size:1.1em\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><span style=\"float:left\"><span style=\"position:relative\"><span noto=\"\" serif=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><span style=\"color:#333333\"><span style=\"line-height:1.618\"><span style=\"font-style:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-ligatures:normal\"><span style=\"font-variant-caps:normal\"><span style=\"font-weight:400\"><span style=\"letter-spacing:normal\"><span style=\"orphans:2\"><span style=\"text-transform:none\"><span style=\"white-space:normal\"><span style=\"widows:2\"><span style=\"word-spacing:0px\"><span style=\"text-decoration-style:initial\"><span style=\"text-decoration-color:initial\"><span style=\"font-size:17.6px\"><span style=\"background:transparent\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"text-rendering:geometricprecision\"><span style=\"outline:0px\"><span style=\"-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased\"><span style=\"vertical-align:baseline\"><span style=\"text-size-adjust:100%\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\"><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">We can see these philosophies through famous Japanese companies operating in Vietnam.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Take for example Bridgestone Tire Company - a Japanese tire company operating in Vietnam market.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">In their business philosophy, people and human safety are always the top priority.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Bridgestone founder Shojiro Ishibashi once said: &ldquo;Business is not only for profit, but also for producing quality products that serve social needs and are associated with activities for people and the environment ... &rdquo;.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">Such a concept, so the Japanese have created such quality products.&nbsp;<\/font><font style=\"box-sizing:border-box; text-rendering:geometricprecision; outline:none; -webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased; vertical-align:inherit\">And that is the basis for the success of Japanese brands on the S-shaped strip of land.<\/font><\/font><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px; margin:18px 0px; padding:0px\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"border:0px;
